analyzed: de nas phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi sems dpa' chen po rjes su dran par bya ste zhes bya ba gsungs te /

analyzed: phyag rgya rnams kyi dam tshig yin pas na phyag rgya'i dam tshig ste /

analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang las kyi phyag rgya rnams bskyed pa'i rgyu zhas bya ba'i tha tshig go //

analyzed: dam tshig kyang yin la sems dpa' yang yin pas na / phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi sems dpa' chen po ste /

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o //

original: de rjes su dran pa ni bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de rjes su dran pa ni bsgom pa'o //

original: de rnam par bsgom pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de rnam par bsgom pa ni 'di yin te /

original: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
analyzed: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //

original: nam mkha' skye ba'i mtshan nyid yin //

original: kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid //
analyzed: kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid //

analyzed: 'dod pa kun dang 'gro ba'i bdag / sems can kun gyi sems gang yin //

analyzed: bstan phyir sems dpa' zhes bshad do // mnyam par gzhag pas ting nge 'dzin // sems dpa' las ni rdo rjer @166a * //

original: 'gyur ; / sems dpa' byin rlabs sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: 'gyur ; / sems dpa' byin rlabs sbyor ba yis //

original: sems dpa' nyid du 'ang de 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems dpa' nyid du 'ang de 'gyur ro //

original: bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' de nyid de //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' de nyid de //
translated: The Blessed One is that very hero.

original: rdo rje 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs //
translated: The Tathagata is Vajra Passion,

original: rang sems rab tu rtogs la sogs //
analyzed: rang sems rab tu rtogs la sogs //

original: sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin //

original: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs //
analyzed: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs //

original: de nyid rdo rje'i rigs chen po //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje'i rigs chen po //
translated: that very [enlightenment] is the great Vajra family,

original: de nyid padma'i rigs dag pa //
analyzed: de nyid padma'i rigs dag pa //
translated: that very [enlightenment] is the pure Lotus family,

original: de nyid nor bu'i rigs mchog go //
analyzed: de nyid nor bu'i rigs mchog go //

original: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa yin no //

analyzed: dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa' ste /

analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o //
translated: It is Vairocana the Great, the essence of the beginningless and endless ultimate realm.

analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ni bdag yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /

analyzed: bdag ni sems dpa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo mig yor tsam yin gyi /

original: don dam par ni thams cad du gzugs can ma yin te /
analyzed: don dam par ni thams cad du gzugs can ma yin te /
translated: But ultimately, I am formless in every way.

original: de bas na thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa' ni bdag yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa' ni bdag yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, I am the being of the great commitment without beginning or end.”

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni / aom tsatta pra ti be dham ka ro mi zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The practitioner of the yoga of the Tathāgata🔽should recite just this much: “Oṃ, I generate the realization of the mind,

analyzed: ya th'a sarbba ta th'a ga ta sta tha aa ham zhes bya ba'i bar 'di tsam zhig brjod par bya'i /

analyzed: ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham zhes bya ba ni ma yin te /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / padma dang / rin po che dang / nor bu'i rigs nyid ni /🔽rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyis na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / padma dang / rin po che dang / nor bu'i rigs nyid ni / rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyis na /
translated: The Tathāgata, Vajra, Lotus, Jewel, and Mani families🔽are the nature of Mahāvairocana.

original: dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir //
translated: Since they are the nature of the Mahāyāna mind of commitment,

analyzed: badzra tva zhes bya ba la sogs pa zlos pas kyang rigs kyi sgom pa pos rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor bya ba yin te /

analyzed: bzlas pa'i don du bdag nyid ni // bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur @166b ba yin //

analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: for the purpose of mantra recitation, one will be successful.

original: de ltar phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Thus, in order to accomplish all seals,

translated: Having explained the extensive rite of one's meditation, he teaches the yoga of the Tathagata and the yoga of his clan, the meditation of one's great seal of Vairochana, etc.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: That is stated in therein, etc.

original: thog ma kho na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: thog ma kho na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The very beginning means

analyzed: chos dang / las dang / phyag rgya chen po bcing ba'i sngon du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

analyzed: de bcing ba ni rang gi phyag rgya bcing ba'o //

analyzed: rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpa' ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo ste /

analyzed: rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpa' der sa ma ya ham zhes zlos shing bsgom par bya'o //

analyzed: de la sa ma ya zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob ste /

analyzed: kun rdzob kyi gzugs can ni bdag go zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

analyzed: de ltar rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la rang gi lha'i ngo bor bdag rnam par bsgoms nas rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor brtan par bya ba'i phyir ;

analyzed: de brtan par bya ba'i phyir /

translated: The extensive rite of the meaning of powers is the extensive rite of powers.

original: nor bsgrub par 'dod pas rang gi lha'i sbyor ba rjes su spyad nas ji skad gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i dngos grub la sogs pa bsam pa nyid dang / shis pa'i sgra brjod par bya ba ni /
analyzed: nor bsgrub par 'dod pas rang gi lha'i sbyor ba rjes su spyad nas ji skad gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i dngos grub la sogs pa bsam pa nyid dang / shis pa'i sgra brjod par bya ba ni /
translated: One who desires to accomplish wealth, having performed the yoga of one's deity, should think of the vajra power, etc., in the manner taught, and utter the sound of auspiciousness.

original: aartha siddhi zhes bya ba ste gang gi phyir snying po 'dis nor gyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: aartha siddhi zhes bya ba ste gang gi phyir snying po 'dis nor gyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The word arthasiddhi means that by this essence, one will attain the power of wealth.

original: de nas rdo rje zhes @167b bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje zhes @167b bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, the one who recites vajra and so forth,

original: badzra siddhi zhes zlos pa pos rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod pas kyang de bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la badzra siddhi zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: badzra siddhi zhes zlos pa pos rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod pas kyang de bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la badzra siddhi zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
translated: who desires to accomplish the power of magical abilities, should also perform all the rites in the same way, and utter vajrasiddhi three times.

original: de nas badzra dzva la zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas badzra dzva la zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then one should recite “vajra jñāna” and so forth.

original: de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro ba dang / cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro ba dang / cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
translated: Similarly, having first performed one’s deity yoga and having performed all the rites,

original: rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod pas /
analyzed: rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod pas /
translated: if one wishes to accomplish the feat of a knowledge-holder,

original: dang po kho nar 'di ltar badzra bi dh'a ra zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dang po kho nar 'di ltar badzra bi dh'a ra zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
translated: one should first recite “vajra vidhāraṇa” three times.

original: de nas ni badzra dh'a ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: de nas ni badzra dh'a ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: Then one should recite “vajra dhāraṇa” and so forth.

original: de nas dam pa bsgrub par 'dod na zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / rdo rje las kyi dngos grub ji skad du bshad pa ni dam pa ste /
analyzed: de nas dam pa bsgrub par 'dod na zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / rdo rje las kyi dngos grub ji skad du bshad pa ni dam pa ste /
translated: If one wishes to accomplish the highest, that is, the feats of the Tathāgatas, Vajrasattva, Lokeśvara, and Vajrakarma as explained,

original: de grub par 'dod cing don du gnyer na'o //
analyzed: de grub par 'dod cing don du gnyer na'o //
translated: and if one seeks and strives for them,

original: rang gi phyag rgya'i snying pos bsgrub po zhes bya bas ni rnal 'byor pa gang gi lha'i khyad par gang yin pa de'i snying po blangs la lha'i khyad par byas nas /
analyzed: rang gi phyag rgya'i snying pos bsgrub po zhes bya bas ni rnal 'byor pa gang gi lha'i khyad par gang yin pa de'i snying po blangs la lha'i khyad par byas nas /
translated: By one should accomplish with one's own seal-essence is meant that the yogin, having taken up the essence of whatever particular deity, should make that particular deity.

original: badzra satva zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nyid kyi snying po lan gsum bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: badzra satva zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nyid kyi snying po lan gsum bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Then, with vajrasattva and so forth, he should repeat that very essence three times.

original: de nas badzra badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas badzra badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Then he should repeat vajra vajra and so forth.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sgrub pa pos kyang badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba nas badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes bya ba'i bas kyis rang gi phyag rgya'i snying po zlos pa pos rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sgrub pa pos kyang badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba nas badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes bya ba'i bas kyis rang gi phyag rgya'i snying po zlos pa pos rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: Even the practitioner of Vairochana and so forth, with vajra dhatu up to vajra avastha a should accomplish Vairochana and so forth with the repetition of one's own seal-essence.

original: rang gi phyag rgya grub par bya ba'i phyir bzlas pa bya ba'i nges pa bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi phyag rgya grub par bya ba'i phyir bzlas pa bya ba'i nges pa bshad pa yin no //
translated: This explains the rule for the repetition for the accomplishment of one's own seal.

original: de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi //
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi //
translated: Then, of all the seals,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyis don gyi dngos grub la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyis don gyi dngos grub la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the seal of the powers of the meaning and so forth, up to the vajra-consecration.

original: spyi'i zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rigs thams cad kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi thun mong du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: spyi'i zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rigs thams cad kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi thun mong du gyur pa'o //
translated: The general is that which is common to all the yogis of the Tathagata and all the families.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni brtan par bya ba'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni brtan par bya ba'i cho ga'o //
translated: The vajra is the rite of stabilization.

original: gang zhig la brtan par bya zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhig la brtan par bya zhe na /
translated: In what is one stabilized?

original: rang gi lus dang ngag dang / sems rdo rje la'o //
analyzed: rang gi lus dang ngag dang / sems rdo rje la'o //
translated: In one's own body, speech, and mind vajras.

original: gang gi tshe brtan par bya zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe brtan par bya zhe na /
translated: When is one stabilized?

original: nam phyag rgya'i byin gyi rlabs lhod par gyur tam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: nam phyag rgya'i byin gyi rlabs lhod par gyur tam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: When the consecration of the seals becomes slack, and so forth.🔽When is the time?

original: nam zhes bya ba dus gang gi tshe phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgom pa la 'jug pa'i sgrub pa po rnams @168a * //
analyzed: nam zhes bya ba dus gang gi tshe phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgom pa la 'jug pa'i sgrub pa po rnams @168a * //
translated: When the practitioners who are engaged in the cultivation of the great seal and so forth.

original: de la dmigs pa'i sems gzhan du 'phyo ba dang / yul phyogs gzhan du 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i tshul gyis bcom par gyur pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i sems gzhan du 'phyo ba dang / yul phyogs gzhan du 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i tshul gyis bcom par gyur pa de'i tshe /
translated: When it is destroyed by the mode of conceptual thought, such as the mind being distracted to something else, or going to another place, etc.,

original: phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu nyams par gyur pas na 'di ni phyag rgya'i byin gyi rlabs lhod par gyur pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu nyams par gyur pas na 'di ni phyag rgya'i byin gyi rlabs lhod par gyur pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: then the power of the seal samādhi is lost. This is called “the seal empowerment is relaxed.”

original: de'i tshe 'am bdag gtong bar 'dod na zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe bsgoms pas yongs su dub par gyur na phyag rgya 'di dgrol bar 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'am bdag gtong bar 'dod na zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe bsgoms pas yongs su dub par gyur na phyag rgya 'di dgrol bar 'dod pa yin te /
translated: “ At that time, or if one wishes to give up” means that when one is tired of meditating, one wishes to release the seal.

original: de'i tshe yang brtan par bya'o zhes dus kyi nges pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang brtan par bya'o zhes dus kyi nges pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: At that time, one should stabilize, which is the statement of the time limit.

original: 'dis zhes bya ba ni aom badzra satva zhes bya ba la sogs pa yi ge brgya pa gsungs pas so //🔽'dis ni mtshams med pa byas pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'dis zhes bya ba ni aom badzra satva zhes bya ba la sogs pa yi ge brgya pa gsungs pas so // 'dis ni mtshams med pa byas pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: “ By this” means by reciting the hundred syllable mantra, Oṃ vajrasattva.

original: dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: By this, one will attain power, etc.

original: mtshams med pa byas pa yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mtshams med pa byas pa yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Also, one who has committed a heinous act🔽is a person who has committed a heinous act.

original: la bzla ba gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: la bzla ba gsungs pa yin te /
translated: This is the statement of the pledge.

original: nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa chen po byas pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur na /
analyzed: nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa chen po byas pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur na /
translated: If one who has committed a great sin that is certain to be experienced is successful,

original: sdig pa chung du byed pa dang rgyud yongs su dag pa de dag ni lta smos kyang ci dgos kyi shin tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdig pa chung du byed pa dang rgyud yongs su dag pa de dag ni lta smos kyang ci dgos kyi shin tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: what need is there to speak of one who has committed a small sin and whose mindstream is completely pure? He will be very successful.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus pa dang zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa gang yin pa 'di ni ngas byas kyi /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus pa dang zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa gang yin pa 'di ni ngas byas kyi /
translated: Those who say, I have done what the Tathagatas have said,

original: bstan bcos 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes smra ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slu bar byed pa de dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: bstan bcos 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes smra ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slu bar byed pa de dag kyang ngo //
translated: but this treatise is not the Buddha's word, are deceiving all the Tathagatas.

original: dam pa'i chos la smod pa ni dam pa'i chos rku ba'i sdig pa chen po byed pa ste /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos la smod pa ni dam pa'i chos rku ba'i sdig pa chen po byed pa ste /
translated: Those who disparage the holy Dharma commit the great sin of stealing the holy Dharma,

original: 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyi /
translated: saying, This is not the Buddha's word,🔽but this is the Buddha's word.

original: 'di ni snyan dngags mkhan gyis byas pa yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i tshig gam don spong bar byed pa de yang ngo //
analyzed: 'di ni snyan dngags mkhan gyis byas pa yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i tshig gam don spong bar byed pa de yang ngo //
translated: This is the word of the Tathagata, and then reject the words or the meaning.

original: nyes pa thams cad byas pa dang // zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims dang / kun du spyod pa dang / 'tsho ba log pa dang / ldan pa de dag kyang rdo rje sems dpa' brtan par gyur pas 'grub par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: nyes pa thams cad byas pa dang // zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims dang / kun du spyod pa dang / 'tsho ba log pa dang / ldan pa de dag kyang rdo rje sems dpa' brtan par gyur pas 'grub par 'gyur zhing /
translated: And also those who have committed all the misdeeds means that even those who are endowed with the misdeeds of ethics, conduct, and livelihood will be successful by the stability of Vajrasattva.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni /
translated: The seal of all the Tathagatas is the attainment of the samadhi of the vajra body, speech, and mind.

original: sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' brtan par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' brtan par gyur pa ste /
translated: The stability of Vajrasattva is the attainment of the samadhi of the vajra body, speech, and mind.

original: de las tshe 'di nyid ji ltar 'dod pa @168b zhes bya ba dngos grub dam pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub dang / nor chen po 'grub pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbab pa dang / bskrad pa dang / dgug pa dang /
analyzed: de las tshe 'di nyid ji ltar 'dod pa @168b zhes bya ba dngos grub dam pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub dang / nor chen po 'grub pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbab pa dang / bskrad pa dang / dgug pa dang /
translated: From that, whatever is desired in this very life is the attainment of the supreme attainment and so forth, the attainment of great wealth, the subjugation, the descent, the expulsion, the summoning, the killing, the binding, and the pacifying.

original: bcing ba dang / rmongs par bya ba dang / smyo bar bya ba la sogs pa ni dngos grub thams cad ces bya ba'i sgrar bshad do ;
analyzed: bcing ba dang / rmongs par bya ba dang / smyo bar bya ba la sogs pa ni dngos grub thams cad ces bya ba'i sgrar bshad do ;
translated: “Bondage, stupefaction, and madness, etc.,” are explained by the word “all powers.”

original: / dngos grub dam pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje las dang / rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub ni dngos grub dam pa'o //
analyzed: / dngos grub dam pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje las dang / rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub ni dngos grub dam pa'o //
translated: “Supreme power” is the supreme power of the Tathāgatas, Vajrasattva, Vajraratna, Vajradharma, Vajrakarma, and the power of the knowledge-holders.

original: rdo rje'i dngos grub ces bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bzhi'i dngos grub bo //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dngos grub ces bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bzhi'i dngos grub bo //
translated: “Vajra power” is the power of the four kinds of magical abilities.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub ces bya ba ni sems dpa' bcu drug gi dngos grub la rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub ces bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub ces bya ba ni sems dpa' bcu drug gi dngos grub la rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub ces bya'o //
translated: “Vajrasattva power” is the power of the sixteen sattvas, which is called “Vajrasattva power.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub ces bya ba ni /
translated: “Tathāgata power” is

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dngos grub bo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dngos grub bo //
translated: the power of the five Tathāgatas.

original: bar du zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sgeg mo la sogs pa'i dngos grub nas ;
analyzed: bar du zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sgeg mo la sogs pa'i dngos grub nas ;
translated: The word “and” indicates the power of the goddesses beginning with Lāsyā.

original: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi dngos grub ston te /
analyzed: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi dngos grub ston te /
translated: up to the power of the Vajra-descent.

original: 'di lta bu'i dngos grub rnams des thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i dngos grub rnams des thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: By this, one will attain such powers.

original: de nas phyag rgya thams cad ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / chos dang / las dang / phyag rgya chen po rnams so //
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya thams cad ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / chos dang / las dang / phyag rgya chen po rnams so //
translated: Then, all the seals means the pledges of all the Tathagatas and of all the families, and the Dharma, Action, and Great Seal.

original: de rnams kyi dgrol ba'i don gyi cho ga rgyas pa ni phyag rgya dgrol ba'i spyi'i cho ga rgyas pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dgrol ba'i don gyi cho ga rgyas pa ni phyag rgya dgrol ba'i spyi'i cho ga rgyas pa ste /
translated: The extensive ritual of their unsealing is the extensive general ritual of unsealing.

original: dam tshig bcing bas bcings pa rnams dam tshig gi 'ching ba dang bral ba ni dgrol ba'o //
analyzed: dam tshig bcing bas bcings pa rnams dam tshig gi 'ching ba dang bral ba ni dgrol ba'o //
translated: The unsealing of those bound by the pledge-bond is the unsealing.

original: de la thog ma nyid du zhes bya ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i dus kyi sngon du ste /
analyzed: de la thog ma nyid du zhes bya ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i dus kyi sngon du ste /
translated: There, first of all means prior to the time of requesting departure.

original: phyag rgya dgrol bar byas pa'i rjes la /
analyzed: phyag rgya dgrol bar byas pa'i rjes la /
translated: After the unsealing of the seals,

original: lha rnams gshegs su gsol zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: lha rnams gshegs su gsol zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: it means requesting the deities to depart.

original: gang dang gang nas zhes bya ba ni bzlas te gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: gang dang gang nas zhes bya ba ni bzlas te gsungs pa'o //
translated: From wherever means repeating what was said.

original: 'di skad ston te phyag rgya gang snying ga'i phyogs nas byung ba de de nyid du dgrol bar bya'o zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te phyag rgya gang snying ga'i phyogs nas byung ba de de nyid du dgrol bar bya'o zhes bya ba nas /
translated: This is what is being taught: “The mudrā that arises from the region of the heart should be released right there, and so on up to

original: gang spyi gtsug nas byung ba ni de nyid nas so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: gang spyi gtsug nas byung ba ni de nyid nas so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: the one that arises from the crown of the head should be released right there.”

original: de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gnas kyi nges pa ni smras zin to //
analyzed: de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gnas kyi nges pa ni smras zin to //
translated: The definite locations of Vajrasattva and so on have already been explained.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now the Tathāgatas will be discussed.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
translated: The location of Vajrasattva is Akṣobhya.

original: rdo rje rin chen gyi gnas ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //🔽rdo rje chos @169a * //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen gyi gnas ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o // rdo rje chos @169a * //
translated: The location of Vajraratna is Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: kyi gnas ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //🔽rdo rje las kyi gnas ni don yod par grub pa'i'o //
analyzed: kyi gnas ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o // rdo rje las kyi gnas ni don yod par grub pa'i'o //
translated: The location of Vajradharma is Amitābha.🔽The location of Vajrakarma is Amoghasiddhi.

original: spyi gtsug gi gnas ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
analyzed: spyi gtsug gi gnas ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
translated: The location of the crown of the head is Vairocana.

original: 'dir sbyar ba ni 'di lta bu yin te /
analyzed: 'dir sbyar ba ni 'di lta bu yin te /
translated: The application here is as follows.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su badzra dh'a tu zhes zlos shing dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la badzra mu: zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su dgrol la /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su badzra dh'a tu zhes zlos shing dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la badzra mu: zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su dgrol la /
translated: In the place of Vairochana, one should say vajradhātu, form the pledge seal, and with vajra muḥ, release it in the place of Vairochana.

original: de'i phyag rgya thams cad dgrol bar bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya thams cad dgrol bar bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that all the seals are released.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyis dam tshig phyag rgya bcings la badzra a'a ba sha zhes zlos shing badzra mu: zhes bya bas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i gnas su dgrol la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyis dam tshig phyag rgya bcings la badzra a'a ba sha zhes zlos shing badzra mu: zhes bya bas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i gnas su dgrol la /
translated: Similarly, up to the vajra-consecration, one should form the pledge seal, say vajra āveśaya, and with vajra muḥ, release it in the place of the vajra-consecration.

original: de'i phyag rgya thams cad dgrol bar bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya thams cad dgrol bar bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that all the seals are released.

original: snying ga nas byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: snying ga nas byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The seal of the jewel that arises from the heart, and so on.

original: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya snying gar bcings la /
analyzed: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya snying gar bcings la /
translated: Form the pledge seal of Ākāshagarbha at the heart.

original: de nas bteg ste rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas mdzod pa'i phyogs su bzhag la /
analyzed: de nas bteg ste rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas mdzod pa'i phyogs su bzhag la /
translated: Then, lifting it up, place it in the direction of one’s consecration.

original: badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya bas phyag rgya thams cad dbang bskur ba byas nas /
analyzed: badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya bas phyag rgya thams cad dbang bskur ba byas nas /
translated: Having empowered all the seals with the mantra vajra ratnābhiṣiñca,

original: phyag rgya thams cad rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya thams cad rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: all the seals are empowered with the crown of jewels, which are the nature of Vairocana, etc.

original: mdzub mo gnyis kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With the two index fingers, etc.

original: yang 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas la /
analyzed: yang 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas la /
translated: Again, one should make the two pledge seals of Ārya Ākāśagarbha.🔽With the mantra sarva mudra maṇḍala dṛśya kuru vara dakṣiṇe bham,

original: sarbba mu dra me drishti ku ru ba ra ka ba be tse na bam zhes bya ba 'di dang / de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyis de rnams la go cha bcing bar bya zhing /
analyzed: sarbba mu dra me drishti ku ru ba ra ka ba be tse na bam zhes bya ba 'di dang / de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyis de rnams la go cha bcing bar bya zhing /
translated: and likewise, one should bind the armor with the two index fingers on those [seals].

original: de nyid kyi dar dpyangs dang phreng ba dkri zhing bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi dar dpyangs dang phreng ba dkri zhing bcing bar bya'o //
translated: One should also wrap and bind the streamers and garlands with that [mudra].

original: de nas dar dbyangs dpyang ba byas nas /
analyzed: de nas dar dbyangs dpyang ba byas nas /
translated: Then, having made the streamers hang down,🔽with the mantra vajra tuṣya ho,

original: badzra tu shya ho zhes bya ba dang / mnyam pa'i thal mos mthar mnyes par bya'o //
analyzed: badzra tu shya ho zhes bya ba dang / mnyam pa'i thal mos mthar mnyes par bya'o //
translated: one should please [the deities] with the palms joined in homage.

original: rdo rje lta bur 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje lta bur 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One becomes like a vajra means

original: de la go cho bgo ba dang phreng ba bcing ba dag gis sngags pa lus dang sems rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de la go cho bgo ba dang phreng ba bcing ba dag gis sngags pa lus dang sems rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: that by the armoring and the binding of the garland, the mantra practitioner's body and mind become indivisible like a vajra. This is the meaning.

original: yang na rdo rje sems dpas kyang bya'o zhes bya ba ni badzra satva zhes rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas pas kyang bshad ma thag pa de thams cad du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yang na rdo rje sems dpas kyang bya'o zhes bya ba ni badzra satva zhes rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas pas kyang bshad ma thag pa de thams cad du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Or, also by Vajrasattva means that by the recitation of Vajrasattva, saying vajrasattva, all of the above is accomplished. This is the meaning.

original: yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Again, how is it?

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa @169b gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa @169b gsungs te /
translated: He says Vajrasattva, etc.,

original: gang gi phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lhan cig ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lhan cig ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: because Vajrasattva is always together, he says.

original: lhan cig bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur //🔽ji ltar 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lhan cig bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur // ji ltar 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If one recites together, it is accomplished.🔽 As desired means

original: bsam pa gang kho nas bzlas pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bsam pa gang kho nas bzlas pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: that it is the intention that one recites with whatever thought.

original: gang zhig 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhig 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is accomplished?

original: bdag bde bar zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: bdag bde bar zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The I is the self, and the happy is the nature of happiness.

original: gang zhig sems bde ba'i bdag nyid can de ni bde ba'i bdag ste /
analyzed: gang zhig sems bde ba'i bdag nyid can de ni bde ba'i bdag ste /
translated: Those who have a mind that is happy are happy selves.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms pas sems bde ba rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms pas sems bde ba rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By meditating on glorious Vajrasattva, those who are happy in mind will be successful.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: bzlas pa tsam gyis so //
analyzed: bzlas pa tsam gyis so //
translated: By mere recitation.

original: phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin //
translated: As Vajrapani has said.

original: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bde ba'i bdag nyid can dag 'grub par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bde ba'i bdag nyid can dag 'grub par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Just as the Blessed One Vajrapani has said, Those who have a happy nature will be successful,

original: bde ba ma yin pa'i bdag nyid can sems rnam par g-yengs pa rnams ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa bzhin du'o //
analyzed: bde ba ma yin pa'i bdag nyid can sems rnam par g-yengs pa rnams ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa bzhin du'o //
translated: but not those who have an unhappy nature, whose minds are distracted.🔽Vajrasattva and so on are heroes,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa yang yin la sems dpa' rnams kyang yin pas na /🔽rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa yang yin la sems dpa' rnams kyang yin pas na / rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams te /
translated: therefore they are the Vajra heroes.

original: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar rnams so //
translated: Vajra Hero and so on refers to Vajra Lochana and so on up to Vajra Acalanatha.

original: de rnams kyi bsgrub pa dang las kun ni /
analyzed: de rnams kyi bsgrub pa dang las kun ni /
translated: Their practice and all activities

original: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa dang las rnams te /🔽bsgrub pa dang las da dag thams cad la ;
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa dang las rnams te / bsgrub pa dang las da dag thams cad la ;
translated: The great seal, etc., and the rites.

original: 'dir ni ci dgar bzlas nas ni //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dir ni ci dgar bzlas nas ni // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Here, having recited as much as one wishes,

original: 'dir zhes bya ba rgyud 'dir ni bsgom pa gtso bo yin gyi grangs kyi bzlas pa gtso bor mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba rgyud 'dir ni bsgom pa gtso bo yin gyi grangs kyi bzlas pa gtso bor mi bya'o //
translated: Here, in this tantra, meditation is primary, not the recitation of a set number of mantras.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: rgyud 'dir ni bsgom pa gtso bor gyur pa yin gyi de bas na ji tsam 'dod pa tsam gyi sngags bzlas par bya'i grangs kyi bzlas pa ni mi bya'o //
analyzed: rgyud 'dir ni bsgom pa gtso bor gyur pa yin gyi de bas na ji tsam 'dod pa tsam gyi sngags bzlas par bya'i grangs kyi bzlas pa ni mi bya'o //
translated: In this tantra, meditation is primary. Therefore, one should recite the mantra as much as one wishes, but not recite a set number of mantras.

original: de ltar rang gi rgyud kyi cho ga gsungs nas /🔽snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams //
analyzed: de ltar rang gi rgyud kyi cho ga gsungs nas / snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams //
translated: Having taught the ritual of one's own tantra in this way,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas des 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams kyi phyir rgyud gzhan gyi cho ga yang gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas des 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams kyi phyir rgyud gzhan gyi cho ga yang gsungs pa yin te /
translated: the ritual of other tantras is taught for the sake of those to be tamed by that, with the words the essence, seal, mantra, and knowledge, etc.

original: de la snying po'i sgras ni rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i snying po rnams la bya bar bshad do //
analyzed: de la snying po'i sgras ni rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i snying po rnams la bya bar bshad do //
translated: The word essence is explained as referring to the essences taught in the great maṇḍala of all the families.

original: phyag rgya ni gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'o //
translated: The seals are those taught in the maṇḍala of form.

original: sngags ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa rnams so //🔽rig pa rnams ni rigs thams cad kyi las kyi @170a * //
analyzed: sngags ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa rnams so // rig pa rnams ni rigs thams cad kyi las kyi @170a * //
translated: The mantras are those taught in the maṇḍala of phenomena.

original: dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa las bya bar bshad do //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa las bya bar bshad do //
translated: The knowledge is explained as the activities taught in the maṇḍala of action of all the families.

original: de rnams kyang /
analyzed: de rnams kyang /
translated: And those are also

original: ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshul gyis ni //
translated: in whatever way one desires.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor dang / bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / gnyi ga'i rgyud la sogs pa'i cho ga'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor dang / bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / gnyi ga'i rgyud la sogs pa'i cho ga'i tshul gyis so //
translated: This means in the manner of the ritual of the yoga, kriyā, caryā, and both tantras, etc.

original: rtog pa las bshad pa ni rang gi lhas gsungs pa'i rtog pa la sogs pa dang / rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga de ni rtog pa las bshad pa ste /
analyzed: rtog pa las bshad pa ni rang gi lhas gsungs pa'i rtog pa la sogs pa dang / rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga de ni rtog pa las bshad pa ste /
translated: The taught in the tantra is the ritual of one's own deity taught in the tantra, etc., and the ritual of another tantra.

original: rtog pa las bshad pa des so //
analyzed: rtog pa las bshad pa des so //
translated: That is taught in the tantra.

original: rang byas pa'am zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang byas pa'am zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The made by oneself is

original: rang gi lhas rang gi bsgrub pa gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni rang byas pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rang gi lhas rang gi bsgrub pa gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni rang byas pa zhes bya ste /
translated: That which is taught by one's deity as one's practice is called one's own practice.

original: rang gis byas pa des kyang ngo //
analyzed: rang gis byas pa des kyang ngo //
translated: And by that which is one's own practice.

original: bsgrub pa 'dir ni thams cad do //
analyzed: bsgrub pa 'dir ni thams cad do //
translated: Here, all is practice.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means all that has been explained previously.

original: gsang ba'i mchod pa ni mchog pa gsang ba ste rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i mchod pa ni mchog pa gsang ba ste rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'o //
translated: Secret worship is the supreme secret, namely Vajra Lāsya and so forth.

original: brjod pa ni badzra l'a sye zhes bya ba la sogs pa zlos shing sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o //🔽rdo rje bstod pa ni rdo rje rnams kyi bstod pa yin pa'am /
analyzed: brjod pa ni badzra l'a sye zhes bya ba la sogs pa zlos shing sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o // rdo rje bstod pa ni rdo rje rnams kyi bstod pa yin pa'am /
translated: Worship with the mantra is the four secret worships of Lāsya and so forth, while reciting the mantra vajra lāsye and so forth.🔽Vajra praise is the praise of the vajras, or it is the song of vajra praise.

original: rdo rje bstod pa'i glu yin pas na rdo rje bstod pa'i glu ste /
analyzed: rdo rje bstod pa'i glu yin pas na rdo rje bstod pa'i glu ste /
translated: Therefore, it is the song of vajra praise.

original: de blangs pa ni glur len pa'o //
analyzed: de blangs pa ni glur len pa'o //
translated: Taking it up is singing it as a song.

original: 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'og nas bshad do //
analyzed: 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'og nas bshad do //
translated: By this is explained below.

original: aom rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas ni //
analyzed: aom rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas ni //
translated: Om, by gathering Vajrasattva,

original: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi sems dang mi bskyod pa'i rigs ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi sems dang mi bskyod pa'i rigs ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: The mind which has the characteristic of enlightenment and the family of Akṣhobhya is Vajrasattva.

original: de bsdus pa ni bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis nye bar blangs pa'o //
analyzed: de bsdus pa ni bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis nye bar blangs pa'o //
translated: Its inclusion is its appropriation by the power of meditation.

original: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
translated: The unsurpassed Vajraratna

original: ces bya ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de'i 'bras bu rin po che'i rigs ni rdo rje rin chen no ;
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de'i 'bras bu rin po che'i rigs ni rdo rje rin chen no ;
translated: The perfection of generosity and the family of the jewel which is its result is Vajraratna.

original: / de nyid bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: / de nyid bla na med pa'o //
translated: That itself is unsurpassed.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas ni //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas ni //
translated: by the inclusion of Vajrasattva,

original: zhes bya ba ni bskyod pa'i rigs rtogs pas na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bskyod pa'i rigs rtogs pas na /
translated: by the realization of the family of Akṣhobhya,

original: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
translated: the unsurpassed Vajraratna

original: ces bya ba nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas pa dang bral ba'i rin po che'i rigs dang mnyam par gyur cig ces rnal 'byor pa la gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas pa dang bral ba'i rin po che'i rigs dang mnyam par gyur cig ces rnal 'byor pa la gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
translated: is the jewel family which is equal to the separation from the afflictions together with their traces.

original: rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas //
analyzed: rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas //
translated: The vajra dharma is sung

original: zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo'i sems dang sems las byung ba dang padma'i rigs ni rdo rje chos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo'i sems dang sems las byung ba dang padma'i rigs ni rdo rje chos so //
translated: This is the nature of the perfection of wisdom, the mind and mental factors, and the lotus family, which is Vajradharma.

original: de glur blangs pa ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes so sor rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: de glur blangs pa ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes so sor rtogs pa ste /
translated: Its song is the realization that all phenomena are pure by nature.

original: @170b de yang gsal ba'i dbye bas rnam pa sna tshogs par so sor rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: @170b de yang gsal ba'i dbye bas rnam pa sna tshogs par so sor rtogs pa yin te /
translated: And that is realized in various ways by the division of the clear light.

original: de bas na glur blangs pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na glur blangs pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said to be a song.

original: de ltar gyur pas /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pas /
translated: Thus,

original: rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur //
translated: one becomes a vajra worker.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is said.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / las kyi rigs ni rdo rje ste /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / las kyi rigs ni rdo rje ste /
translated: The perfection of effort and the karma family are the vajra.

original: de la bod pa'o //
analyzed: de la bod pa'o //
translated: One is devoted to that.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang / 'gro ba'i don byed pa ni 'di las yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang / 'gro ba'i don byed pa ni 'di las yin te /
translated: The emanation of the buddhas and the performance of the welfare of the world is from this.

original: rdzogs par byed par 'gyur bas na /
analyzed: rdzogs par byed par 'gyur bas na /
translated: Since it is perfected,

original: rdo rje'i las ni byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje'i las ni byed par 'gyur //
translated: one becomes a vajra worker.

original: zhes gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
translated: This is the supplication.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught by this.

original: rdo rje gru len cing re re zhing rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las byung ba'i gar byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje gru len cing re re zhing rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las byung ba'i gar byas la /
translated: Taking the vajra and bell, and performing the dance that arises from the two vajra fists,

original: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la mchod pa bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la mchod pa bya'o //
translated: one should make offerings with the action seal of Vajra Lāsya and so forth.

original: de ltar gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhes phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: de ltar gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhes phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod la /
translated: Thus, having accepted the secret offering, one should make offerings to the outer and inner maṇḍala.

original: de bzhin du gar dang glu len cing gar las byung ba'i rdo rje bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bzhi dang ; phyi'i bdug pa la sogs pa lag pa gshibs pas blangs la /
analyzed: de bzhin du gar dang glu len cing gar las byung ba'i rdo rje bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bzhi dang ; phyi'i bdug pa la sogs pa lag pa gshibs pas blangs la /
translated: Similarly, singing songs and dancing, one should make offerings to the outer maṇḍala with the four action seals of Vajra Dhūpā and so forth that arise from the dance, and with the outer incense and so forth held in the folded hands.

original: nang gi dkyil 'khor yang dag mchod nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nang gi dkyil 'khor yang dag mchod nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Having made offerings to the inner maṇḍala, one should make offerings to the outer maṇḍala.

original: de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje bstod pa'i glu 'di nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so ;
analyzed: de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje bstod pa'i glu 'di nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so ;
translated: In order to demonstrate that, it is said, “Then, in the center of the maṇḍala, with this very song of praise of the vajra,” and so forth.

original: / mchod pa de dag rang rang gi gnas su gzhag go zhes bya ba ni sgeg mo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings na /
analyzed: / mchod pa de dag rang rang gi gnas su gzhag go zhes bya ba ni sgeg mo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings na /
translated: “One should place those offerings in their own places” means that if one binds the mudras of the goddesses such as Charm,

original: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i tshul du rnal 'byor pas bsgoms pa gang yin pa de /
analyzed: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i tshul du rnal 'byor pas bsgoms pa gang yin pa de /
translated: then the yogin who meditates in the manner of Charm and so forth

original: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gnas su yid kyis gzhag pa la gzhan gyis phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gnas su yid kyis gzhag pa la gzhan gyis phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
translated: should mentally place them in the places of Charm and so forth, and others should bind the mudras.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: de ltar slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas nas /
analyzed: de ltar slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas nas /
translated: Thus, the master having made offerings to all the Tathagatas of the mandala,

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad ci nus par mchod cig ces slob ma la bsgo ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad ci nus par mchod cig ces slob ma la bsgo ste /
translated: he should instruct the disciple, “Make offerings to all the mandalas as much as you can.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad la gsol zhing zhu bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad la gsol zhing zhu bar bya'o //
translated: He should request and petition all the Tathagata clans.

original: de nas mchod pa byed du bcug la /
analyzed: de nas mchod pa byed du bcug la /
translated: Then, having made offerings,

original: ji ltar zhugs pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba bsam pa gang zhig gis zhugs pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar zhugs pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba bsam pa gang zhig gis zhugs pa ste /
translated: “in whatever manner one has entered” means with whatever intention one has entered.

original: de rnams ci 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba ni rdzas ci yod pas so //
analyzed: de rnams ci 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba ni rdzas ci yod pas so //
translated: “Those, whatever they can afford” means with whatever wealth one has.

original: de nyid bshad pa ni ro dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /🔽de la ro @171a * //
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa ni ro dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te / de la ro @171a * //
translated: The explanation of that is “all tastes, etc.”

original: thams cad ni /
analyzed: thams cad ni /
translated: There, “all tastes”🔽are divided by the divisions of sweet, sour, salty, etc.

original: mngar ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshva ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba dang ldan pa'i kha zas ni ro dang kha zas thams cad do //
analyzed: mngar ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshva ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba dang ldan pa'i kha zas ni ro dang kha zas thams cad do //
translated: “Food” is endowed with that.

original: gnas pas na gnas pa ste /
analyzed: gnas pas na gnas pa ste /
translated: “Abiding” is abiding.

original: spyod lam gar la sogs pa'i tshul dang / glu ma la sogs pa yang gzung ngo //
analyzed: spyod lam gar la sogs pa'i tshul dang / glu ma la sogs pa yang gzung ngo //
translated: One should also take the mode of dance, etc., and the manner of song, etc.

original: ro dang kha zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa'i yo byad thams cad dkyil 'khor chen por dbul bar bya ste /
analyzed: ro dang kha zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa'i yo byad thams cad dkyil 'khor chen por dbul bar bya ste /
translated: One should offer all the articles of taste, food, conduct, etc., to the great maṇḍala.

original: de thams cad kyis ji ltar zhugs pa rnams mgu zhing tshim par bya'o //
analyzed: de thams cad kyis ji ltar zhugs pa rnams mgu zhing tshim par bya'o //
translated: One should please and satisfy all of them with that.

original: de ltar tshim par byas nas ci zhig bya zhe na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de ltar tshim par byas nas ci zhig bya zhe na / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Having satisfied them in that way, what should one do?🔽The Bhagavān says, “all tathāgatas,” etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub yin pas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub yin pas /
translated: Since it is the spiritual power of all tathāgatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub ste /
translated: The power of all the Tathagatas

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa grub pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa grub pa'o //
translated: is the achievement of the Great Seal, etc. , of Vairocana and the others up to Vajra Arapacana.

original: de'i don gyi rdo rje brtul zhugs ni nges par bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i don gyi rdo rje brtul zhugs ni nges par bya ba ste /
translated: The vajra vow of that meaning is to be ascertained,

original: rdo rje yongs su mi 'dor ba de sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje yongs su mi 'dor ba de sbyin par bya'o //
translated: and that vajra should not be abandoned, it should be given.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni rang gi lag na gnas par gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni rang gi lag na gnas par gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is said to be in one's own hand.

original: de zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni /
translated: That is

original: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
analyzed: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
translated: the vajra of the Thought of Enlightenment

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: that was taught by the Lord.

original: 'di ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is this?

original: sangs rgyas thams cad nyid ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad nyid ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The nature of all the Buddhas is taught.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na sangs rgyas nyid de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na sangs rgyas nyid de /
translated: Since it is the nature of all the Buddhas, it is Buddhahood.

original: rdo rje 'di ni sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rdo rje 'di ni sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This vajra is the nature of the five Buddhas.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug / khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug / khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
translated: It is in the hand of Vajrasattva, and you must always hold it.

original: zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje 'di rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug pa yin la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje 'di rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug pa yin la /
translated: This is because this vajra of all the Buddhas is in the hand of Vajrasattva.

original: de bas na de'i go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyis kyang rtag tu bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na de'i go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyis kyang rtag tu bcang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, in order to attain his state, you must always hold it.

original: 'di gang gi brtul zhugs yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di gang gi brtul zhugs yin zhe na /
translated: Whose observances are these?

original: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
translated: The observances of Vajrapāṇi are firm.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
translated: This is what is said.

original: 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs mi phyed cing brtan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs mi phyed cing brtan pa yin no //
translated: These are the firm, indivisible observances of Vajrapāṇi.

original: de nas slob mas rang gi mgor rdo rje bzhag la /
analyzed: de nas slob mas rang gi mgor rdo rje bzhag la /
translated: Then, the disciple should place the vajra on his head,

original: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
translated: and recite the mantra beginning “Oṃ, all tathāgatas…” and so forth.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab la zhes bya ba ni bcom @171b ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag ni so so'i skye bor gyur pas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab la zhes bya ba ni bcom @171b ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag ni so so'i skye bor gyur pas /
translated: Having supplicated all the Tathagatas, one should say, Bhagavat, all Tathagatas, I am an ordinary person.

original: cho ga lhag pa dang ma tshang ba gang ci bgyis pa de dag thams cad bdag la bzod par mdzod cig ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: cho ga lhag pa dang ma tshang ba gang ci bgyis pa de dag thams cad bdag la bzod par mdzod cig ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Please forgive all the omissions and additions I have made to the rite.

original: de ltar gsol ba btab ste /
analyzed: de ltar gsol ba btab ste /
translated: Having thus supplicated,

original: sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas kha gyen du bstan te bkrol la /
analyzed: sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas kha gyen du bstan te bkrol la /
translated: one should form the Seal of Cittavajri, open it upward, and release it.

original: aom khyed kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: aom khyed kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should also say Om, you have performed all the aims of sentient beings, and so forth.

original: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //🔽ces bya ba ni khyed kyis sems can gyi don skal ba ji lta ba bzhin mdzad pas na /
analyzed: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad // ces bya ba ni khyed kyis sems can gyi don skal ba ji lta ba bzhin mdzad pas na /
translated: Om, you have performed all the aims of sentient beings,🔽You have performed the aims of sentient beings according to their fortune,

original: sems can don kun mdzad de /
analyzed: sems can don kun mdzad de /
translated: means that you have performed all the aims of sentient beings,

original: bag chags bsgo ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: bag chags bsgo ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: with the characteristic of implanting propensities and so forth.

original: rjes su mthun par dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: rjes su mthun par dngos grub stsol //
translated: Grant the spiritual powers in accordance with the pledge.

original: zhes bya ba ni bag chags ji ltar bsgo ba'i tshul dang mthun pa ni rjes su mthun pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bag chags ji ltar bsgo ba'i tshul dang mthun pa ni rjes su mthun pa ste /
translated: This is the concordance with the imprints, which is in accordance with the way the imprints are set.

original: gang gi phyir skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du bag chags bsgo ba la sogs pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsal ba 'dis //
analyzed: gang gi phyir skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du bag chags bsgo ba la sogs pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsal ba 'dis //
translated: Because of this, the bestowal of the powers that are concordant with the imprints, etc.,

original: khyed kyis sems can gyi don kun mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: khyed kyis sems can gyi don kun mdzad pa'o //
translated: you have done all that is to be done for the benefit of sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas yul du bzhud par mdzod //🔽ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas yul du bzhud par mdzod // ces bya ba ni /
translated: Go to the realm of the Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul te /
translated: The realm of the Buddhas is the realm of the Buddhas.

original: sems can gyi don dang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: sems can gyi don dang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: It is the benefit of sentient beings and the ultimate realm.

original: de nas slar yang gshegs par gsol //
analyzed: de nas slar yang gshegs par gsol //
translated: Then, again, request them to come.

original: zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe bdag spyan 'dren par bgyid pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe bdag spyan 'dren par bgyid pa de'i tshe /
translated: When I invite you, then

original: khyed gshegs par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o //
analyzed: khyed gshegs par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o //
translated: please come.🔽This is to be done for all the mandalas, beginning with the retention

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad la bya'o zhes bya ba ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad la bya'o zhes bya ba ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te /
translated: mandala.

original: rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga 'di thams cad bya'o //
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga 'di thams cad bya'o //
translated: In the maṇḍala of all the families, one should perform all the rites as taught.

original: dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams so //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams so //
translated: The supreme pledge seal is the seals of Vairocana and so forth.

original: de rnams bcings par gyur pa las dgrol bar bya ste /
analyzed: de rnams bcings par gyur pa las dgrol bar bya ste /
translated: Having formed them, one should release them.

original: phyag rgya thams cad gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nas dgrol lo zhes sngar bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya thams cad gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nas dgrol lo zhes sngar bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: One should release all the seals from wherever they arose, as previously explained.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is taught.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du //
translated: In the very center of the maṇḍala,

original: ci rigs par ni mchis nas kyang //
analyzed: ci rigs par ni mchis nas kyang //
translated: having entered as appropriate,

original: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: starting from here,

original: dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyogs su ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyogs su ni //
translated: in the outer directions of the maṇḍala,

original: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag / ces @172a * //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag / ces @172a * //
translated: one should also place the great beings.

original: bya ba'i bar 'dis dkyil 'khor dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / bsrung ba dang / dgug pa dang / bzlas pa dang / bsgom pa dang / sbyin sreg gi de kho na nyid bstan pa las /
analyzed: bya ba'i bar 'dis dkyil 'khor dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / bsrung ba dang / dgug pa dang / bzlas pa dang / bsgom pa dang / sbyin sreg gi de kho na nyid bstan pa las /
translated: This section teaches the reality of the maṇḍala, mantra, seal, protection, summoning, recitation, meditation, and fire sacrifice.

original: gang gi phyir dkyil 'khor gzugs can dang gzugs can ma yin pa 'dir bstan la ;
analyzed: gang gi phyir dkyil 'khor gzugs can dang gzugs can ma yin pa 'dir bstan la ;
translated: Here, the maṇḍala is taught to be both physical and non-physical.

original: sngags kyi de kho na nyid ni rgyud phyi ma las ston to //
analyzed: sngags kyi de kho na nyid ni rgyud phyi ma las ston to //
translated: The reality of mantra is taught in the Continuation of the Guhyasamāja Tantra.

original: de ma tshig gsum sgom par byed pa na lha rnams phyag rgya bzhis nges par rgyas gdab par bya ba ni phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de ma tshig gsum sgom par byed pa na lha rnams phyag rgya bzhis nges par rgyas gdab par bya ba ni phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid do //
translated: When meditating on the three seed syllables, the deities should be sealed with the four seals, which is the reality of the seals.

original: bdag bsrung ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: bdag bsrung ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: Self-protection and so forth

original: bsrung ba'i de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: bsrung ba'i de kho na nyid do //
translated: is the reality of protection.

original: bsdu ba la sogs pa ni sngar spyan drangs pa'i de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: bsdu ba la sogs pa ni sngar spyan drangs pa'i de kho na nyid do //
translated: Summoning and so forth is the reality of previously inviting.

original: bzlas pa dang bsgom pa ni sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs pa thams cad bya ba yin pas na /
analyzed: bzlas pa dang bsgom pa ni sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs pa thams cad bya ba yin pas na /
translated: Recitation and meditation are all to be done prior to the approach and so forth,

original: de dag gi de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de dag gi de kho na nyid do //
translated: so they are the reality of those.

original: dkyil 'khor la sogs par sbyin sreg bya ba ni /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor la sogs par sbyin sreg bya ba ni /
translated: The performance of the fire sacrifice in the maṇḍala, etc.

original: sbyin sreg gi de kho na nyid yin par bstan to //
analyzed: sbyin sreg gi de kho na nyid yin par bstan to //
translated: is taught to be the reality of the fire sacrifice.

original: de nas phyag rgya thams cad dgrol pa'i spyi'i cho ga rgyas par bshad do zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya thams cad dgrol pa'i spyi'i cho ga rgyas par bshad do zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Then, the general rite of releasing all the seals is explained in detail, beginning with:

original: phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin //
translated: As taught by Vajrapāṇi,

original: zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis ni /
translated: and ending with:

original: phyag rgya thams cad nye bar bsdus pa'i de kho na nyid ston to //
analyzed: phyag rgya thams cad nye bar bsdus pa'i de kho na nyid ston to //
translated: The reality of gathering all the seals is taught.

original: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod cing /
analyzed: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod cing /
translated: Then, having expressed the secret worship,

original: rdo rje bstod pa'i glu blangs te /
analyzed: rdo rje bstod pa'i glu blangs te /
translated: and having sung the vajra praise song,

original: gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o //
translated: one should perform the four secret worships.

original: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: Beginning from there,🔽and ending with: Having caused the worship with incense, etc.,

original: bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa byed du bcug la zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab la zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa byed du bcug la zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab la zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: and similarly, beginning from: Having made a request to all the tathāgatas,

original: badzra sa tva mu: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis ni /
analyzed: badzra sa tva mu: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis ni /
translated: and ending with: vajrasatva muḥ,🔽the reality of the secret worship is taught.

original: mchod nas gshegs su gsol ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi de kho na nyid ston to //
analyzed: mchod nas gshegs su gsol ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi de kho na nyid ston to //
translated: Having worshipped, one should request the departure of the deities.

original: gzhan dag ni de kho na nyid dgu po 'di dag gi yul dang bral ba'i gzhung gis cho ga'i de kho na nyid ston pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni de kho na nyid dgu po 'di dag gi yul dang bral ba'i gzhung gis cho ga'i de kho na nyid ston pa yin no //
translated: Others, by means of the scriptural passages free from the domain of these nine realities, teach the reality of the rite.

original: la la ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi ro bo de kho na nyid sum cu rtsa bdun ni de kho na nyid bcu dang tha dad par 'dod do //
analyzed: la la ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi ro bo de kho na nyid sum cu rtsa bdun ni de kho na nyid bcu dang tha dad par 'dod do //
translated: Some assert that the thirty-seven realities, from Vairochana up to Vajravesa, are different from the ten realities.

original: kha cig ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: kha cig ni mi rigs te /
translated: Some are incorrect,

original: gang gi phyir 'di dag kyang phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i tshul gyis na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di dag kyang phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i tshul gyis na /
translated: because these are also included in the great seal, etc.,

original: phyag rgya chen po'i khongs su gtogs pa yin pas logs shig tu ma bzhag go zhes @172b zer ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i khongs su gtogs pa yin pas logs shig tu ma bzhag go zhes @172b zer ro //
translated: and are not set forth separately by means of the method of the great seal, etc.

original: yang de kho na nyid bcu po 'di dag 'bras bu dang rgyu dang / don dam pa'i de kho na nyid kyi dbye bas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang de kho na nyid bcu po 'di dag 'bras bu dang rgyu dang / don dam pa'i de kho na nyid kyi dbye bas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, these ten realities are threefold, by way of the categories of result, cause, and ultimate reality.

original: de la don gyi dngos grub la sogs pa ni 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de la don gyi dngos grub la sogs pa ni 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid do //
translated: The accomplishment of the goal, etc. is the reality of the result.

original: de thob pa'i thabs ni rgyu'i de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de thob pa'i thabs ni rgyu'i de kho na nyid do //
translated: The means of attaining that is the reality of the cause.

original: don dam par rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na /
analyzed: don dam par rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na /
translated: Since ultimately there is no reality of cause and effect,

original: don dam pa'i de kho na nyid yin par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa'i de kho na nyid yin par bshad pa yin no //
translated: it is explained as the ultimate reality.

original: yang na shes rab dang thabs kyi dbye bas de kho na nyid rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na shes rab dang thabs kyi dbye bas de kho na nyid rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: Or else, reality is twofold, divided into wisdom and method.

original: don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi de kho na nyid do //
translated: There is the ultimate reality and the conventional reality.

original: de la de kho na nyid bcu po 'di dag don dam par bsgom pa yin pas na don dam pa'i de kho na nyid du gsungs pa yin la /
analyzed: de la de kho na nyid bcu po 'di dag don dam par bsgom pa yin pas na don dam pa'i de kho na nyid du gsungs pa yin la /
translated: Since these ten realities are cultivated ultimately, they are said to be the ultimate reality.

original: kun rdzob tu yang ji skad du gsungs pa'i dbye bas phye ba 'di dag yod pa nyid de /
analyzed: kun rdzob tu yang ji skad du gsungs pa'i dbye bas phye ba 'di dag yod pa nyid de /
translated: And since these divisions as they are described exist conventionally,

original: de bas na kun rdzob kyi de kho na nyid du gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na kun rdzob kyi de kho na nyid du gsungs pa yin no //
translated: they are said to be the conventional reality.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir de kho na nyid ji ltar bstan par byas pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir de kho na nyid ji ltar bstan par byas pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as reality is taught in this great mandala of the vajra realm,

original: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te rigs thams cad la yang shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te rigs thams cad la yang shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: so it should be understood in all the families, beginning with the retention mandala.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po ni rnam par snang mdzad dang / rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po ni rnam par snang mdzad dang / rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The Great Vehicle of all the Tathāgatas is the characteristic of Vairocana and Mahāvairocana.

original: de mngon par rtogs pa ni khong du chud cing mngon sum du byas pa'i don to //
analyzed: de mngon par rtogs pa ni khong du chud cing mngon sum du byas pa'i don to //
translated: Its realization is the meaning of comprehension and actualization.

original: de las rtog pa gang skye ba de ni rtog pa ste /
analyzed: de las rtog pa gang skye ba de ni rtog pa ste /
translated: From that, whatever conception arises is a conception.

original: 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po'i zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po'i zhes bya ba nas /
translated: This is the great seal of Vairocana, up to

original: 'di ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: this is the great seal of Vajra-Adhiṣṭhāna, and so on.

original: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa brtag pa'i tshul de nyid kyis gzhan du rtog pa zil gyis mnan nas /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa brtag pa'i tshul de nyid kyis gzhan du rtog pa zil gyis mnan nas /
translated: By the method of conceiving the great seal and so on, other conceptions are overwhelmed.

original: mdzes shing 'bar ba ni rtog pa'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: mdzes shing 'bar ba ni rtog pa'i rgyal po'o //
translated: The beautiful blazing one is the king of contemplations.

original: rtog pa'i rgyal po de las rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so zhes bya ba ni mthar thug pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rtog pa'i rgyal po de las rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so zhes bya ba ni mthar thug pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: From that king of contemplations, the ritual of the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm is completed in an extensive way, is the finality itself, is the meaning of the conclusion.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam par 'grel pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam par 'grel pa rdzogs so /
translated: The commentary on the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm is complete.

original: // / de ltar phyag rgya chen po gtso bor gyur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bstan nas /🔽da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po gtso bor gyur pa gzugs kyi dkyil @173a * //
analyzed: // / de ltar phyag rgya chen po gtso bor gyur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bstan nas / da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po gtso bor gyur pa gzugs kyi dkyil @173a * //
translated: Having thus taught the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm, which is primarily the great seal,

original: 'khor ston par bzhed pas /
analyzed: 'khor ston par bzhed pas /
translated: now, in order to teach the maṇḍala of form, which is primarily the great pledge seal,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares “thereupon,” and so on.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa'i sgra ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa'i sgra ste /
translated: Thereupon is a term for immediately after,

original: dang po sbyor ba'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: dang po sbyor ba'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: immediately after the first union.

original: 'dir dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Here, the first, the samādhi of application, is the emanation of Vajrasattva and so forth, as taught in the Great Mandala of the Vajra Realm.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar ro //
translated: All Ones Gone Thus are Vairocana and so forth up to Vajra Acalanātha.

original: de rnams kyi gnyis su med pa'i dran pa dang shes rab dang yang dag par ldan pa'i thugs ni rdo rje'i gzugs so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gnyis su med pa'i dran pa dang shes rab dang yang dag par ldan pa'i thugs ni rdo rje'i gzugs so //
translated: Their nondual mind endowed with mindfulness and wisdom is the vajra form.

original: de'i dam tshig ni rdo rje'i gzugs kyi lha mo la sogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni rdo rje'i gzugs kyi lha mo la sogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: Its commitment is the form of the goddess Vajrarupa and so forth.

original: de'i 'byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar gnas pa'i sems dpa' rdo rje las byung ba gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzugs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de'i 'byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar gnas pa'i sems dpa' rdo rje las byung ba gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzugs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje'o //
translated: The emergence of that is the vajra of the emergence of the commitment of the vajra form of all Ones Gone Thus, which is the emergence from the mind of Vajrasattva abiding in the heart of all Ones Gone Thus.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la yang ming de skad ces bya ste /
