analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la yang ming de skad ces bya ste /
translated: The samadhi that focuses on that is also called by that name.

original: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni /
translated: The one who enters into that samadhi

original: gzugs kyi lha mo sprul pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gzugs kyi lha mo sprul pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: is the one who is single-pointedly focused on the emanation of the form of a goddess.

original: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid ces bya ba ni /
translated: The Bhagavat Vajrapani

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas pa'i sems dpa' rdo rje'i gzugs kyis ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas pa'i sems dpa' rdo rje'i gzugs kyis ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: is the one who abides in the mind of all tathagatas, and the one who, in the form of a sattva-vajra, proclaims this proclamation.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar la bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar la bya ste /
translated: Vajradhara here refers to Vajrasattva and so on up to Vajrapani.

original: de rnams kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: He is called Vajradhara because he possesses the nature of holding the forms of those.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only does he hold the form of Vajradhara,

original: kun du 'bar pa'i snying po yang yin te /
analyzed: kun du 'bar pa'i snying po yang yin te /
translated: he also has the essence of blazing.

original: kun nas 'bar ba'i snying por byas pa ni kun du 'bar ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: kun nas 'bar ba'i snying por byas pa ni kun du 'bar ba'i snying po'o //
translated: The heart of the blazing fire is the blazing heart.

original: de lta bu de su zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bu de su zhig yin zhe na /
translated: Who is that?

original: rdo rje gzugs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje gzugs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The Vajra Form pledge goddesses, etc.

original: rdo rje'i gzugs ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: rdo rje'i gzugs ni bshad zin to //
translated: Vajra form has been explained.

original: de rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje rtse lnga pa la sogs pa nas rdo rje dril bu'i bar gyi gzugs te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje rtse lnga pa la sogs pa nas rdo rje dril bu'i bar gyi gzugs te /
translated: The pledge seal of those is the form of the five-tined vajra, etc., up to the vajra bell.

original: des nye bar mtshon pa'i lha mo rnams ni /🔽rdo rje gzugs kyi dam tshig gi phyag @173b rgya'i lha mo rnams so //
analyzed: des nye bar mtshon pa'i lha mo rnams ni / rdo rje gzugs kyi dam tshig gi phyag @173b rgya'i lha mo rnams so //
translated: The goddesses illustrated by that🔽are the Vajra Form pledge goddesses, etc.

original: de rnams su gyur pa ni kun du bzang po la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi gzugs rig pa'i lha mo rnams su gyur to zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de rnams su gyur pa ni kun du bzang po la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi gzugs rig pa'i lha mo rnams su gyur to zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: They become those, i.e., the goddesses of awareness become the forms of Samantabhadra, etc., up to Vajra Acalanatha.

original: de lta bu'i rdo rje'i gzugs kyi lha mo dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ste /
analyzed: de lta bu'i rdo rje'i gzugs kyi lha mo dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ste /
translated: Those vajra-form goddesses become the pledge goddesses, and emerge from the hearts of all the Tathagatas.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni spros pa ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni spros pa ston pa'o //
translated: The phrase in all world-realms and so forth shows the emanation.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sangs rgyas rnams kyi gdul bya de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can gyi sems can gang yin pa de rnams kyi ye shes bsgrubs te zhes bya bar sbyar te /🔽rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzugs ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sangs rgyas rnams kyi gdul bya de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can gyi sems can gang yin pa de rnams kyi ye shes bsgrubs te zhes bya bar sbyar te / rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzugs ni /
translated: The phrase having accomplished the gnosis of all those sentient beings in all world-realms who are vessels of the Buddhas, who are endowed with the essence of the Tathagatas is to be supplied.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzugs so //
translated: The vajra-form of Vairochana and so forth is the vajra-form of all the Tathagatas.

original: de nyid ni ye shes te /
analyzed: de nyid ni ye shes te /
translated: That is the gnosis.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i dran pa dang / shes rab dang / yang dag par ldan pa'i thugs so //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i dran pa dang / shes rab dang / yang dag par ldan pa'i thugs so //
translated: It is the mind endowed with the mindfulness, the wisdom, and the right concentration as explained above.

original: de bsgrub pa ni gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la rdo rje gzungs kyi ye shes bskyed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bsgrub pa ni gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la rdo rje gzungs kyi ye shes bskyed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “accomplishing” is “generating the gnosis of the vajra retention in the mindstreams of the disciples.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshig gi phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshig gi phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Having become the form of the word-vajra of all the tathāgatas,

original: kun du bzang mo la sogs pa'i lha mo'i gzugs mi snang bar byas nas rdo rje la sogs pa'i gzugs su sprul te /
analyzed: kun du bzang mo la sogs pa'i lha mo'i gzugs mi snang bar byas nas rdo rje la sogs pa'i gzugs su sprul te /
translated: having disappeared in the form of the goddesses such as Samantabhadrī, having emanated in the form of the vajra and so forth,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ji skad bshad pa'i bkod pa'i tshul gyi rim pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la bkod de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ji skad bshad pa'i bkod pa'i tshul gyi rim pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la bkod de /
translated: having arranged on the moon-discs the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm, in the manner of the arrangement of all the tathāgatas, in the manner of the arrangement as previously explained,

original: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
analyzed: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
translated: he uttered this utterance of exultation:

original: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o //
translated: “Amazing!” is a sense of wonder.

original: byang chub sems dpa'/
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'/
translated: The bodhisattvas

original: sems can kun la phan bzhed pa //
analyzed: sems can kun la phan bzhed pa //
translated: who wish to benefit all sentient beings

original: zhes bya ba ni phan par bzhed pa nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phan par bzhed pa nyid do //
translated: are those who wish to benefit.

original: ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na /
translated: What is so amazing?

original: 'dul ba'i dbang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dul ba'i dbang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The phrase due to the power of discipline and so forth.

original: gang gi phyir 'dul ba'i dbang gis te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dul ba'i dbang gis te /
translated: Because of the power of discipline,

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang gis dpa' bo zhes bya ba /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang gis dpa' bo zhes bya ba /
translated: that is, due to the power of bringing sentient beings to maturity, the hero,

original: nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas pa spangs pa nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyis mi bskyod pa yin na /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas pa spangs pa nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyis mi bskyod pa yin na /
translated: who has abandoned afflictions along with their imprints, who is unshaken by any conceptualization,

original: bud med gzugs su mdzad par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba de @174a * //
analyzed: bud med gzugs su mdzad par 'gyur // zhes bya ba de @174a * //
translated: manifests in the form of a woman.

original: don yod pa ma yin zhing nyon mongs pa spangs su zin kyang /
analyzed: don yod pa ma yin zhing nyon mongs pa spangs su zin kyang /
translated: This is not meaningless, and even though afflictions have been abandoned,

original: 'di lta bu mdzad pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: 'di lta bu mdzad pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: this activity is amazing.

original: de ltar gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul nas /
analyzed: de ltar gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul nas /
translated: Having emanated the dhāraṇī maṇḍala,🔽then, as indicated by the phrase then, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzungs kyi rig pa gsungs par ston to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzungs kyi rig pa gsungs par ston to //
translated: , the dhāraṇī knowledge is taught.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje sems ma dang / rin chen ma dang / chos ma dang / las ma rnams kyi ji skad du bshad pa'i gzungs rnams ni ye shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje sems ma dang / rin chen ma dang / chos ma dang / las ma rnams kyi ji skad du bshad pa'i gzungs rnams ni ye shes so //
translated: The dharais of the above-mentioned goddesses are their gnoses.

original: de rnams las byung nas kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de rnams las byung nas kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phyag rgya'o //
translated: The mudras are the goddesses who arise from those gnoses, and so forth.

original: de'i dam tshig ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The commitment is the mandala of Vajradhatvi-svarl.

original: de nyid ni rdo rje dbyings so //
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje dbyings so //
translated: That itself is the vajra realm.

original: de'i ting nge 'dzin gang gis byin gyis rlob cing brtan par byed pa de ni byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni /
analyzed: de'i ting nge 'dzin gang gis byin gyis rlob cing brtan par byed pa de ni byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni /
translated: The samadhi by which one blesses and stabilizes that is called the samadhi of blessing.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of entering that samadhi is that the Bhagavat focused his mind one-pointedly on stabilizing the mandala of Vajradhatvi-svarl.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la /
translated: All the Tathagatas are the five Tathagatas.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' yang yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' yang yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: and also Vajrasattva, is the Vajrasattva of all the Tathagatas.

original: mi bskyod pa dang de'i rigs rnams so //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa dang de'i rigs rnams so //
translated: It is Akshobhya and those of his clan.

original: de rnams kyi dam tshig gi ye shes ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bskyed pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dam tshig gi ye shes ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bskyed pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: The knowledge of their commitments is the nature of the generation of the seals of the clan of Akshobhya.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i gzungs ni ye shes so //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i gzungs ni ye shes so //
translated: The dhâranî as explained is knowledge.

original: de rnams las skyes pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa la sogs pa'i gzugs ni phyag rgya yin pas de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams las skyes pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa la sogs pa'i gzugs ni phyag rgya yin pas de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The form of the five-tined vajra, etc. , generated from those is a seal, and so it is called that.

original: de'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro ;
analyzed: de'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro ;
translated: Its mandala is the mandala of vajra mind.

original: / de gang byin gyis rlob pa de ni byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: / de gang byin gyis rlob pa de ni byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: That which consecrates it is called the consecration samâdhi.

original: de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni rdo rje thugs kyi dkyil 'khor brtan par byed pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni rdo rje thugs kyi dkyil 'khor brtan par byed pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: He entered into that samâdhi, and by doing so, he made his mind one-pointed in order to stabilize the mandala of vajra mind.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la rdo rje rin po che yang yin pas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la rdo rje rin po che yang yin pas /
translated: Since he is all the Tathagatas and also the vajra gem,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che ste /
translated: he is the gem of all the Tathagatas.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa'i rigs rnams so //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa'i rigs rnams so //
translated: The families of Ratnasaṃbhava and so forth are the gems.

original: de'i dam tshig ni ye shes te rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs bskyed pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni ye shes te rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs bskyed pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: His pledge is intuition, the cause of generating the family of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i gzungs ni ye shes so //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i gzungs ni ye shes so //
translated: The dhāraṇī as explained is intuition.

original: de las @174b byung ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de las @174b byung ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The vajra gem seal that arises from that is the seal of intuition of the pledge of the vajra gem of all the Tathāgatas.

original: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni rang gi dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni rang gi dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Their maṇḍala is the maṇḍala of one’s own consecration.

original: de gang gi byin gyis brlab pa ni de byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: de gang gi byin gyis brlab pa ni de byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: That which consecrates it is the meditative stabilization consecrating it.

original: de la snyoms par zhugs pa rang gi dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor brtan par bya ba'i phyir thugs rtse gcig tu mdzod ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de la snyoms par zhugs pa rang gi dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor brtan par bya ba'i phyir thugs rtse gcig tu mdzod ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: In that, enter into meditative concentration, and for the sake of stabilizing the mandala of your own consecration, focus your mind one-pointedly.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos ni 'od dpag tu med pa la sogs pa'i rigs rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos ni 'od dpag tu med pa la sogs pa'i rigs rnams so //
translated: The vajra Dharma of all the Ones-Gone-Thus is the families of Amitābha and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi dam tshig gi ye shes ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dam tshig gi ye shes ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: Their pledge wisdom should be understood as before.

original: de rnams las byung ba'i rdo rje padma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //

translated: The seals of vajra lotus and so forth that arise from them are the pledge seal of the vajra Dharma of all the Ones-Gone-Thus.

analyzed: de rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do //
translated: The four pledge seals of those are explained.

original: kun du bzang mo zhes bya ba ni kun nas bzang ba ste /
analyzed: kun du bzang mo zhes bya ba ni kun nas bzang ba ste /
translated: Samantabhadrī is all good,

original: byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi thugs kyi tshul gyis sam /
analyzed: byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi thugs kyi tshul gyis sam /
translated: because of the mode of the mind having the character of enlightenment,

original: de'i rgyu mthun pa las byung bas so //
analyzed: de'i rgyu mthun pa las byung bas so //
translated: or because of being arisen from the concordant cause of that.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyu nyid @175a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyu nyid @175a * //
translated: Because of being the cause of the gathering of all the transcendent lords,

original: kyis na / de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu ma'o //
analyzed: kyis na / de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu ma'o //
translated: she is the iron hook of the transcendent lords.

original: dga' ba ni mgu ba ste byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis byang chub kyi sems kyi dga' ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni mgu ba ste byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis byang chub kyi sems kyi dga' ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: Delight is joy, and the delight of the spirit of enlightenment is any joy of the spirit of enlightenment that arises through the power of cultivating the spirit of enlightenment.

original: de'i chags pa ni dga' ba la chags pa ste shin tu zhen pa yin la /🔽de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'am /
analyzed: de'i chags pa ni dga' ba la chags pa ste shin tu zhen pa yin la / de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'am /
translated: Attachment to that is attachment to delight, which is strong clinging.🔽Because of being the essence of that

original: de las byung ba nyid kyis na /
analyzed: de las byung ba nyid kyis na /
translated: or because of being arisen from that,

original: de la yang dga' ba la chags pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de la yang dga' ba la chags pa zhes bya'o //
translated: she is also called “attachment to delight.”🔽Because of being the excellence having the character of the practice of perfect enlightenment,

original: rdzogs pa'i byang chub la spyod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi legs nyid yin pas sam /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub la spyod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi legs nyid yin pas sam /
translated: It is the best because it has the characteristic of engaging in perfect enlightenment.

original: de'i rgyu mthun pa las byung bas legs ldan ma'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu mthun pa las byung bas legs ldan ma'o //
translated: It is the Mahālakṣmī, because it arises from the cause of that.

original: byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi sems las byung ba yin pas na 'di dag ni gzungs chen mo rnams so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi sems las byung ba yin pas na 'di dag ni gzungs chen mo rnams so //
translated: They are the great dhāraṇīs, because they arise from the mind that has the characteristic of enlightenment.

original: nor gyi sbyin pa ni rin po che'o //
analyzed: nor gyi sbyin pa ni rin po che'o //
translated: The gift of wealth is the ratna.

original: des mchog tu gyur pas na rin po che'o //
analyzed: des mchog tu gyur pas na rin po che'o //
translated: It is the mahāratna, because it is supreme.

original: de nyid ni 'jigs pa'i mun pa sel ba nyid kyis sgron ma dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'jigs pa'i mun pa sel ba nyid kyis sgron ma dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the ratna-pradīpa, because it is similar to a lamp, by virtue of dispelling the darkness of fear.

original: de las byung zhing de'i rgyu mthun pa yin pas na rin po che'i sgron ma'o //
analyzed: de las byung zhing de'i rgyu mthun pa yin pas na rin po che'i sgron ma'o //
translated: It is the ratna-pradīpa, because it arises from that and is the cause of that.

original: byams pa'i sbyin pa ston par byed pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya ni rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'o //
analyzed: byams pa'i sbyin pa ston par byed pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya ni rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'o //
translated: The banner-mudrā that teaches the gift of love is the dhvaja.

original: de'i dpung rgyan gyis nye bar mtshon pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ma'o//
analyzed: de'i dpung rgyan gyis nye bar mtshon pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ma'o//
translated: The one who is characterized by that armlet is the Dhvaja-maṇḍitā.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sbyin pa ston par byed pa'i cung zad 'dzum pa ni bzhad pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sbyin pa ston par byed pa'i cung zad 'dzum pa ni bzhad pa ste /
translated: The slight smile that teaches the gift of Dharma of all the tathāgatas is the hāsa.

original: de 'di la mnga' bas na bzhad pa dang ldan ma'o //
analyzed: de 'di la mnga' bas na bzhad pa dang ldan ma'o //
translated: She is the one who has the laughter, because she has that.

original: nor dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / byams pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa'i rin po che ni rin po che'o //
analyzed: nor dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / byams pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa'i rin po che ni rin po che'o //
translated: The jewel is the gift of wealth, fearlessness, love, and the gift of Dharma.

original: de ston par byed pa dag la yang rin po che'i gzungs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa dag la yang rin po che'i gzungs zhes bya'o //
translated: The dhāraṇī that teaches that is called the jewel dhāraṇī.

original: rdo rje padmo ni chu skyes kyi mtshan ma gang la mnga' ba de ni rdo rje padma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje padmo ni chu skyes kyi mtshan ma gang la mnga' ba de ni rdo rje padma'o //
translated: The vajra lotus is the sign of the lotus that she has.

original: kun nas 'dzin cing de bzhin du nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa 'joms par byed pa'i gzungs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin kun du 'dzin pas na kun 'dzin ma'o //
analyzed: kun nas 'dzin cing de bzhin du nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa 'joms par byed pa'i gzungs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin kun du 'dzin pas na kun 'dzin ma'o //
translated: She is the one who holds the vajra lotus. She is the one who holds the dhāraṇī that destroys the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience, and that holds the nature of the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'khor lo thams cad ni dkyil 'khor thams cad de /
analyzed: 'khor lo thams cad ni dkyil 'khor thams cad de /
translated: All the wheels are all the maṇḍalas.

original: de gang la mnga' ba de ni 'khor lo thams cad ma'o //
analyzed: de gang la mnga' ba de ni 'khor lo thams cad ma'o //
translated: She is the one who has all the wheels.

original: chos thams cad ni ngag gi spros pa dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni ngag gi spros pa dang bral ba ste /
translated: All phenomena are free from the proliferation of speech.

original: brag ca dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i sgra rnams stong du zlos shing mngon du byed pa gang yin pa @175b de ni stong du zlos ma'o //
analyzed: brag ca dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i sgra rnams stong du zlos shing mngon du byed pa gang yin pa @175b de ni stong du zlos ma'o //
translated: The one who repeats the sound of the words “like an echo” is the one who repeats the sound.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin de las byung ba'i gzungs ni chos kyi gzungs rnams so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin de las byung ba'i gzungs ni chos kyi gzungs rnams so //
translated: The dhāraṇī of the Dharma that arises from the nature of the perfection of wisdom is the dhāraṇī of the Dharma.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang sems can gyi bya ba rnams 'grub pa'i mchog yin pas na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang sems can gyi bya ba rnams 'grub pa'i mchog yin pas na /
translated: Since it is the supreme accomplishment of the activities of the emanations of the buddhas and sentient beings,

original: dngos grub kyi gtso mo'o //
analyzed: dngos grub kyi gtso mo'o //
translated: it is the chief of accomplishments.

original: sangs rgyas nyid 'dod pa thams cad la phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bsrung ba'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid 'dod pa thams cad la phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bsrung ba'am /
translated: Since it is the protection by the irreversible effort of all those who desire buddhahood,

original: de'i gzugs kyis bsrung bas na thams cad srung ba ma'o //
analyzed: de'i gzugs kyis bsrung bas na thams cad srung ba ma'o //
translated: or since it is the protection by its form, it is the protector of all.

original: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad la re re zhing drag po'i gzugs bstan nas mdangs dang gzi brjid 'phrog par mdzad pas na mdangs slar 'phrog ma'o //
analyzed: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad la re re zhing drag po'i gzugs bstan nas mdangs dang gzi brjid 'phrog par mdzad pas na mdangs slar 'phrog ma'o //
translated: Since it takes on the form of a fierce one for each of the obstructors and misleaders and robs them of their splendor and brilliance, it is the one who robs splendor.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi khu tshur gyis gzungs thams cad rgyas 'debs pas na gzungs kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi khu tshur gyis gzungs thams cad rgyas 'debs pas na gzungs kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The mudra of retention is so called because the mudra of retention seals all retention by the fist of suchness.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa rdzogs par byed pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad du khyab pa nyid kyis ni thams cad ces bya ba la /🔽de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa rdzogs par byed pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad du khyab pa nyid kyis ni thams cad ces bya ba la / de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa'am /
translated: The mudra of all is so called because the perfection of effort pervades all sentient beings by perfecting the mind of enlightenment and so on.

original: de las byung ba yin pas thams cad kyi gzungs rnams so //
analyzed: de las byung ba yin pas thams cad kyi gzungs rnams so //
translated: All retention is retention that is not of its nature or that arises from it.

original: rdo rje gsang ba ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The secret vajra is the retention maṇḍala.

original: de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do //
translated: The four pledges of that are explained.

original: phyag rgya 'di dag ni rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di dag ni rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa yin te /
translated: These mudras are Vajraratī and so on,

original: gang gi phyir rjes thogs nyid la pha rol tu phyin pa de dag nyid las zhes gsungs la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rjes thogs nyid la pha rol tu phyin pa de dag nyid las zhes gsungs la /
translated: because immediately after that it says, “from those perfections themselves.”

original: de dag nyid las zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa yin la /
analyzed: de dag nyid las zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa yin la /
translated: “From those themselves” refers to Vajraratī and so on, who are taught in the great maṇḍala.

original: rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni /
analyzed: rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni /
translated: The words “vajra perfections, etc.”

original: rin po che dang / chos dang ; las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: rin po che dang / chos dang ; las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsdu'o //
translated: include the jewel, doctrine, and action perfections.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The vajra secret of all the tathagatas is the dharani mandala.

original: de nyid ni dam tshig yin la /
analyzed: de nyid ni dam tshig yin la /
translated: That itself is the commitment.

original: de dag tu gzungs sdud pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams te /
analyzed: de dag tu gzungs sdud pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams te /
translated: They are the commitment seals that gather the dharanis in those mandalas.

original: gang gi phyir de rnams re re'i phyag rgyas gzungs thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de rnams re re'i phyag rgyas gzungs thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa'o //
translated: Because each of those seals perfectly gathers all the dharanis.

original: de rnams gang du gzhag par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de rnams gang du gzhag par bya zhe na /
translated: Where are they to be placed?

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: The “great mandala of Vajradhatviśvarī” is stated.

original: rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pa ni sgeg mo la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pa ni sgeg mo la sogs pa ste /
translated: The vajra secret worship is the charming lady, etc.

original: de rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do //
translated: The four commitment seals of those are explained.
Those🔽are the four seals of the four commitments of the four goddesses.

original: dag nyid de zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams dgod do //
analyzed: dag nyid de zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams dgod do //
translated: “Pure” means that one should set out the seal signs of Charm and so on, as taught in the Great Mandala of the Vajra Realm.

original: bdug pa ma la sogs pa dang / rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi snying po rnams ni 'dir rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bdug pa ma la sogs pa dang / rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi snying po rnams ni 'dir rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The essence mantras of Incense Goddess and so on up to Vajra Arapacana should be understood as taught in the Great Mandala of the Vajra Realm.

original: de nas 'dir rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang de rnams nyid dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas 'dir rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang de rnams nyid dgod par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should set out the seal signs up to Vajra Arapacana.

original: 'dis ni de nas zhes bya ba nas dgod do zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni de nas zhes bya ba nas dgod do zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: This passage from “Then” up to “one should set out” teaches the second meditative absorption called “supreme king of mandalas of the retention mandala.”

original: de nas las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa ni snga ma kho na bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa ni snga ma kho na bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: Then, the third meditative absorption called “supreme king of actions” should be understood just as before.

original: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams ni /
analyzed: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams ni /
translated: The powers taught in the dhāraṇī maṇḍala

original: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba yin pas /
analyzed: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba yin pas /
translated: are to be accomplished by those who have obtained the pledge and initiation in the dhāraṇī maṇḍala.🔽Therefore, in order for them to accomplish the great seal, etc.,

original: de rnams kyis phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir dang / slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang / slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni /
analyzed: de rnams kyis phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir dang / slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang / slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni /
translated: and in order to elaborate on the ritual of the master’s acts and the ritual of inducting the disciples, etc.,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: the root text says, “Then, etc.”

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rjes thogs nyid la ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rjes thogs nyid la ste /
translated: The word “then” means immediately after.

original: gang gi zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
translated: Having performed the great yoga taught in the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm,

original: gzungs kyi rig pa thams cad re re zhing bzlas brjod khri byas la /
analyzed: gzungs kyi rig pa thams cad re re zhing bzlas brjod khri byas la /
translated: having performed ten thousand recitations of each of the dhāraṇī awarenesses,

original: zhag bdun gyi bar du gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: zhag bdun gyi bar du gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms pas so //
translated: having meditated on the three meditative stabilizations taught in the dhāraṇī maṇḍala for seven days,

original: rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba la rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes sems dang sems las byung ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba la rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes sems dang sems las byung ba'o //
translated: The “vajra secret” is the mind and mental factors of nondual pristine awareness.

original: gzungs kyi rang bzhin can gyi gsang ba ni rdo rje gsang ba ste /
analyzed: gzungs kyi rang bzhin can gyi gsang ba ni rdo rje gsang ba ste /
translated: The secret that has the nature of a dhāraṇī is the vajra secret.

original: ming de skad ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang yin pa de bshad pa ni gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: ming de skad ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang yin pa de bshad pa ni gsungs pa'o //
translated: The explanation of the great maṇḍala that has that name is the teaching.

original: de la rdo rje yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na rdo rje chen po ste /🔽rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi gzungs kyi tshul gyis sems dang sems las byung ba'i mchod rten la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: de la rdo rje yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na rdo rje chen po ste / rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi gzungs kyi tshul gyis sems dang sems las byung ba'i mchod rten la sogs pa nas /
translated: There, since it is a vajra and it is great, it is a great vajra.🔽The great vajra is the maṇḍala of the way of the dhāraṇī, from Vairocana up to Vajra Arapacana, the mind and mental factors of the stūpa, and so on, up to the vajra and bell.

original: rdo rje @176b dril bu'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje chen po ste /
analyzed: rdo rje @176b dril bu'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje chen po ste /
translated: The great vajra is the maṇḍala of the way of the dhāraṇī, from Vairocana up to Vajra Arapacana, the mind and mental factors of the stūpa, and so on, up to the vajra and bell.

original: rdo rje chen po de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of that great vajra maṇḍala.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This teaches the following.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i lha mo'i gzugs sbra bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i lha mo'i gzugs sbra bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to emanate the forms of the goddesses such as Vajradhātvīśvarī,

original: mchod rten la sogs pa nas rdo rje dril bu'i bar gyi phyag rgya sprul pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje gsang ba'o //
analyzed: mchod rten la sogs pa nas rdo rje dril bu'i bar gyi phyag rgya sprul pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje gsang ba'o //
translated: the emanation of the mudras from the stūpa up to the vajra and bell is the vajra secret.

original: de nyid ni rdo rje chen po'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje chen po'o //
translated: That itself is the great vajra.

original: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de ni rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de ni rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The maṇḍala of those is called the maṇḍala of the great vajra of the vajra secret.

original: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la rdo rje ni mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la rdo rje ni mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams so //
translated: As for the vajra maṇḍala, the vajras are the symbolic mudras.

original: dkyil 'khor dam pa ni mchog ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dam pa ni mchog ste /
translated: The sublime maṇḍala is the supreme.

original: de rab tu bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de rab tu bshad par bya'o //
translated: That should be explained.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is like the vajra realm.

original: sprul pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ni 'dir rdo rje dbyings te de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: sprul pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ni 'dir rdo rje dbyings te de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The emanation maṇḍala is the vajra realm here, and it is like that.

original: ming ji skad bya zhe na /
analyzed: ming ji skad bya zhe na /
translated: What is its name?

original: rdo rje gsang ba zhes bshad do zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba zhes bshad do zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is explained as the vajra secret.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
translated: In the manner of the great maṇḍala,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyibs dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyibs dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: like the shape of the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya //
translated: One should draw all the maṇḍalas

original: zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang du bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang du bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: means one should draw the outer and inner maṇḍalas.

original: dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of all the maṇḍalas,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma rdo rje thugs kyi rang gi dbang bskur ba'i ming bri ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma rdo rje thugs kyi rang gi dbang bskur ba'i ming bri ba ni /
translated: means one should write the name of Vajra Realm Queen’s own empowerment of vajra mind.

original: dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of all the maṇḍalas

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: is the meaning of the words.

original: sangs rgyas phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The buddha seal

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa ste /
translated: means Vajra Realm Queen and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi mtshan ma bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mtshan ma bri bar bya'o //
translated: One should draw their symbols.

original: ji ltar bri bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bri bar bya zhe na /
translated: How should one draw them?

original: mchod rten khri la legs 'dug pa //
analyzed: mchod rten khri la legs 'dug pa //
translated: Well-seated on a thousand-pillared stūpa,

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
translated: is explained as Vajra Realm Queen.

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /🔽de la khri ni rig pa'i rten te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te / de la khri ni rig pa'i rten te /
translated: This is taught by the following verse.🔽🔽Here, the throne is the support of knowledge.🔽

original: de'i steng du ji ltar grags pa'i mchod rten bri ba 'di ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod rten gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du ji ltar grags pa'i mchod rten bri ba 'di ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod rten gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mudra of the Blessed One Vairochana's stupa called the Vajra Realm Queen.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is taught.

original: kha khyer gsum pa'i rig pa'i gnas kyi khri bris la /
analyzed: kha khyer gsum pa'i rig pa'i gnas kyi khri bris la /
translated: Draw the seat of the abode of knowledge with three ledges.

original: de'i steng du padma dang / de'i yang steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: de'i steng du padma dang / de'i yang steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
translated: On top of that, draw a lotus, and on top of that, a moon mandala.

original: de'i steng du mchod rten dbu nub tu bltas pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du mchod rten dbu nub tu bltas pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: On top of that, draw a stupa with its peak facing west.

original: rdo rje sems ma nas brtsams te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems ma nas brtsams te /
translated: Starting from Vajrasattva,

original: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi @177a * //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi @177a * //
translated: up to Vajra Acalanatha,

original: mtshan ma yang re re zhing rig pa'i khri'i steng du bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma yang re re zhing rig pa'i khri'i steng du bri bar bya'o //
translated: draw the symbols of each one on top of the seat of knowledge.

original: rdo rje brtsegs zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa chur gnas pa bris la /
analyzed: rdo rje brtsegs zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa chur gnas pa bris la /
translated: The vajra peak is a five-pronged vajra standing upright, drawn.

original: de'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis pa mgo shar du bltas par rdo rje la rdo rje bri ba ni rdo rje brtsegs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis pa mgo shar du bltas par rdo rje la rdo rje bri ba ni rdo rje brtsegs zhes bya'o //
translated: On top of that, two five-pronged vajras, the heads facing east, with a vajra drawn on the vajra, is called “the stacked vajra.”

original: rdo rje thugs zhes bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thugs zhes bshad pa'o //
translated: The vajra mind is explained.

original: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can mi bskyod pa'i thugs ni rdo rje'i thugs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can mi bskyod pa'i thugs ni rdo rje'i thugs so //
translated: The mind of Akṣobhya, which has the characteristic of enlightenment, is the vajra mind.

original: de ston par byed pa'i phyag rgya la rdo rje thugs zhes btags pa yin te /
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i phyag rgya la rdo rje thugs zhes btags pa yin te /
translated: The mudrā that teaches that is designated as the vajra mind.

original: 'di ni mi bskyod pa'i gnas su bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mi bskyod pa'i gnas su bya'o //
translated: This should be placed in the place of Akṣobhya.

original: rdo rje rin chen khri yi steng //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen khri yi steng //
translated: On top of a throne of vajra jewels,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: is explained.

original: rdo rje rtse lnga pas rtse mo mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che mgo lho phyogs su bltas pa /
analyzed: rdo rje rtse lnga pas rtse mo mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che mgo lho phyogs su bltas pa /
translated: A wish-fulfilling jewel marked with a five-pronged vajra, the head facing south,

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rang gi dbang bskur ba'i ming gi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rang gi dbang bskur ba'i ming gi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o //
translated: the name-seal of one’s own empowerment should be drawn in the place of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: rdo rje padma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje padma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The vajra lotus, etc.

original: padma dmar skya 'dab ma bcu drug pa la /
analyzed: padma dmar skya 'dab ma bcu drug pa la /
translated: A pale red lotus with sixteen petals,

original: 'di'i dbus na padma 'dab ma brgyad pa kha legs par bye ba /
analyzed: 'di'i dbus na padma 'dab ma brgyad pa kha legs par bye ba /
translated: In the middle of this is an eight-petaled lotus with its mouth well opened.

original: steng gi brgyad kha ma bye ba /
analyzed: steng gi brgyad kha ma bye ba /
translated: The eight above it are not opened.

original: de'i lte ba na rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnas pa 'di ni rdo rje padmo zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i lte ba na rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnas pa 'di ni rdo rje padmo zhes bya ba ste /
translated: In its center is a five-pronged vajra. This is called the vajra lotus.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su mgo nub tu bltas bar bri ba 'di ni mtshon cha zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su mgo nub tu bltas bar bri ba 'di ni mtshon cha zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste /
translated: Facing west, one should draw the abode of Amitābha. This is called the weapon mudrā.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ral gri'i gzugs kyi mtshon chas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'joms pas na mtshon cha zhes bya bar bshad ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ral gri'i gzugs kyi mtshon chas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'joms pas na mtshon cha zhes bya bar bshad ces bya ba yin no //
translated: Because the sword-form of the perfection of wisdom destroys the concepts of grasped and grasper with the weapon, it is explained as the weapon.

original: las kyi rdo rje ni rtse mo bcu gnyis pa'i ji skad bshad pa'i rdo rje las ma'i gzugs mgo byang du bltas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'di ni don yod par grub pa'i gnas su bya bas na rdo rje kun zhes bya bar bshad ces bya'o //
analyzed: las kyi rdo rje ni rtse mo bcu gnyis pa'i ji skad bshad pa'i rdo rje las ma'i gzugs mgo byang du bltas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'di ni don yod par grub pa'i gnas su bya bas na rdo rje kun zhes bya bar bshad ces bya'o //
translated: The karma vajra is the twelve-pronged vajra explained above. The form of the karma vajra facing north is the crossed vajra. This is the abode of Amoghasiddhi. Therefore, it is explained as the all vajra.

original: rdo rje bri bar bya zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'greng ba bri'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bri bar bya zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'greng ba bri'o //
translated: One should draw a vajra means that one should draw a standing five-pronged vajra in the place of Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje rgyal po'i gnas su lcags kyu gnyis so //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal po'i gnas su lcags kyu gnyis so //
translated: In the place of Vajrarāja, two hooks.

original: rdo rje chags pa'i gnas su rdo rje gnyis 'khyud pa chung du bri'o//
analyzed: rdo rje chags pa'i gnas su rdo rje gnyis 'khyud pa chung du bri'o//
translated: In the place of Vajrarāga, one should draw a small embrace of two vajras.

original: rdo rje legs pa'i gnas su mkhrig ma'i bar du yod pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa gnyis kyis legs so zhes sbyin pa'i tshul du bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje legs pa'i gnas su mkhrig ma'i bar du yod pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa gnyis kyis legs so zhes sbyin pa'i tshul du bya'o //
translated: In the place of Vajrasādhu, with two hands holding a vajra between the wrists, one should make the gesture of bestowing approval.

original: rdo rje rin chen gyi gnas su yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen gyi gnas su yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: In the place of Vajraratna, the wish-fulfilling jewel with the characteristics as explained.

original: rdo rje nyi ma'i gnas su ni nyi ma'i dkyil @177b 'khor lte ba na rdo rje rtse lnga pa yod pa 'di ni rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma'i gnas su ni nyi ma'i dkyil @177b 'khor lte ba na rdo rje rtse lnga pa yod pa 'di ni rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: In the place of Vajrasūrya, the mudrā of Vajrasūrya is a sun maṇḍala with a five-pronged vajra in the center.

original: dpal gyi gnas su ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: dpal gyi gnas su ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: In the place of Śrī, the mudrā of the wish-fulfilling jewel victory banner.

original: bzhad pa'i gnas su ni rdo rje gnyis kyi bar du so'i phreng ba gnyis bris pa ni bzhad pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: bzhad pa'i gnas su ni rdo rje gnyis kyi bar du so'i phreng ba gnyis bris pa ni bzhad pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The mudra of laughter is written between two vajras, with two rows of teeth.

original: rdo rje chos kyi gnas su ni sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje padma'i dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa yod pa bri'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chos kyi gnas su ni sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje padma'i dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa yod pa bri'o //
translated: In the place of Vajradharma, draw a five-pronged vajra in the center of a lotus with the characteristics explained before.

original: rdo rje rnon po'i gnas su ni rdo rje ral gri'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rnon po'i gnas su ni rdo rje ral gri'o //
translated: In the place of Vajra-tikshna, draw a vajra sword.

original: rdo rje rgyu'i gnas su ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa rtsibs rnams rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bur bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyu'i gnas su ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa rtsibs rnams rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bur bya'o //
translated: In the place of Vajrahetu, draw an eight-spoked wheel with the spokes like single-pronged vajras.

original: rdo rje smra ba'i gnas su ni rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i lce'o ;
analyzed: rdo rje smra ba'i gnas su ni rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i lce'o ;
translated: In the place of Vajra-vac, draw a tongue marked with a five-pronged vajra.

original: / rdo rje las kyi gnas su ni ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sna tshogs rdo rje kun du rtse mo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: / rdo rje las kyi gnas su ni ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sna tshogs rdo rje kun du rtse mo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In the place of Vajrakarma, draw a crossed vajra with all the prongs as explained.

original: rdo rje srung ba'i gnas su ni go cha'i phyag rgya mtha' gnyis su rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje srung ba'i gnas su ni go cha'i phyag rgya mtha' gnyis su rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
translated: In the place of Vajravarman, draw a armor mudra with two five-pronged vajras at the two ends.

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gnas su ni mche ba gnyis rtsa ba'i cha na rdo rje rtse lnga yod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gnas su ni mche ba gnyis rtsa ba'i cha na rdo rje rtse lnga yod pa'o //
translated: In the place of Vajrayakṣa, two fangs with a five-pronged vajra at the base.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gyi gnas su ni dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gyi gnas su ni dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the place of Vajramuṣṭi, a five-pronged vajra held by a pledge-fist.

original: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa ni rdo rje dbyings su gsungs pa nyid bri ba'i cho ga yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa ni rdo rje dbyings su gsungs pa nyid bri ba'i cho ga yin no //
translated: The procedure for drawing Vajrasattva and so forth is just as taught in the Vajra Realm [Tantra].

original: sgeg mo'i gnas su ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis so //🔽phreng ba ma'i gnas su ni rdo rje rin po che'i phreng ba'o //
analyzed: sgeg mo'i gnas su ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis so // phreng ba ma'i gnas su ni rdo rje rin po che'i phreng ba'o //
translated: In the place of Lāsyā, two five-pronged vajras.🔽In the place of Mālā, a vajra jewel garland.

original: glu ma'i gnas su ni rdo rje pi wang ngo //
analyzed: glu ma'i gnas su ni rdo rje pi wang ngo //
translated: In the place of Gītā, a vajra vīṇā.

original: gar ma'i gnas su ni mkhrig ma'i bar dang bcas pa'i lag pa gnyis /
analyzed: gar ma'i gnas su ni mkhrig ma'i bar dang bcas pa'i lag pa gnyis /
translated: In the place of Nṛtyā, two hands with wrists,

original: rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang bcas pas gar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang bcas pas gar byed pa'o //
translated: dancing with a three-pronged vajra.

original: bdug pa ma'i gnas su ni spos snod do //
analyzed: bdug pa ma'i gnas su ni spos snod do //
translated: In the place of Dhūpā, an incense holder.

original: me tog ma'i gnas su ni me tog gi snod rdo rje me tog gis gang ba'o //
analyzed: me tog ma'i gnas su ni me tog gi snod rdo rje me tog gis gang ba'o //
translated: In the place of Puṣpā, a flower vessel filled with vajra flowers.

original: mar me'i gnas su ni rdo rje mar me'i sdong bu'o //
analyzed: mar me'i gnas su ni rdo rje mar me'i sdong bu'o //
translated: In the place of the lamp, the lamp of the vajra.

original: byug pa'i gnas su ni rdo rje dri'i dung chos so //🔽rdo rje lcags kyu'i gnas su ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: byug pa'i gnas su ni rdo rje dri'i dung chos so // rdo rje lcags kyu'i gnas su ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: In the place of the unguent, the conch of the vajra perfume.🔽In the place of the vajra hook, the gesture of the vajra hook.

original: zhags pa'i gnas su ni rdo rje zhags pa'o //🔽lcags sgrog gi gnas su ni rdo rje lcags sgrog go //
analyzed: zhags pa'i gnas su ni rdo rje zhags pa'o // lcags sgrog gi gnas su ni rdo rje lcags sgrog go //
translated: In the place of the noose, the vajra noose.🔽In the place of the fetter, the vajra fetter.

original: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i gnas su ni rdo rje dril bu bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i gnas su ni rdo rje dril bu bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the place of the vajra alighting, the vajra bell should be drawn.

original: phyag rgya thams cad kyang rdo rje 'bar bas bskor ba'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya thams cad kyang rdo rje 'bar bas bskor ba'o //
translated: All the gestures are surrounded by blazing vajras.

original: mi bskyod pa'i rigs las byung ba rnams ni mgo shar du bltas pa'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i rigs las byung ba rnams ni mgo shar du bltas pa'o //
translated: Those born in the family of Akṣhobhya should face east.

original: gzhan dag ni mgo lho dang / nub dang / byang @178a * //🔽du bltas pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni mgo lho dang / nub dang / byang @178a * // du bltas pa'o //
translated: The others should face south, west, and north.

original: mtshams su gnas pa rnams ni mgo mtshams su bltas pa bya'o //
analyzed: mtshams su gnas pa rnams ni mgo mtshams su bltas pa bya'o //
translated: Those dwelling in the intermediate directions should face the intermediate directions.

original: phyi rol du yang zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams la ji ltar rigs pa'i tshul dang mi 'gal bar byams pa la sogs pa rang gi mtshan ma yang dag par bri bar bya ste /🔽de nyid bshad pa ni byams pa la sogs pa rang gi mtshan /
analyzed: phyi rol du yang zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams la ji ltar rigs pa'i tshul dang mi 'gal bar byams pa la sogs pa rang gi mtshan ma yang dag par bri bar bya ste / de nyid bshad pa ni byams pa la sogs pa rang gi mtshan /
translated: Also externally means that one should draw the signs of Maitreya and so forth in the outer courtyard, in a way that is not inconsistent with the proper method.

original: ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bri //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bri // zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: That is explained as one should draw the signs of Maitreya and so forth as one likes.

original: ji ltar dga' ba zhes bya ba ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar dga' ba zhes bya ba ni 'di yin te /
translated: As one likes means the following.

original: shar phyogs kyi khams kyi nang du rdo rje rtse lnga pa nyis brgya lnga bcur gcig gis ma tshang ba bri'o //
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi khams kyi nang du rdo rje rtse lnga pa nyis brgya lnga bcur gcig gis ma tshang ba bri'o //
translated: In the eastern direction, one should draw two hundred and forty-nine five-pronged vajras.

original: de bzhin du lho phyogs su ni rdo rje rin po che'o //🔽nub tu ni rdo rje padma'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du lho phyogs su ni rdo rje rin po che'o // nub tu ni rdo rje padma'o //
translated: In the same way, in the south, one should draw vajra jewels.🔽In the west, one should draw vajra lotuses.

original: byang du ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
analyzed: byang du ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
translated: In the north, one should draw crossed vajras.

original: yang na byams pa dang / mthong ba don yod dang / ngan song kun 'dren dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi mtshan ma shar phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du snga ma bzhin du rdo rje bzhi bri'o //
analyzed: yang na byams pa dang / mthong ba don yod dang / ngan song kun 'dren dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi mtshan ma shar phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du snga ma bzhin du rdo rje bzhi bri'o //
translated: Or else, Maitreya, Amoghasiddhi, Sarvanivaranavishkambhin, and Akashagarbha should be drawn in the eastern courtyard, as before, with the four vajras.

original: spos kyi glang po dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / ye shes tog ni lho phyogs su rin po che bzhi'o //🔽'od dpag tu med pa dang / zla 'od dang / bzang skyong dang / dra ba can gyi 'od ni nub tu rdo rje padma bzhi'o //
analyzed: spos kyi glang po dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / ye shes tog ni lho phyogs su rin po che bzhi'o // 'od dpag tu med pa dang / zla 'od dang / bzang skyong dang / dra ba can gyi 'od ni nub tu rdo rje padma bzhi'o //
translated: Ghandhahastin, Shuramgama, Akashagarbha, and Jnanaketu should be drawn in the south with the four jewels.🔽Amitabha, Candraprabha, Bhaisajyasamudgata, and Jaliniprabha should be drawn in the west with the four vajra lotuses.

original: rdo rje snying po dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / spob  pa brtsegs pa dang / kun du bzang po ni byang phyogs su sna tshogs rdo rje bzhi bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / spob  pa brtsegs pa dang / kun du bzang po ni byang phyogs su sna tshogs rdo rje bzhi bri bar bya'o //
translated: Vajragarbha, Akashagarbha, Akashamati, and Samantabhadra should be drawn in the north with the four crossed vajras.

original: aom sarbba sam ska ra pa ri shuddha dharma te ma h'a n'a ya pa ri w'a re sv'a h'a zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad kyi sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa ste /
analyzed: aom sarbba sam ska ra pa ri shuddha dharma te ma h'a n'a ya pa ri w'a re sv'a h'a zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad kyi sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa ste /
translated: Oṃ sarva-saṃskāra-pariśuddha-dharmata-mahānaya-parivāra svāhā is the knowledge mantra for the practice of all these Bodhisattvas.

original: 'di dag gis ni byams pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni byams pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o //
translated: With these, one should draw the mudras of Maitreya and so forth.

original: gnas de nyid du 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gang yin pa de ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ste /
analyzed: gnas de nyid du 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gang yin pa de ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ste /
translated: The extensive ritual for entering and so forth in that very place means that which is the extensive ritual for entering and so forth is the extensive ritual for entering and so forth.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni rdo rje chu btung ba dang / dbab pa dang / me tog dor ba dang / phreng ba'i dbang dang / gdong g-yogs dgrol ba dang / dkyil 'khor blta ba dang / dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba dang / dbang bskur ba dang /
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni rdo rje chu btung ba dang / dbab pa dang / me tog dor ba dang / phreng ba'i dbang dang / gdong g-yogs dgrol ba dang / dkyil 'khor blta ba dang / dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba dang / dbang bskur ba dang /
translated: The term and so forth includes drinking the vajra water, descent, flower tossing, garland empowerment, removing the blindfold, viewing the maṇḍala, gathering the descent, empowerment, and the extensive ritual for entering and so forth.

original: sngags bzlas pa dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga dang / rang @178b gi ming nas brjod pa dang / rdo rjes dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang / bsdu ba bya ba dang / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa la sogs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i cho ga thams cad bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sngags bzlas pa dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga dang / rang @178b gi ming nas brjod pa dang / rdo rjes dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang / bsdu ba bya ba dang / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa la sogs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i cho ga thams cad bya bar ston to //
translated: The and so forth indicates the mantra recitation, the ritual of the self-consecration, and so forth, and the recitation of one's own name, the vajra-enactment of the maṇḍala, the dissolution, the praise with the one hundred and eight names, and so forth, as taught in the Great Maṇḍala of the Vajra Element.

original: de nyid ni de la thog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'grel te /
analyzed: de nyid ni de la thog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'grel te /
translated: That itself is explained by there, first, and so forth.

original: de la re zhig thog ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis 'og nas bshad pa'i sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas sa ma ya stvam h'um badzra bandha zhes bya bas rang gis bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la re zhig thog ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis 'og nas bshad pa'i sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas sa ma ya stvam h'um badzra bandha zhes bya bas rang gis bcing bar bya'o //
translated: There, first, the vajra master binds himself with the pledge seal of Sattvavajrī, as taught below, with the words Samaya stvaṃ hūṃ vajra bandha.

original: de nas sa ma ya h'um zhes zlos shing 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sa ma ya h'um zhes zlos shing 'jug par bya'o //
translated: Then, saying Samaya hūṃ, he should enter.

original: zhugs nas lan cig bskor te zhes bya ba ni nang gi dkyil 'khor du'o //
analyzed: zhugs nas lan cig bskor te zhes bya ba ni nang gi dkyil 'khor du'o //
translated: Having entered, he should circumambulate once, that is, in the inner maṇḍala.

original: phyag rgya de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phul nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phyag rgya de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phul nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Having offered that seal to the Lord Vajrapāṇi,

original: sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya rdo rje snyems pa'i gzugs 'dzin par bsams la /
analyzed: sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya rdo rje snyems pa'i gzugs 'dzin par bsams la /
translated: means that one imagines the seal of Cittavajra in the form of Vajragarvā,

original: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas /
translated: and having made obeisance to the Lord,

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu gyur par bsam par bya ste ;
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu gyur par bsam par bya ste ;
translated: one should imagine that she becomes united with the Lord Vajrasattva.

original: de lta bus ni de phul ba yin no //
analyzed: de lta bus ni de phul ba yin no //
translated: In this way, one offers her.🔽Having untied it properly at one’s heart,

original: rang gi snying gar tshul bzhin du bkrol te zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i cho gas bdag nyid la dbab pa la sogs byas la /
analyzed: rang gi snying gar tshul bzhin du bkrol te zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i cho gas bdag nyid la dbab pa la sogs byas la /
translated: means that one should cause the descent of the awareness being upon oneself, and so forth, by the rite taught in the Great Mandala of the Vajra Element,

original: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbab ba nye bar bsdu bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbab ba nye bar bsdu bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: and one should gather in the descent with the words “tiṣṭha vajra” and so forth. This is the meaning.

original: de nas me tog dor ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las ji skad gsungs pa'i tshul du spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas me tog dor ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las ji skad gsungs pa'i tshul du spyad par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should perform the rite of casting the flower, and so forth, in the manner taught in the Great Mandala of the Vajra Element.

original: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' slob dpon du gyur pas mdzad par bsam zhing rang nyid kyi rjes su spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' slob dpon du gyur pas mdzad par bsam zhing rang nyid kyi rjes su spyad par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that all of these rites of entry and so forth are performed by the Blessed One Vajrasattva in the role of master, and one should practice them oneself.

original: 'dir gsang ba'i rdo rje ni dang po'i rdo rje sor bzhi pa'i tshad kyis rdo rje dang bdag po'i dbang bskur ba bya bar 'dod do //
analyzed: 'dir gsang ba'i rdo rje ni dang po'i rdo rje sor bzhi pa'i tshad kyis rdo rje dang bdag po'i dbang bskur ba bya bar 'dod do //
translated: Here, the secret vajra is the first vajra, four fingerbreadths in size, and one should wish to perform the consecration of the master.

original: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i cho ga snga ma bzhin du byas la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i cho ga snga ma bzhin du byas la /
translated: Then, one should perform the rite as previously stated in the great maṇḍala of the vajra element.

original: bdag nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi tshul 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi lha mo thams cad bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi tshul 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi lha mo thams cad bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: Endowed with the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, one should gather all the dhāraṇī goddesses who hold the methods, from Vajradhātvīśvarī up to Vajrairāma.

original: de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should praise with the praise of one hundred and eight names.

original: sgo bzhir rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas zhes bya ba la gzungs @179a * //
analyzed: sgo bzhir rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas zhes bya ba la gzungs @179a * //
translated: The vajra hook and so forth are at the four gates.🔽

original: kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgya dang / badzra aam ku sha dza: zhes zlos shing mi bskyod pa dang / de'i rigs kyi tshul rdo rje thugs la sogs pa dang / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i gzugs rnams bkug la /
analyzed: kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgya dang / badzra aam ku sha dza: zhes zlos shing mi bskyod pa dang / de'i rigs kyi tshul rdo rje thugs la sogs pa dang / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i gzugs rnams bkug la /
translated: At the four doors, with the vajra hook and so forth, means that with the action seal of the vajra hook and so forth as taught in the dhâranî mandala, reciting vajra aṅkuśa jaḥ, one summons the forms of Akṣobhya and those of his family, such as Vajrarāja and so forth, and Vajradhātvîśvarî and so forth.

original: shar phyogs kyi sgo dang nye bar rig pa'i lha mo'i gzugs su gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi sgo dang nye bar rig pa'i lha mo'i gzugs su gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Then one should place them in the form of the knowledge goddesses near the eastern door.

original: de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod par grub pa dang / de'i rigs kyi tshul gyis gzugs rnams rang rang gi sgo dang / nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod par grub pa dang / de'i rigs kyi tshul gyis gzugs rnams rang rang gi sgo dang / nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, one should place the forms of Ratnasaṃbhava, Amitâbha, Amoghasiddhi, and those of their families near their respective doors.

original: de nas badzra p'a sha h'um zhes zlos shing /
analyzed: de nas badzra p'a sha h'um zhes zlos shing /
translated: Then, reciting vajra pāśa hūṃ,

original: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas rang rang gi sgo nas mchod rten la sogs par bcug nas /🔽badzra spho ta bam zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog gi las kyi phyag rgyas de dag thams cad bcings la /
analyzed: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas rang rang gi sgo nas mchod rten la sogs par bcug nas / badzra spho ta bam zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog gi las kyi phyag rgyas de dag thams cad bcings la /
translated: Having inserted them into the stūpa, etc., with the action seal of the dhāraṇī maṇḍala,🔽bind them all with the action seal of the vajra hook,

original: badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes bya ba dang / gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas thams cad dbang du bya'o //
analyzed: badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes bya ba dang / gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas thams cad dbang du bya'o //
translated: and subjugate them all with the action seal of the dhāraṇī maṇḍala.

original: de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du thams cad bsgrubs la /
analyzed: de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du thams cad bsgrubs la /
translated: Then, having accomplished everything with one’s pledge seals as before,

original: chos dang / las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab nas /
analyzed: chos dang / las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab nas /
