translated: One should shoot an arrow at the heart.

original: de bzhin du de'i rgyab kyis phyogs par sems dpa' bsad pas bdud kyi tshul gyis mnyes par byed cing mngon du phyogs par dbang du bya'o //🔽ji srid gang dang gang rdo rje chags pa'i sbyor @181a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du de'i rgyab kyis phyogs par sems dpa' bsad pas bdud kyi tshul gyis mnyes par byed cing mngon du phyogs par dbang du bya'o // ji srid gang dang gang rdo rje chags pa'i sbyor @181a * //
translated: In the same way, by killing the hero who is turned away from her, one should please her by the method of Mara, and bring her under one’s control by facing her.🔽As long as one’s own Vajra-Rati

original: bas ; rdo rje dga' ma rang nyid kyang //
analyzed: bas ; rdo rje dga' ma rang nyid kyang //
translated: is pleased by the union of Vajra-Raga,

original: zhes bya ba rdo rje chags pa'i btsun mo rang nyid kyang rnal 'byor pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba rdo rje chags pa'i btsun mo rang nyid kyang rnal 'byor pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba'o //
translated: one’s own Vajra-Rati will come under the control of the yogin.

original: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshogs rdo rje chags pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshogs rdo rje chags pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: Then, having performed the yoga of Vajraraga as it is taught in the great mandala of the Vajra Element,

original: de'i 'og tu gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje chags pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje chags pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: after that, one should bind the action seal of Vajraraga as it is taught in the mandala of the Form of the Deity,🔽and recite:

original: aom badzra guhya r'a ga r'a ga ya h'um zhes byas la /
analyzed: aom badzra guhya r'a ga r'a ga ya h'um zhes byas la /
translated: Oṃ vajra guhya rāgāya hūṃ

original: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya phat ches zlos shing /
analyzed: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya phat ches zlos shing /
translated: māraya māraya phaṭ

original: snga ma bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsam mo ;
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsam mo ;
translated: and, as before, one should imagine that all the buddhafields are equal to space.

original: / de nas de'i tshe nam mkha'i tshad tsam gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de'i steng du rdo rje chags pa sku mdog dmar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bdag nyid bsams nas /
analyzed: / de nas de'i tshe nam mkha'i tshad tsam gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de'i steng du rdo rje chags pa sku mdog dmar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bdag nyid bsams nas /
translated: Then, at that time, one should imagine oneself as Vajraraga, red in color and adorned with all the ornaments, on a moon mandala the size of the sky, above that.

original: aom badzra guhya r'a ga ya h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje chags pa'i btsun mo rdo rje dga' ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig nyid kyi mdun du sprul la /
analyzed: aom badzra guhya r'a ga ya h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje chags pa'i btsun mo rdo rje dga' ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig nyid kyi mdun du sprul la /
translated: Then, with the words oṃ vajra guhya rāgāya hūṃ, one should emanate the Vajraraga queen Vajrarati in front of oneself on a single moon mandala.

original: bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
analyzed: bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
translated: Having performed the rite of summoning and so forth,

original: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya phat ces zlos shing snga ma bzhin du de dang de bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya phat ces zlos shing snga ma bzhin du de dang de bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on that and that, repeating “Kill! Kill! Phat!” as before.

original: de nas zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam lo gcig gis de mngon du byas nas rdo rje chags pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: de nas zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam lo gcig gis de mngon du byas nas rdo rje chags pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Then, having actualized it in one month, or six months, or one year, one should bind the karmamudra of Vajra Passion,

original: mtshan thog thag de'i las kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor bas mda' dmar po snying gar 'phen zhing kha gal ba dang ldan par byas la mda' des bsnun nas phug la bsgrub par bya ba dmar zhing sgrub pa po la gcig tu chags par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan thog thag de'i las kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor bas mda' dmar po snying gar 'phen zhing kha gal ba dang ldan par byas la mda' des bsnun nas phug la bsgrub par bya ba dmar zhing sgrub pa po la gcig tu chags par bsam par bya'o //
translated: and with the yoga of that karmamudra throughout the night, one should imagine that the target is red and passionately in love with oneself, and that the target is pierced by the arrow, having been struck by the arrow.

original: bdag gi lus kyi snying ga ru //
analyzed: bdag gi lus kyi snying ga ru //
translated: In the heart of one’s body,

original: rdo rje go cha'i tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: rdo rje go cha'i tshul gyis ni //
translated: one should imagine a vajra cross,

original: dbung pa bsnol ba bcings nas ni //
analyzed: dbung pa bsnol ba bcings nas ni //
translated: and with the arms crossed,

original: sangs rgyas nyid kyang srung bar byed //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid kyang srung bar byed //
translated: one should protect even buddhahood.🔽This is the method of the vajra armor.

original: ces bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
translated: One should bind the two vajra fists,

original: de dpung ba bsnol ba'i tshul gyis rang gi snying gar bdag nyid 'khyud la /
analyzed: de dpung ba bsnol ba'i tshul gyis rang gi snying gar bdag nyid 'khyud la /
translated: One should imagine that one embraces oneself at the heart with the manner of crossed arms,

original: rdo rje chas yan lag thams cad go bskon par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chas yan lag thams cad go bskon par bsam par bya'o //
translated: and that one is fully garbed in all the limbs of the vajra body.

original: rdo rje cha'i sbyor ba 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mi phyed par gal te gnod par byed pa rtsom pa na de yang bsrung bar 'gyur na gzhan dag lha smos kyang ci dgos /
analyzed: rdo rje cha'i sbyor ba 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mi phyed par gal te gnod par byed pa rtsom pa na de yang bsrung bar 'gyur na gzhan dag lha smos kyang ci dgos /
translated: By this yoga of the vajra body, if one were to commence harming even all the Tathagatas, they would be protected, let alone others.

original: 'dir yang sangs rgyas nyid kyang zhes bya ba'i tshig 'dis /
analyzed: 'dir yang sangs rgyas nyid kyang zhes bya ba'i tshig 'dis /
translated: Here, the words “even Buddhahood”

original: rnal 'byor @181b pa gnod pa'i khyad par chen po las srung nus par ston to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor @181b pa gnod pa'i khyad par chen po las srung nus par ston to //
translated: indicate that one is able to protect the yogi from great harm.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje legs pa'i sbyor ba byas nas /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje legs pa'i sbyor ba byas nas /
translated: Having performed the yoga of Vajrasādhu as taught in the Vajradhātu maṇḍala,

original: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje legs pa'i las kyi phag rgya bcings la aom badzra guhya s'a h'um shva ri h'um zhes brjod la badzra bandha ra ksha ham zhes zlos shing snga ma bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkhar gyur par🔽bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje legs pa'i las kyi phag rgya bcings la aom badzra guhya s'a h'um shva ri h'um zhes brjod la badzra bandha ra ksha ham zhes zlos shing snga ma bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkhar gyur par bsam par bya'o //
translated: Later, having bound the action seal of Vajrasādhu as taught in the maṇḍala of dhāraṇī, one should recite Oṃ vajra-guhya-saṃśaya-hūṃ śrī-hūṃ and recite vajra-bandha rakṣa haṃ, and as before one should imagine that all buddhafields become space.

original: de nas nam mkha' phyogs der stong gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad tsam gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du bdag nyid rdo rje legs par rnam par bsams la stan de nyid la mdun du /
analyzed: de nas nam mkha' phyogs der stong gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad tsam gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du bdag nyid rdo rje legs par rnam par bsams la stan de nyid la mdun du /
translated: Then in that space one should imagine a moon maṇḍala the size of a billion-world universe, and on top of that one should imagine oneself as Vajrasādhu.

original: aom badzra guhya sandhi sha ri h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje legs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i legs ldan ma sbrul la /
analyzed: aom badzra guhya sandhi sha ri h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje legs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i legs ldan ma sbrul la /
translated: On that seat in front of oneself, with Oṃ vajra-guhya-saṃśaya-hūṃ, one should emanate the form of Vajrasādhu holding a noose,

original: bsdu ba la sogs pa'i chog rjes su spyad nas /
analyzed: bsdu ba la sogs pa'i chog rjes su spyad nas /
translated: and having performed the ritual of summoning and so forth,

original: bandha raksha ham zhes zlos shad snga ma bzhin du bsgom par bya'o ;
analyzed: bandha raksha ham zhes zlos shad snga ma bzhin du bsgom par bya'o ;
translated: one should recite vajra-bandha rakṣa haṃ and meditate as before.

original: / de nas zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam lo gcig gi mthar nyi ma nub pa'i dus su rang gi lus kyi dbung pa bsnol bas bzung la zhugs te gcig tu gyur par bsgoms te /
analyzed: / de nas zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam lo gcig gi mthar nyi ma nub pa'i dus su rang gi lus kyi dbung pa bsnol bas bzung la zhugs te gcig tu gyur par bsgoms te /
translated: Then, at the end of one month, six months, or one year, at sunset, one should enter into the union with one’s consort, holding her with one’s crossed arms, and meditate on the single form.

original: ji srid sgrub pa po'i lus su zhugs te gcig tu gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: ji srid sgrub pa po'i lus su zhugs te gcig tu gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o //
translated: One should recite the mantra until the practitioner enters into the single form.

original: de nas rdo rje legs pa nyid du 'gyur zhing legs pa ma yin pa'i tshul gyis rnam par rtog pa rnams las bdag nyid bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje legs pa nyid du 'gyur zhing legs pa ma yin pa'i tshul gyis rnam par rtog pa rnams las bdag nyid bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then one will become Vajra-bhadra, and one will protect oneself from the modes of non-bhadra, i.e., from discursive thought.

original: gzhan srung bar byed par 'dod na zla ba gcig tsam bsnyen pa byas lam thar mtshan thog thag bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan srung bar byed par 'dod na zla ba gcig tsam bsnyen pa byas lam thar mtshan thog thag bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: If one wishes to protect others, one should perform the rite of presence for one month and recite the mantra throughout the night.

original: de nas gang gi tshe mi la sogs pa'i 'jigs sgrag cung zad 'byung bar mthong na /
analyzed: de nas gang gi tshe mi la sogs pa'i 'jigs sgrag cung zad 'byung bar mthong na /
translated: Then, when one sees the appearance of any danger, such as from humans,

original: de'i tshe rdo rje legs pa'i rnal 'byor pas de bzhin du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sten du gnas las sems can de lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug cing bcug la bcings te /
analyzed: de'i tshe rdo rje legs pa'i rnal 'byor pas de bzhin du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sten du gnas las sems can de lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug cing bcug la bcings te /
translated: At that time, the vajra-yoga of Subhadra, having summoned that sentient being with the hook, etc., into the place on the moon-disk, binds him there.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi steng du 'dug par bsams la snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid kyi snying gar dpung ba bsnol ba bcings nas /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi steng du 'dug par bsams la snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid kyi snying gar dpung ba bsnol ba bcings nas /
translated: Having imagined that he is seated on top of that moon-disk, just as before, one binds oneself with crossed arms at the heart,

original: rdo rje go cha'i sbyor bas bsrung bar gyur na sangs rgyas nyid kyang bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje go cha'i sbyor bas bsrung bar gyur na sangs rgyas nyid kyang bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and, having protected oneself with the vajra-armor yoga, even buddhahood is protected.

original: de ltar lus kyi phyag rgya bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar lus kyi phyag rgya bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the body seal,

original: lta ba'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lta ba'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the view seal,

original: de nas zhes @182a * //🔽bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes @182a * // bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he said, “Then, etc.”

original: lta ba nyid phyag rgya yin pas na lta ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: lta ba nyid phyag rgya yin pas na lta ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The view itself is the seal, thus it is the view seal.

original: de'i ye shes ni nges pa ste de bslab pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ye shes ni nges pa ste de bslab pa'o //
translated: Its intuition is certainty, and that is the training.

original: rdo rje lta ba chags pas ni /
analyzed: rdo rje lta ba chags pas ni /
translated: With the vajra view, passion,

original: dga' bas mig ni rab tu brgyad //🔽ces bya ba la /
analyzed: dga' bas mig ni rab tu brgyad //🔽ces bya ba la /
translated: the eye is fully opened with joy.

original: chags pa ni mngon par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: chags pa ni mngon par 'dod pa ste /
translated: Attachment is the desire for something.

original: de las byung ba'i rab tu dga' ba ni kun du chags pas rab tu dga' ba'i yid do //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i rab tu dga' ba ni kun du chags pas rab tu dga' ba'i yid do //
translated: The delight that arises from that is the mind that is delighted by attachment.

original: des mig rab tu bgrad cing gdangs pa'i lta ba'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni chags pas te /
analyzed: des mig rab tu bgrad cing gdangs pa'i lta ba'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni chags pas te /
translated: The mudra of the gaze with wide-open eyes is attachment.

original: dga' bas mig ni rab tu bgrad //
analyzed: dga' bas mig ni rab tu bgrad //
translated: The eyes are wide open with delight.

original: ces bya ba lta ba'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje'i lta ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba lta ba'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje'i lta ba'o //
translated: The mudra of the gaze is the vajra gaze.

original: di dang badzra dri shti ma ta zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la /
analyzed: di dang badzra dri shti ma ta zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la /
translated: With the words “vajra-eye” and “vajra-eye” place the two eyes.

original: rdo rje'i lta ba bskyed de /
analyzed: rdo rje'i lta ba bskyed de /
translated: Generate the vajra gaze.

original: des bltas na bud med rnams nges par dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des bltas na bud med rnams nges par dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: By that gaze, women will certainly be brought under control.

original: lta ba 'di la sgeg pa'i nyams thams cad sbyar par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: lta ba 'di la sgeg pa'i nyams thams cad sbyar par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
translated: The Blessed One has said that all the expressions of flirtation should be applied to this gaze.

original: rab tu myur bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rab tu dga' bas myug ba ni rab tu myur ba ste /
analyzed: rab tu myur bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rab tu dga' bas myug ba ni rab tu myur ba ste /
translated: Very quickly, etc. Very quickly is very fast.

original: rings par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rings par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means “quickly.”

original: rab tu bskul bas na rab tu bskul te /
analyzed: rab tu bskul bas na rab tu bskul te /
translated: Very much urged is very much urged.

original: de gang zhe na mig gnyis te /
analyzed: de gang zhe na mig gnyis te /
translated: What is that? The two eyes.

original: 'dis mig gi rje ma dgug cing 'dren par byed pa yin pas na /
analyzed: 'dis mig gi rje ma dgug cing 'dren par byed pa yin pas na /
translated: Since this attracts and draws the mistress of the eyes,

original: rab tu myur bar mig rab bskul //
analyzed: rab tu myur bar mig rab bskul //
translated: it is the very swift eye-enticing.

original: mig gi rdzi ma 'gugs byed pa'i //
analyzed: mig gi rdzi ma 'gugs byed pa'i //
translated: The eye-enticing

original: zhes bya ste de lta bu'i lta ba gang yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ste de lta bu'i lta ba gang yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: is the eye-enticing, which is the eye-enticing.

original: lta ba yang yin la gzi can yang yin pas na lta ba gzi can te gzi brjid can no //
analyzed: lta ba yang yin la gzi can yang yin pas na lta ba gzi can te gzi brjid can no //
translated: Since it is both an eye and has splendor, it is the eye-enticing, which is the splendor.

original: yin par bshad ces bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: yin par bshad ces bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
translated: The explanation is is said.🔽Placing the two eyes, one should generate the two eyes with the mantra daṃ patadṛṣṭi aṃ guśa jaḥ.

original: d'i pta dri shat aam gu sha dza: zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la bskyed de 'gugs pa'i las rnams la 'bar ba'i lta bas sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: d'i pta dri shat aam gu sha dza: zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la bskyed de 'gugs pa'i las rnams la 'bar ba'i lta bas sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should apply the blazing gaze to the activities of attraction.

original: khro gnyer zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽gang gis khro gnyer gyi gnyer ma bsdus shing /
analyzed: khro gnyer zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / gang gis khro gnyer gyi gnyer ma bsdus shing /
translated: The angry frown, etc.🔽The angry frown is the frown of anger.

original: gsal ba gang yin pa de ni gnyer ma rab tu bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: gsal ba gang yin pa de ni gnyer ma rab tu bsdus pa'o //
translated: The one who has a frown of anger is the angry frown.🔽The one who has a frown that is very contracted is the very contracted frown.

original: de nas khro ba'i mig btsums pas lta ba gang yin pa de ni khro bo'i lta ba yin pas de la //
analyzed: de nas khro ba'i mig btsums pas lta ba gang yin pa de ni khro bo'i lta ba yin pas de la //
translated: Then, with the eyes of anger closed, that which is the gaze is the gaze of anger.

original: khro gnyer ma rab bsdus pa //
analyzed: khro gnyer ma rab bsdus pa //
translated: The frown is drawn together,

original: khro ba'i mig ni btsums pa ste //
analyzed: khro ba'i mig ni btsums pa ste //
translated: and the eyes of anger are closed.

original: zhes bya'o // de lta bu'i khro bo'i lte ba byas shing mnyam par bzhag na ni /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // de lta bu'i khro bo'i lte ba byas shing mnyam par bzhag na ni /
translated: When one is equipoised with the navel of such anger,

original: khams gsum yang ni 'jigs par byed //🔽ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: khams gsum yang ni 'jigs par byed // ces bya ba ste /
translated: the three realms are frightened.

original: kro dha dri shti hri zhes bya ba @182b mig gnyis su bkod la /
analyzed: kro dha dri shti hri zhes bya ba @182b mig gnyis su bkod la /
translated: The eyes are placed on the two eyes with krodha-dṛṣṭi-hrīḥ.

original: khro bo'i nyams thams cad kyis khro bo'i lta ba bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i nyams thams cad kyis khro bo'i lta ba bskyed par bya'o //
translated: One should generate the gaze of anger with all the aspects of the appearance of anger.

original: ri rab ces bya ba la sogs pa la ri rab ni ri'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: ri rab ces bya ba la sogs pa la ri rab ni ri'i rgyal po'o //
translated: On Sumeru, etc., Sumeru is the king of mountains.

original: ri yang de dag go //
analyzed: ri yang de dag go //
translated: The mountains are also that.

original: brag ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: brag ni rdo rje'o //
translated: The rock is the vajra.

original: de dang 'dra bar brtan pa ni mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra bar brtan pa ni mi phyed pa'o //
translated: Being firm like that is indivisible.

original: 'dzum pa med pa ni mi g-yo ba ste ;
analyzed: 'dzum pa med pa ni mi g-yo ba ste ;
translated: Without a smile is unmoving.

original: rdzi ma dang mig mi 'gyur ba'i lta ba'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rdzi ma dang mig mi 'gyur ba'i lta ba'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The mudrā of the gaze of the unmoving eyebrows and eyes is

original: ri rab ri'i brag ca 'dra bar brtan pas 'dzum pa med pa'i mig byams pa'i lta ba yin par bshad ces bya ste /
analyzed: ri rab ri'i brag ca 'dra bar brtan pas 'dzum pa med pa'i mig byams pa'i lta ba yin par bshad ces bya ste /
translated: The smile is the loving gaze, because it is as stable as the echo in the rock of Mount Meru.

original: dri dha tri ta shat ta zhes bya bas mig gnyis su bkod la /
analyzed: dri dha tri ta shat ta zhes bya bas mig gnyis su bkod la /
translated: Having placed the two eyes with the words dṛdhā trātā trātā,

original: brtan pa'i lta ba bskyed nas /
analyzed: brtan pa'i lta ba bskyed nas /
translated: one should generate the gaze of stability.

original: de'i 'og tu bsrung ba la sogs pa'i las 'jug par bya'o //🔽de la gang gi tshe lta ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis las byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bsrung ba la sogs pa'i las 'jug par bya'o // de la gang gi tshe lta ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis las byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: Then, one should engage in the activities of protection and so forth.

original: rang gi lha'i sbyor bas lta ba'i phyag rgya 'di dag zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du goms par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi lha'i sbyor bas lta ba'i phyag rgya 'di dag zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du goms par bya'o //
translated: When one performs the activities with the seal of the gaze, at that time, through the yoga of one's deity, one should practice these seals of the gaze for just one month.

original: de la re zhig yi ge ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ta aa med pa las mig g-yon pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor //
analyzed: de la re zhig yi ge ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ta aa med pa las mig g-yon pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor //
translated: First, from the letter ma, one should visualize a sun maṇḍala, and from ta without ā, the left eye is a moon maṇḍala.

original: yi ge h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po mig gnyis kyi mig gi 'bras bur bsams la badzra dri shti ma ta zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: yi ge h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po mig gnyis kyi mig gi 'bras bur bsams la badzra dri shti ma ta zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: From the letter hūṃ, one should visualize a five-pronged white vajra as the pupil of the two eyes, and having blessed it with the words vajra-dṛṣṭi māta,

original: ji skad du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje lta ba /
analyzed: ji skad du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje lta ba /
translated: The vajra gaze is as described.

original: badzra dri shti ma ta zhes zlos shing bsgoms la /
analyzed: badzra dri shti ma ta zhes zlos shing bsgoms la /
translated: Reciting “vajra-dṛṣṭi mātaṃ,” one should meditate on it.

original: zla ba tshang ba'i mthar ni mtshan thog thag bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba tshang ba'i mthar ni mtshan thog thag bya'o //
translated: At the end of a full moon, one should practice it throughout the night.

original: de nas dbang du byas la rdo rje lta ba dang bcas pa'i 'od zer rnams spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dbang du byas la rdo rje lta ba dang bcas pa'i 'od zer rnams spro bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having brought it under control, one should emit the light rays together with the vajra gaze.

original: de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor bya sla yi ge dza: las mig g-yas dang g-yon du nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor bya sla yi ge dza: las mig g-yas dang g-yon du nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
translated: In the same way, one should perform the yoga of one’s deity. Easy is the syllable jḥ. From jḥ one should generate the sun in the right eye and the moon in the left eye.

original: d'i pa ta dri shti aam gu sha dza: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: d'i pa ta dri shti aam gu sha dza: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: With “dīpta-dṛṣṭi aṅkuśa jḥ,” one should bless them.

original: rdo rje lcags kyu lta bu'i 'od zer rnams spro ba dang / d'i pta dri shti aa gu sha dza: zhes zlos shing bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu lta bu'i 'od zer rnams spro ba dang / d'i pta dri shti aa gu sha dza: zhes zlos shing bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should emit the light rays that are like the vajra hook, and one should meditate reciting “dīpta-dṛṣṭi aṅkuśa jḥ.”

original: de nas zla ba'i mthar de bzhin du bsgrubs pas ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'bar ba'i lta ba'i lcags gyu lta bu'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba dgug par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas zla ba'i mthar de bzhin du bsgrubs pas ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'bar ba'i lta ba'i lcags gyu lta bu'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba dgug par bya'o //
translated: Then, having accomplished it in the same way at the end of the moon, one should summon the victim with the light rays like the hook of the blazing eye having the characteristics as previously explained.

original: de bzhin du rang gi lta'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rang gi lta'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: In the same way, having performed one's own deity yoga,

original: yi ge yi zhes bya bas mig gnyis su rdor je nyi ma bsam /
analyzed: yi ge yi zhes bya bas mig gnyis su rdor je nyi ma bsam /
translated: one should imagine the sun and vajra in both eyes with the syllable yīm.

original: yi ge h'um thung du las mig 'bras khro bo'i rdo rjer bsams la gro dha dri shti hri zhes bya bas byin @183a * //🔽gyis brlabs nas /
analyzed: yi ge h'um thung du las mig 'bras khro bo'i rdo rjer bsams la gro dha dri shti hri zhes bya bas byin @183a * // gyis brlabs nas /
translated: Having blessed the eyes with the short syllable hūṃ, one should imagine the eye-pupil as the wrathful vajra with the syllable kṣa.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan yid can gyi khro bo'i lta ba dang / kro dha dri shti hri zhes zlos shing bsgom par bya'o //🔽de nas de bzhin du rab tu bsgrubs la /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan yid can gyi khro bo'i lta ba dang / kro dha dri shti hri zhes zlos shing bsgom par bya'o // de nas de bzhin du rab tu bsgrubs la /
translated: Then, having blessed the eyes with the syllable kṣa, one should meditate on the wrathful eye having the characteristics as previously explained, and one should recite krodha-dṛṣṭi hri.

original: rang gi mig las byung ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba thal bar bya'o//
analyzed: rang gi mig las byung ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba thal bar bya'o//
translated: Then, having accomplished it in the same way, one should reduce the victim to ashes with the wrathful vajras arisen from one's eyes.

original: de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: In the same way, having performed one's own deity yoga,

original: sems can gyi khams rnams su byams pa spros te /🔽yi ge ma las mig g-yas par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhi ba /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams rnams su byams pa spros te / yi ge ma las mig g-yas par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhi ba /
translated: Having emanated love into the realms of sentient beings,🔽from the syllable ma, in the right eye, one should imagine a sun maṇḍala, peaceful.🔽From the syllable ta, in the left eye, one should imagine a moon maṇḍala, cool.

original: ta aa me dpa las mig g-yon par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam pa dri dha dri shti tra ta zhes bya bas byin phyis brlabs nas /
analyzed: ta aa me dpa las mig g-yon par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam pa dri dha dri shti tra ta zhes bya bas byin phyis brlabs nas /
translated: Having consecrated with the words “dri dhi śati tra ta,”

original: dri dha dri shati ta ta zhes zlos shing ji skad du bshad pa'i lta ba bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: dri dha dri shati ta ta zhes zlos shing ji skad du bshad pa'i lta ba bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on the view as it has been explained, reciting “dri dhi śati ta ta.”

original: de nas de bzhin du zla ba gcig gi mthar bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du zla ba gcig gi mthar bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Then, in the same way, at the end of a month, one should practice.

original: de nas tsha ba'i rims la zla ba rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba la brlas la bya ba cing tsha ba bsal bar bya'o ;
analyzed: de nas tsha ba'i rims la zla ba rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba la brlas la bya ba cing tsha ba bsal bar bya'o ;
translated: Then, in the case of a hot fever, one should practice on the one to be liberated with the moon-vajra-like light rays, and one should remove the heat.

original: / grang ba'i rims la ni nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams kyis grangs ba bsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: / grang ba'i rims la ni nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams kyis grangs ba bsal bar bya'o //
translated: In the case of a cold fever, one should remove the cold with the sun’s light rays.

original: gdon gyis zin pa la ni 'bar ba'i lta ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis gzhom par bya'o //
analyzed: gdon gyis zin pa la ni 'bar ba'i lta ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis gzhom par bya'o //
translated: In the case of being seized by a spirit, one should destroy it with the blazing view’s light rays.

original: tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bstab po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las ji skad gsungs ba'i sbyor bas lha'i rnal 'byor ni thams cad du bya bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bstab po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las ji skad gsungs ba'i sbyor bas lha'i rnal 'byor ni thams cad du bya bar shes par bya'o //
translated: The bestowal of the knowledge of the verbal seal means that one should understand that the yoga of the deity is to be performed in all cases by the method taught in the Vajradhātu maṇḍala.

original: de nas rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: de nas rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: Then, having performed the yoga of one's deity,

original: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rang gi las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rang gi las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: one should bind the action seal taught in the dhāraṇī maṇḍala,

original: ho ho ho ho zhes bdag nyid zlos shing kha dog dmar por bsams la /
analyzed: ho ho ho ho zhes bdag nyid zlos shing kha dog dmar por bsams la /
translated: recite ho ho ho ho while visualizing oneself as red,

original: badzra ho zhes zlos shing zla ba gcig gi bar du thun bzhir bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: badzra ho zhes zlos shing zla ba gcig gi bar du thun bzhir bsgom par bya'o //
translated: and recite vajra ho while meditating in four sessions for one month.

original: de nas zla ba'i mthar mtshan thog thag bsgom mo //
analyzed: de nas zla ba'i mthar mtshan thog thag bsgom mo //
translated: Then, at the end of the month, meditate throughout the night.

original: de nas de bzhin du las kyi dus su yang lha'i rnal 'byor byas la bsgrub par bya ba dang lhan cig zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig nyid la gnas par blos bsams la ;
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du las kyi dus su yang lha'i rnal 'byor byas la bsgrub par bya ba dang lhan cig zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig nyid la gnas par blos bsams la ;
translated: Then, likewise, at the time of action, having performed the deity yoga, one should imagine with the mind that the object of attainment and oneself both abide on a single moon disc,

original: ho ho ho ho zhes zlos shing bsgrub pa'i lus la yi ge ho bzhi bcug la des de'i lus thams cad dmar por byas nas badzra ho zhes zlos shing rang gi lus las byung ba'i 'od zer dmar po 'bar bas 'khyud bzhin par bsams ni nges par dbang
analyzed: ho ho ho ho zhes zlos shing bsgrub pa'i lus la yi ge ho bzhi bcug la des de'i lus thams cad dmar por byas nas badzra ho zhes zlos shing rang gi lus las byung ba'i 'od zer dmar po 'bar bas 'khyud bzhin par bsams ni nges par dbang
translated: Reciting “vajra ho,” one should imagine that one embraces her with the blazing red light rays that arise from one’s body.

original: du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: du 'gyur ro //
translated: She will certainly come under one’s control.

original: gang gi phyir sgra @183b dang bral bas zhes gsungs pas lkog ma'i phyogs su cung zad tsam gdon pas 'dir bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgra @183b dang bral bas zhes gsungs pas lkog ma'i phyogs su cung zad tsam gdon pas 'dir bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Since it is said that “one should do this recitation without sound,” one should do this recitation by merely slightly exhaling in the direction of one’s throat.🔽“Jjjāṁ” and so forth.

original: dzdza: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: dzdza: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: Having performed one’s deity yoga in the same way,

original: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: one should bind the action seal that was taught in the retention mandala.

original: yi ge dzdza:bzhi lan gsum bzlas la /
analyzed: yi ge dzdza:bzhi lan gsum bzlas la /
translated: Recite the three times the three “jjjāṁ” syllables.

original: dzdza:dzdza: zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin du zla ba gcig tsam bsgoms nas mthar mtshan thog thag bya'o //
analyzed: dzdza:dzdza: zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin du zla ba gcig tsam bsgoms nas mthar mtshan thog thag bya'o //
translated: Recite “jjjāṁ jjjāṁ” and so forth, as before, for just one month, and finally, for one night.

original: de nas de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: Then, having performed one's deity yoga in the same way,

original: rang gi gdan gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bsgrub par bya ba lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la yi ge dza:bzhis khro bo'i tshig gis zlos shing bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la zhugs la /
analyzed: rang gi gdan gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bsgrub par bya ba lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la yi ge dza:bzhis khro bo'i tshig gis zlos shing bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la zhugs la /
translated: one should summon the victim with a hook, etc. , on the moon-disk seat, and having caused him to enter, bound and subdued, one should recite the four syllables JAH, HUM, VAM, and HO:H, and having caused the victim to enter one's body,

original: rdo rje lcags kyu'i gzugs g-yas su bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu'i gzugs g-yas su bskyed par bya'o //
translated: one should generate the form of the Vajra Hook to the right.

original: de nas dzdza:dzdza: zhes bya bas rang gi lag par lcags kyu bskyed la /
analyzed: de nas dzdza:dzdza: zhes bya bas rang gi lag par lcags kyu bskyed la /
translated: Then, with JAH JAH, one should generate the hook in one's hand,

original: des bsgrub par bya ba'i snying phug nas badzra bdzdza: zhes zlos shing bkug na nges par 'gugs par byed do //
analyzed: des bsgrub par bya ba'i snying phug nas badzra bdzdza: zhes zlos shing bkug na nges par 'gugs par byed do //
translated: and with that one should summon the victim, piercing his heart with the hook, reciting BIZRU BIZRU.

original: snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: Having performed one's deity yoga as before,

original: de'i 'og tu gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas yi ge h'um bzhi bzlos shing khro bo'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas yi ge h'um bzhi bzlos shing khro bo'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, having formed the action seal taught in the maṇḍala of form, one should meditate on oneself as having the form of a wrathful one, reciting the four hūṃs.

original: de nas badzra h'um zhes zlos shing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas badzra h'um zhes zlos shing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, reciting vajra hūṃ, one should meditate with the yoga of four sessions.

original: de nas zla ba'i mthar mtshan thog thag bya'o //
analyzed: de nas zla ba'i mthar mtshan thog thag bya'o //
translated: Then, at the end of the month, one should practice throughout the night.

original: yang las kyi dus su de bzhin du yang rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /🔽yi ge h'um bzhi rang dang gzhan gyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pas gzung du rung ba'i sgra'i tshig tu brjod pa gsal bar brjod cing bsgrub par bya ba'i lus 'jig pa'i dus kyi rlung dang 'dra ba des /
analyzed: yang las kyi dus su de bzhin du yang rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la / yi ge h'um bzhi rang dang gzhan gyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pas gzung du rung ba'i sgra'i tshig tu brjod pa gsal bar brjod cing bsgrub par bya ba'i lus 'jig pa'i dus kyi rlung dang 'dra ba des /
translated: Again, at the time of action, having performed one’s deity yoga in the same way,🔽one should recite the four hūṃs as the sound of words that can be grasped by one’s own and others’ auditory consciousnesses, clearly articulated.

original: rnam par gtor bar 'gyur bar bsam zhing /
analyzed: rnam par gtor bar 'gyur bar bsam zhing /
translated: One should imagine that the one to be accomplished is scattered by the wind at the time of the destruction of the body.

original: badzra h'um zhes bzlas na ri rab kyang lhung bar byed do //
analyzed: badzra h'um zhes bzlas na ri rab kyang lhung bar byed do //
translated: If one recites vajra hūṃ, even Mount Meru will fall.

original: snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: As before, one should perform the yoga of one's deity, and bind the action seal taught in the dhâraṇî-mandala.

original: yi ge h'um bzhi'i go chas bdag nyid go bgos par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge h'um bzhi'i go chas bdag nyid go bgos par bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that one is clad in the armor of the four Hûṃ syllables.

original: de nas badzra ham zhes bya ba'i phra ba'i tshig yongs su zlos shing snga ma bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas badzra ham zhes bya ba'i phra ba'i tshig yongs su zlos shing snga ma bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, reciting the mantra vajra-haṃ, one should meditate as before.

original: de nas zla ba gcig gi mthar mtshan thog thag bsgom @184a * //🔽par bya'o // yang las kyi dus su de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: de nas zla ba gcig gi mthar mtshan thog thag bsgom @184a * // par bya'o // yang las kyi dus su de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: Then, at the end of a month, one should meditate throughout the night.🔽Again, at the time of action, one should perform the yoga of one's deity as before, and summon, induct, bind, and control the victim with the hook, and so on.

original: bsgrub par bya ba lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas nas rang gi stan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas nas rang gi stan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste /
translated: One should place the victim on one's seat, on a moon-disk.

original: ham ham ham ham zhes yongs su zlos shing lha mor gyur par bsams la badzra ham zhes bzlas na 'jig rten gsum yang srung bar byed do //
analyzed: ham ham ham ham zhes yongs su zlos shing lha mor gyur par bsams la badzra ham zhes bzlas na 'jig rten gsum yang srung bar byed do //
translated: Reciting ham ham ham ham and imagining oneself to be the goddess, if one recites vajra ham, one will protect even the three worlds.

original: de nas / rdo rje gsang ba'i ye shes kyi //
analyzed: de nas / rdo rje gsang ba'i ye shes kyi //
translated: Then, the knowledge of the secret vajra and so forth.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnam par yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na rnam pa thams cad do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnam par yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na rnam pa thams cad do //
translated: Since it is a form and also everything, it is all forms.

original: de nyid mchog ste dam pa'o ;
analyzed: de nyid mchog ste dam pa'o ;
translated: That itself is supreme, the best.

original: / de dang ldan pa ni bcas pa ste /
analyzed: / de dang ldan pa ni bcas pa ste /
translated: Endowed with that is endowed,

original: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bsang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bsang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: which means endowed with the thirty-two marks and eighty minor marks of a great being.

original: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog de dang ldan pa ni phyag na rdo rje ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog de dang ldan pa ni phyag na rdo rje ste /
translated: Endowed with that supreme of all forms is Vajrapāṇi,

original: rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid de rang nyid bsgom par byas na de yang ;
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid de rang nyid bsgom par byas na de yang ;
translated: who should meditate on himself as Vajrasattva.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du byed //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du byed //
translated: That also is all buddhas under one's control,

original: ces pa rang dbang du byed pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa rang dbang du byed pa'o //
translated: which means bringing them under one's power.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje sems pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje sems pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: Having performed the yoga of Vajrasattva in the manner taught in the Great Mandala,

original: de'i 'og tu gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
translated: then, having bound the great seal of Vajrasattva taught in the Great Mandala of the Image,🔽one should recite the mantra, “All tathāgatas, come here!🔽O holder of the vajra, come here!

original: sarbba ta th'a ga ta sa m'a dza:ma dha stha badzra p'a ni pa sha m'a na ya /

analyzed: de'i 'og tu gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pas 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /

analyzed: zla ba drug gam /

analyzed: lo gcig gi bar du bsgom par bya'o //

analyzed: mtshan thog thag bzlas shing 'bar ba'i lta ba'i lcags kyus thugs phul te bkug na dbang du 'gyur ro //

original: rdo rje spyan zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje spyan zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: rdo rje chos ni sngar bshad pa'i tshul nyid kyis rdo rje chos kyi rnal 'byor byas la /

analyzed: de'i 'og tu gzugs kyi dkyil 'khro las gsungs pa'i rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /

translated: one should visualize oneself as Vajradharma in the center of the assembly of all buddhas, reciting vajra-niḥ svabhava sarva-dharma mara-ya phat, as before.

original: de nas mtshan thog thag rang bzhin gyis rnams par dag par mos par byed cing bsgoms na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa thob pas /
analyzed: de nas mtshan thog thag rang bzhin gyis rnams par dag par mos par byed cing bsgoms na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa thob pas /
translated: Then, if one meditates on the night all the way through, thinking of it as naturally pure, one attains the state of abiding in the perfection of wisdom.

original: nye bar dmigs pa'i rang bzhin can gyis chos thams cad bdud byed cing gsod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: nye bar dmigs pa'i rang bzhin can gyis chos thams cad bdud byed cing gsod par 'gyur te /
translated: Then, one should kill all phenomena that have the nature of being perceived objects.

original: rgyud phyi ma las /
analyzed: rgyud phyi ma las /
translated: As the Later Tantra says:

original: bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
translated: If one kills, one attains power.

original: zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: As it says.

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams der yang gzhom mo zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams der yang gzhom mo zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: By means of this very meditative stabilization, the Tathagatas will also protect him.🔽With regard to “all vajras,” one should perform the yoga of vajra action as

original: rdo rje thams cad ces bya ba la rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje las kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje thams cad ces bya ba la rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje las kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: taught in the Great Mandala of the Vajra Realm.🔽Then, binding the great action seal of vajra action as taught in the Dhāraṇī

original: yang gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
analyzed: yang gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
translated: Mandala,🔽one should recite vajra-viśva-rakṣa sarva-vajraṇām, and meditate for one

original: badzra bi shva ra ksha sarba badzra ham zhes zlos shing snga ma bzhin du thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig gi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: badzra bi shva ra ksha sarba badzra ham zhes zlos shing snga ma bzhin du thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig gi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: month in four sessions, as before.

original: de nas mtshan thog thag bsgom mo //
analyzed: de nas mtshan thog thag bsgom mo //
translated: Then, one should meditate throughout the night.

original: de nas ni sgrub par bya ba'i sems can nam lha gang yin pa bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas ni sgrub par bya ba'i sems can nam lha gang yin pa bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, the sentient beings or deity to be accomplished will be protected.🔽With that and that collection of vajras, one should visualize a crossed vajra

original: rdo rje tshogs kyis byor ba de dang des badzra bi shva ra ksha sarba badzra na ham zhes bya bas spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
analyzed: rdo rje tshogs kyis byor ba de dang des badzra bi shva ra ksha sarba badzra na ham zhes bya bas spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
translated: on one’s head, reciting vajra-viśva-rakṣa sarva-vajraṇām.

original: de'i 'od zer gyi nang du bsgrub par bya ba chud par bsam mo //
analyzed: de'i 'od zer gyi nang du bsgrub par bya ba chud par bsam mo //
translated: One should imagine that the object of the rite is contained within those light rays.

original: dkyil 'khor 'dir ba'i dus su yang de ltar gnas srung ba byas na rlung dang char la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'dir ba'i dus su yang de ltar gnas srung ba byas na rlung dang char la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
translated: If one performs the protection of the site in this way at the time of the mandala, there will be no danger from wind, rain, and so on.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje gsang ba ni gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje gsang ba ni gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Then, etc. The vajra secret is the form mandala.

original: de'i phyag rgya ni sems ma rdo rje ma la @185a * //
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya ni sems ma rdo rje ma la @185a * //
translated: Its seal is the vajra mind consort, etc.

original: sogs pa'o // de'i ye shes ni nges pa ste /
analyzed: sogs pa'o // de'i ye shes ni nges pa ste /
translated: Its gnosis is the certainty.

original: de bslab po zhes pa ni nye bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de bslab po zhes pa ni nye bar bstan pa'o //
translated: One should train in that, i.e., one should teach it.

original: sems dpa'i rdo rje mnyam gzhag la //
analyzed: sems dpa'i rdo rje mnyam gzhag la //
translated: The vajra of the sattva is equipoise.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje rtse lnga ba bsgoms pa'i stobs kyi brtan par bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje rtse lnga ba bsgoms pa'i stobs kyi brtan par bya ba ste /
translated: This is the stability by the power of meditating on a five-pronged vajra on the moon mandala in one’s heart center.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: This is because it is said:

original: bdag gis bdag gi snying gar ni //🔽zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag gis bdag gi snying gar ni // zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: I am in my own heart center.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: Having performed the yoga of Vajrasattva as taught in the Great Mandala of the Vajra Realm,

original: de'i 'og tu gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje ma bcings te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje ma bcings te /
translated: then, having bound the sattva-vajri as taught in the Mandala of Form,

original: badzra guhyas ma ya aa: zhes zlos shing rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa kha dgo dmar po 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba kun du 'khrug pa bskyed la zla ba gnyis kyi bar du bsgo dmar bya'o //
analyzed: badzra guhyas ma ya aa: zhes zlos shing rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa kha dgo dmar po 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba kun du 'khrug pa bskyed la zla ba gnyis kyi bar du bsgo dmar bya'o //
translated: reciting vajra-guhya-samaya-artha, one should generate at one's heart center upon a moon mandala a five-pronged vajra with its open end facing upward, blazing with red light and intensely radiant, and one should visualize it between the two moons.

original: de nas yang zla ba gcig gi bar du spro ba dang bsdu pa'i skyor bas bsgoms la mthar mtshan gcig thog thag bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas yang zla ba gcig gi bar du spro ba dang bsdu pa'i skyor bas bsgoms la mthar mtshan gcig thog thag bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, for another month, one should meditate by the process of emanating and gathering, and finally one should meditate throughout the night.

original: de ltar sems dpa'i rdo rje mnyam par bzhag la /
analyzed: de ltar sems dpa'i rdo rje mnyam par bzhag la /
translated: Thus, having equipoised the sattva-vajra,

original: bdag gis bdag nyid kyi snying gar rdo rje'i lta bas ji skad du bshad pa bzhin du nges par lta shing rang gi snying gnas ji skad gsungs pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer gyi tshogs sbrul la des dbab par bya ba'i lus kun du bskang
analyzed: bdag gis bdag nyid kyi snying gar rdo rje'i lta bas ji skad du bshad pa bzhin du nges par lta shing rang gi snying gnas ji skad gsungs pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer gyi tshogs sbrul la des dbab par bya ba'i lus kun du bskang
translated: One should look at one’s own heart with the vajra gaze, as previously explained, and one should emanate from one’s heart a mass of light rays in the form of the sattva-vajra as previously described, and one should fill the body of the one to be brought down with it.

original: na / nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: na / nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one does so, he will certainly come down.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje rin chen gyi rnal 'byor gyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje rin chen ma bcings la rin chen rdo rje bsgrub par bya'o //🔽rdo rje chos kyi rnal 'byor gyis gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje chos ma bcings la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje rin chen gyi rnal 'byor gyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje rin chen ma bcings la rin chen rdo rje bsgrub par bya'o // rdo rje chos kyi rnal 'byor gyis gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje chos ma bcings la /
translated: Similarly, by the yoga of Vajraratna, one should accomplish Ratnarāja, without binding the Vajraratna mudra as taught in the Dhāraṇīsaṃbhāra Mandala.

original: chos kyi rdo rje bsgrub par bya'o //🔽las kyi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje las ma bcings la /
analyzed: chos kyi rdo rje bsgrub par bya'o // las kyi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje las ma bcings la /
translated: By the yoga of Vajradharma, one should accomplish Dharmavajrā, without binding the Vajradharma mudrā as taught in the Rūpasaṃbhava Mandala.

original: las kyi rdo rje bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: las kyi rdo rje bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: By the yoga of Karmavajra, one should accomplish Karmavajrā, without binding the Karmamudrā as taught in the Rūpasaṃbhava Mandala.

original: de ltar rin chen rdo rje la sogs pa'i sgrub pa byas na /
analyzed: de ltar rin chen rdo rje la sogs pa'i sgrub pa byas na /
translated: Thus, if one performs the rite of the jewel vajra,

original: phyis las kyi dus su yang de bzhin du rdo rje rin chen gyi rnal 'byor byas la rdo rje rin chen ma bcings te bsgrub par bya ba la 'bar ba'i lta bas lta shing rang gi snying gnas nor bu padma r'a ga'i 'od lta bu sprul la /
analyzed: phyis las kyi dus su yang de bzhin du rdo rje rin chen gyi rnal 'byor byas la rdo rje rin chen ma bcings te bsgrub par bya ba la 'bar ba'i lta bas lta shing rang gi snying gnas nor bu padma r'a ga'i 'od lta bu sprul la /
translated: later at the time of the rite, one should perform the yoga of the jewel vajra, and without binding the jewel vajra, one should summon the victim by looking with the blazing gaze.

original: des de'i lus nyi ma @185b nub pa lta bur bya bas dgug par bya'o //
analyzed: des de'i lus nyi ma @185b nub pa lta bur bya bas dgug par bya'o //
translated: One should emanate from one's heart a mass of light rays like the light of a ruby, and by making the body of the victim like a setting sun, one should summon him.

original: rdo rje chos kyi sbyor bas rdo rje chos ma bcings la /
analyzed: rdo rje chos kyi sbyor bas rdo rje chos ma bcings la /
translated: By the yoga of Vajradharma, one should summon the victim by binding Vajradharma,

original: snying gnas padma'i 'od zer gyi tshogs gdug pa sbrul la /
analyzed: snying gnas padma'i 'od zer gyi tshogs gdug pa sbrul la /
translated: emanating from one's heart a mass of light rays like a poisonous snake,

original: khro bo'i lta bas lta zhing des sems can gdug par rnams gzhom par bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i lta bas lta zhing des sems can gdug par rnams gzhom par bya'o //
translated: and looking with the wrathful gaze. One should destroy the poisonous beings.

original: rdo rje las kyi sbyor bas rdo rje las ma bcings la ;
analyzed: rdo rje las kyi sbyor bas rdo rje las ma bcings la ;
translated: By the yoga of Vajrakarma, one should summon the victim by binding Vajrakarma,

original: rang gi snying ga na sna tshogs rdo rje lta bu 'od zer gyi tshogs sbrul la /
analyzed: rang gi snying ga na sna tshogs rdo rje lta bu 'od zer gyi tshogs sbrul la /
translated: emanating from one's heart a mass of light rays like a multicolored vajra,🔽and looking with the gaze of the hero. One should summon the victim.

original: byams pa'i lta bas lta zhing bsgrub par bya ba de'i nang du chud par bsams na /
analyzed: byams pa'i lta bas lta zhing bsgrub par bya ba de'i nang du chud par bsams na /
translated: If one looks with the view of love and imagines that one includes that which is to be accomplished,

original: yang dag par bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag par bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will be perfectly protected.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i las gsungs pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor bya sla /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i las gsungs pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor bya sla /
translated: Then, etc. shows that the powers taught in the dhāraṇī maṇḍala are accomplished by the yoga of one’s deity taught in the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod bas kyang rnal 'byor chen po bsgrubs la /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod bas kyang rnal 'byor chen po bsgrubs la /
translated: and also by the yoga of Vajrasattva.

original: gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor dang rang bzhin dag tu yang lha rnams gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i phyag rgya ba zhis rgyas btab la ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor dang rang bzhin dag tu yang lha rnams gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i phyag rgya ba zhis rgyas btab la ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o zhes ston to //
translated: The deities in the maṇḍala of form and in the natural maṇḍala are sealed with the seals taught in the dhāraṇī maṇḍala, and one should accomplish them just as they are.

original: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po ste 'dir lag pa'i phyag rgya nyid kyi khyad par ni phyag rgya chen yin te gang gi phyir bris pa'i rjes su mthun par bcings pa yin la /
analyzed: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po ste 'dir lag pa'i phyag rgya nyid kyi khyad par ni phyag rgya chen yin te gang gi phyir bris pa'i rjes su mthun par bcings pa yin la /
translated: The great seal of the dhâraṇî maṇḍala is the great seal of the vajra secret. Here, the difference of the seal of the hand itself is the great seal, because it is bound in accordance with the drawing.

original: de rnams kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyis lha thams cad bri ba'i cho gar gnas kyis ku'i tshul gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyis lha thams cad bri ba'i cho gar gnas kyis ku'i tshul gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: The method of the seal of the sign of those is the method of drawing all the deities, not the method of the seal of the sign of the great seal.

original: 'on kyang sku ston par byed pas phyag rgya chen po zhes bshad do //
analyzed: 'on kyang sku ston par byed pas phyag rgya chen po zhes bshad do //
translated: However, it is explained as the great seal because it reveals the body.

original: bcing ba bslab po zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi bcing ba'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: bcing ba bslab po zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi bcing ba'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i don to ;
translated: Train in binding means the characteristic of binding those.

original: / rdo rje thal mo las byung ba //🔽gsang bya ba chen po rab tu bshad //
analyzed: / rdo rje thal mo las byung ba // gsang bya ba chen po rab tu bshad //
translated: Arisen from the vajra palms,🔽The great secret is fully explained.

original: ces bya ba ni shin tu pa bar bya ba nyid yin par phyir gsang ba chen po'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni shin tu pa bar bya ba nyid yin par phyir gsang ba chen po'o //
translated: It is the great secret because it is to be kept extremely secret.

original: 'dis ni gang du khyud par gyi dgag pa med pa der rdo rje thal mo ni phyag rgya chen po thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyu yin par ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni gang du khyud par gyi dgag pa med pa der rdo rje thal mo ni phyag rgya chen po thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyu yin par ston to //
translated: This shows that wherever there is no prohibition of embracing, the vajra palm is the cause of generating all great seals.

original: mthe bong gnyis ni bsnol byas la //
analyzed: mthe bong gnyis ni bsnol byas la //
translated: The two thumbs are crossed.

original: zhes bya ba ni mthe bong gnyis skyil khrung gi tshul du byas pa gang yin pa de ni mthe bong gnyis bsol ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mthe bong gnyis skyil khrung gi tshul du byas pa gang yin pa de ni mthe bong gnyis bsol ba zhes bya'o //
translated: That which is done with the two thumbs in the manner of a double vajra cross is called “the two thumbs crossed.”

original: mdzub mo'i rtse mo bkug pas ni //
analyzed: mdzub mo'i rtse mo bkug pas ni //
translated: The tips of the two index fingers are bent.

original: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo yang yin la rtse mo bkug pa yang yin pas na de skad ces bya'o//🔽@186a * // mdzub mo bkug pa de yang gung mo gnyis bsnyams pa'i tshigs bar mar sbyar bar bya ba yin pas na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo yang yin la rtse mo bkug pa yang yin pas na de skad ces bya'o// @186a * // mdzub mo bkug pa de yang gung mo gnyis bsnyams pa'i tshigs bar mar sbyar bar bya ba yin pas na /
translated: That which is done with the two index fingers bent is called “the tips of the two index fingers bent.”

original: gung mo bsnyams pa'i tshigs su sbyar //
analyzed: gung mo bsnyams pa'i tshigs su sbyar //
translated: And that bending of the index fingers is to be joined to the middle of the two middle fingers pressed together,🔽so it is said, “joined to the middle of the two middle fingers pressed together.”

original: zhes bya'o // 'di'i ming ji skad ces bya zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // 'di'i ming ji skad ces bya zhe na /
translated: What is the name of this seal?

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //🔽ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad // ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is explained as the queen of the vajra realm.

original: rdo rje dbyings rnams kyi dbang mo ste /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings rnams kyi dbang mo ste /
translated: It is the queen of the vajra realms.

original: gtso bo ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang po rnam par snang mdzad yin la de'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gtso bo ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang po rnam par snang mdzad yin la de'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo zhes bya'o //
translated: The principal one is Vajradhātvīśvara Vairocana, and the mudrā of that is called Vajradhātvīśvarī.

original: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /🔽rdo rje thal mo'i ma the bo g-yon pas g-yas pa mnan la /
analyzed: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te / rdo rje thal mo'i ma the bo g-yon pas g-yas pa mnan la /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.🔽The base of the right thumb is pressed by the left thumb in the vajra palm.

original: mdzub mo g-yas pa'i rtsa ba g-yon pas mnan te /
analyzed: mdzub mo g-yas pa'i rtsa ba g-yon pas mnan te /
translated: The base of the right forefinger is pressed by the left forefinger.

original: mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu lta bur byas la gung mo'i tshigs bar ma'i steng du gzhag go //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu lta bur byas la gung mo'i tshigs bar ma'i steng du gzhag go //
translated: The two forefingers are made like hooks and placed on top of the middle joint of the middle fingers.

original: gung mo ral gri lta bur tshigs gsum par dgug par bya'o //
analyzed: gung mo ral gri lta bur tshigs gsum par dgug par bya'o //
translated: The middle fingers are bent at the third joint like a sword.

original: dbyings rnams kyi dbang phyug ni gtso bo yin pas na rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ni rnam par snang mdzad yin la /
analyzed: dbyings rnams kyi dbang phyug ni gtso bo yin pas na rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ni rnam par snang mdzad yin la /
translated: Since the lord of the realms is the principal one, Vajradhātvīśvarī is Vairocana.

original: 'di de'i phyag rgya yin pas na /🔽rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
analyzed: 'di de'i phyag rgya yin pas na / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
translated: Since this is his mudrā,🔽it is Vajradhātvīśvarī.

original: de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya //
analyzed: de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya //
translated: That itself is the vajra of the middle fingers.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma nyid kyi gung mo gnyis sbyar la rtse mor byas pa yin gyi /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma nyid kyi gung mo gnyis sbyar la rtse mor byas pa yin gyi /
translated: This is the gesture of Vajradhātvīśvarī herself, with the two middle fingers joined and forming a point.

original: rdo rje thal mo ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the vajra-palms.

original: rdo rje thal mor khas blangs par gyur na de nyid ces brjod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje thal mor khas blangs par gyur na de nyid ces brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: If one accepts the vajra-palms, one should not say “that very” gesture.

original: de'i dbang du byas pa dang 'brel pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dbang du byas pa dang 'brel pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is not related to that.

original: 'dis ni mi bskyod pa'i gnas su rdo rje thugs rdo rje ma dang / sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni mi bskyod pa'i gnas su rdo rje thugs rdo rje ma dang / sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the gesture of Akṣobhya’s abode, Vajracitta, and Vajrasattva.

original: gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya //
analyzed: gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya //
translated: The two middle fingers are made into a jewel.

original: zhes bya ba ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyad par du bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyad par du bya ba'i don te /
translated: The word “that” has the sense of distinguishing.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo de nyid las gung mo gnyis rgyab tu bskum la /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo de nyid las gung mo gnyis rgyab tu bskum la /
translated: From that very Vajradhātvīśvarī, the two middle fingers are bent back,

original: rin po che dang 'dra bar byas pa ni /
analyzed: rin po che dang 'dra bar byas pa ni /
translated: and made like a jewel.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rang gi dbang bskur ba dang rdo rje rin chen ma'i'o //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rang gi dbang bskur ba dang rdo rje rin chen ma'i'o //
translated: This is the gesture of Ratnasaṃbhava’s abode, self-consecration, and Vajraratna.

original: padmo srin lag mthe'u chung gung //🔽zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma de nyid las gung mo dang srin lag dang / mthe'u chung padma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa ni /
analyzed: padmo srin lag mthe'u chung gung // zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma de nyid las gung mo dang srin lag dang / mthe'u chung padma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa ni /
translated: The lotus, ring finger, and little finger extended

original: mtshon cha zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje chos ma'i'o //
analyzed: mtshon cha zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje chos ma'i'o //
translated: is the mudra of Vajra Dharma.

original: lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang //🔽zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma de nyid kyi lag mthil phan @186b tshun sprad la sor mo thams cad brkyang ba ni /
analyzed: lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang // zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma de nyid kyi lag mthil phan @186b tshun sprad la sor mo thams cad brkyang ba ni /
translated: The fingers of the hands fully extended

original: rdo rje kun zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje las ma'i'o //
analyzed: rdo rje kun zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje las ma'i'o //
translated: is the mudra of Vajra Karma.

original: de ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma las byung ba'i phyag rgya rnams bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma las byung ba'i phyag rgya rnams bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the mudras that arise from the Vajradhatviśvarī,

original: da ni mdzub mo rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'i phyag rgya rnams ston te /
analyzed: da ni mdzub mo rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'i phyag rgya rnams ston te /
translated: now, beginning with the index finger vajra, he teaches the mudras that arise from the vajra-folded-hand.

original: rdo rje thal mo'i mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun sbyar te rtse mor byas pa 'di ni mdzub mo rdo rje ste kun du bzang mo'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo'i mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun sbyar te rtse mor byas pa 'di ni mdzub mo rdo rje ste kun du bzang mo'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The two index fingers of the vajra-palms are crossed and made into tips: this is the index-finger-vajra, the seal of Samantabhadrī.

original: mdzub mo gnyis zhes bya ba rdo rje thal mo'i mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu gnyis su byas pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa lcags kyu ma'i'o //🔽de nyid mthe bo gnyis kyis spas //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis zhes bya ba rdo rje thal mo'i mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu gnyis su byas pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa lcags kyu ma'i'o // de nyid mthe bo gnyis kyis spas //
translated: The two index fingers are hooks: this is the seal of the Tathāgata-hook,

original: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu'i mthe bong gnyis bsgreng bas mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyu'i tshigs gsum pa'i sor mo la bkab ba ni dga' ba la chags ma'i'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu'i mthe bong gnyis bsgreng bas mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyu'i tshigs gsum pa'i sor mo la bkab ba ni dga' ba la chags ma'i'o //
translated: with the two thumbs pressing on the joints of the three sections of the two hooks.🔽This is the seal of Ratiśrī.

original: legs pa sbyin dang zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo'i mdzub mo dang mthe bos se gol brdabs pa ni legs ldan ma'i'o //
analyzed: legs pa sbyin dang zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo'i mdzub mo dang mthe bos se gol brdabs pa ni legs ldan ma'i'o //
translated: The two thumbs and index fingers of the vajra-palms snap: this is the seal of Bhadra.

original: mdzub mo rin chen zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mdzub mo rin chen zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The two index fingers are jewels.

original: rdo rje thal mo'i mdzub mo gnyis rgyab bkug nas rin po che 'dra bar byas pa ni rin po che'i gtso mo'i 'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo'i mdzub mo gnyis rgyab bkug nas rin po che 'dra bar byas pa ni rin po che'i gtso mo'i 'o //
translated: The vajra-palms with the two index fingers bent backward and made like a jewel is that of Ratnatārā.

original: mdzub mo rin chen can 'od 'bar //
analyzed: mdzub mo rin chen can 'od 'bar //
translated: The blazing jewel index fingers

original: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo rin chen can zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo'i mdzub mo rin po che lta bur byas la sor mo gzhan thams cad brkyang ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo rin chen can zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo'i mdzub mo rin po che lta bur byas la sor mo gzhan thams cad brkyang ste /
translated: means that from that very mudra, the two vajra-palms with the index fingers made like jewels and all the other fingers extended

original: 'od zer 'bar ba lta bur bya ba 'di ni rin po che'i sgron ma'i'o //
analyzed: 'od zer 'bar ba lta bur bya ba 'di ni rin po che'i sgron ma'i'o //
translated: are like blazing light rays. This is the mudra of Ratnapradīpā.

original: srin lag gshibs la mthe'u rin chen //
analyzed: srin lag gshibs la mthe'u rin chen //
translated: The two ring fingers joined, the two little fingers like jewels,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo las srin lag gnyis gshibs shing sbyar la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo las srin lag gnyis gshibs shing sbyar la /
translated: means that from the vajra-palms, the two ring fingers are joined and extended,

original: mthe'u chung gnyis rgyab bskum ste rin po che ltar byas pa 'di ni rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ma'i'o //
analyzed: mthe'u chung gnyis rgyab bskum ste rin po che ltar byas pa 'di ni rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ma'i'o //
translated: and the two little fingers are bent backward and made like a jewel. This is the mudra of Ketudhvajaratnottarā.

original: de nyid yongs su bskor ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid yongs su bskor ba'o //
translated: That very mudra turned around🔽is the mudra of Ratnasaṃbhavā.

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ma'i phyag rgya de nyid bzhad pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor ba ni bzhad ma dang ldan ma'i'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ma'i phyag rgya de nyid bzhad pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor ba ni bzhad ma dang ldan ma'i'o //
translated: This is the mudra of the banner-top ornament, which is the same as the mudra of the banner-top ornament.

original: kun gyi rtse mo rab tu 'gyed //
analyzed: kun gyi rtse mo rab tu 'gyed //
translated: The fully extended tips of all fingers

original: ces bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo las sor mo thams cad brkyang ste padma cung zad kha 'byed pa lta bur gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje padma'i'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo las sor mo thams cad brkyang ste padma cung zad kha 'byed pa lta bur gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje padma'i'o //
translated: means that from the vajra palms all the fingers are extended and placed like a slightly opened lotus. This is the mudra of the vajra lotus.

original: mthe bong mthe'u chung bar du gzhug / ces @187a * //
analyzed: mthe bong mthe'u chung bar du gzhug / ces @187a * //
translated: The thumbs and little fingers are inserted

original: bya ba ni mthe bong mnyam pa nang du gnas pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: bya ba ni mthe bong mnyam pa nang du gnas pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: means that the thumbs are equal and inserted inside. That is what it is called.

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /🔽rdo rje thal mo las mthe bong gnyis bsnyams la nang du bcug nas gzhag pa 'di ni kun du 'dzin ma'i'o //
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te / rdo rje thal mo las mthe bong gnyis bsnyams la nang du bcug nas gzhag pa 'di ni kun du 'dzin ma'i'o //
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.🔽From the vajra palms, the two thumbs are pressed together and inserted inside. This is the mudra of the all-embracer.

original: sor mo rab tu 'khor lo brkyang //
analyzed: sor mo rab tu 'khor lo brkyang //
translated: The fully extended wheel of fingers

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje thal mo'i dbyibs las de dag cung zad kha phye ba ni 'khor lo thams cad ma'i'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje thal mo'i dbyibs las de dag cung zad kha phye ba ni 'khor lo thams cad ma'i'o //
translated: This is the gesture of the vajra palms, slightly opened, of all the wheels.

original: de nyid kyang ni kha nas dbyung //
analyzed: de nyid kyang ni kha nas dbyung //
translated: And also that itself is emitted from the mouth.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo thams cad ma'i'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo thams cad ma'i'o //
translated: This is the gesture of all the wheels.

original: phyag rgya nyid kha nas steng du tshig 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha nas dbyung ba ni stong du zlos ma'i phyag rgya'o//
analyzed: phyag rgya nyid kha nas steng du tshig 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha nas dbyung ba ni stong du zlos ma'i phyag rgya'o//
translated: The gesture itself is emitted from the mouth, as if the words were being uttered from the mouth. This is the gesture of the one who recites a thousand times.

original: mthe bong brkyang ste rdo rje dag ba //
analyzed: mthe bong brkyang ste rdo rje dag ba //
translated: The thumbs extended, the vajra fingers

original: ces bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo las mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtsa ba mthe bo gnyis gshibs pas yang dgab pa 'di ni dngos grub kyi gtso mo'i'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo las mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtsa ba mthe bo gnyis gshibs pas yang dgab pa 'di ni dngos grub kyi gtso mo'i'o //
translated: This is the gesture of the chief of the siddhas. From the vajra palms, the two index fingers are at the base, and the two thumbs are side by side.

original: mdzub mo bsnyams nas nang du gzhug //
analyzed: mdzub mo bsnyams nas nang du gzhug //
translated: The index fingers are joined and inserted inside.

original: ces bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo las mdzub mo gnyis bsnyams la nang du ste mthe bo gnyis kyi rtsa bar bcug la rdo rje thal mo byas pa'i mthe bong gnyis kyis bkab pa 'di ni thams cad srung ma'i'o //🔽mthe ba gnyis dbye ba de nyid las //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo las mdzub mo gnyis bsnyams la nang du ste mthe bo gnyis kyi rtsa bar bcug la rdo rje thal mo byas pa'i mthe bong gnyis kyis bkab pa 'di ni thams cad srung ma'i'o // mthe ba gnyis dbye ba de nyid las //
translated: the two thumbs are separated and placed at the mouth.

original: zhes bya ba ni thams cad srung ma'i phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bong gnyis phye la khar gzhag pa ni mdangs slar 'phrog ma'i'o //🔽de nas nang du rdo rjer bya //🔽zhes bya ba ni mdangs slar 'phrog ma'i phyag rgya nyid las mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thams cad srung ma'i phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bong gnyis phye la khar gzhag pa ni mdangs slar 'phrog ma'i'o // de nas nang du rdo rjer bya // zhes bya ba ni mdangs slar 'phrog ma'i phyag rgya nyid las mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug la /
translated: This is the summoning of splendor.🔽Then, the two thumbs are inserted inside,

original: rang rang gi mthe'u chung dang srin lag gnyis kyi bar du gtad /
analyzed: rang rang gi mthe'u chung dang srin lag gnyis kyi bar du gtad /
translated: and the two little fingers and ring fingers are placed between them.🔽The two index fingers are joined and placed on the back.

original: mdzub mo sbyar te rgyab tu gzhag pa 'di ni gzungs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin no //
analyzed: mdzub mo sbyar te rgyab tu gzhag pa 'di ni gzungs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin no //
translated: This is the great seal of the dhāraṇī.

original: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya chen po nyid yin par 'dod do //
analyzed: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya chen po nyid yin par 'dod do //
translated: The pledge seals of Vajra Elegance and so forth up to Vajra Rain🔽are the great pledge seals taught in the Great Maòçala of Vajra Realm,

original: rdo rje gsang ba de rnams ni //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba de rnams ni //
translated: and they are the great seals in the Retention Maòçala.🔽The secret vajras

original: rdo rje bcings las byung ba yin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
