analyzed: rdo rje bcings las byung ba yin // zhes bya ba la /
translated: arise from the vajra bond.

original: rdo rje ni 'dir mi bskyod pa'i rigs rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje ni 'dir mi bskyod pa'i rigs rnams so //
translated: Here, the vajras are the families of Aköobhya.

original: de'i gsang ba ni gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de'i gsang ba ni gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Their secret is the secret pledge seals.

original: phyag rgya chen po rnams ni rdo rje thal mo las byung ba 'di rnams ni rdo rje bsdams pa las byung bas de rnams kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig @187b gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po rnams ni rdo rje thal mo las byung ba 'di rnams ni rdo rje bsdams pa las byung bas de rnams kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig @187b gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The great seals arise from the vajra palm, and these arise from the vajra bond. Therefore, they are the secret pledge seals.

original: 'di rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
translated: Their characteristics should be understood as follows.

original: rdo rje bcing ba bcings pa'i mdzub mo rdo rje ni kun du bzang mo'i'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bcing ba bcings pa'i mdzub mo rdo rje ni kun du bzang mo'i'o //
translated: The vajra-binding with the vajra-tips of the index fingers is that of Samantabhadrī.

original: mdzub gnyis rtse ni de bzhin gshegs pa lcags kyu ma'i'o //
analyzed: mdzub gnyis rtse ni de bzhin gshegs pa lcags kyu ma'i'o //
translated: The tips of the two index fingers are the tathāgata-hook of Ākāśagarbhe.

original: mthe bo gnyis kyis spas pa ni dga' ba la chags ma'i'o //
analyzed: mthe bo gnyis kyis spas pa ni dga' ba la chags ma'i'o //
translated: The two thumbs touching is that of Ratiśrī.

original: legs pa sbyin pa ni legs ldan ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: legs pa sbyin pa ni legs ldan ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The boon-granting mudrā is the pledge seal of Bhavavati.

original: chos kyi gsang ba'i mtshan rnams ni //
analyzed: chos kyi gsang ba'i mtshan rnams ni //
translated: The names of the secret dharmas

original: thal mo nang du bkug pas so //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: thal mo nang du bkug pas so // zhes bya ba la /
translated: are with the palms turned inward.

original: chos ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs te de gsang ba ni gsang ba rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: chos ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs te de gsang ba ni gsang ba rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The dharma is the family of Amitābha. Its secret is the pledge seal of the secret ones.

original: thal mo ni thal mo khong stong ngo //
analyzed: thal mo ni thal mo khong stong ngo //
translated: The palms are the hollowed palms.

original: de'i nang ni nang nyid du ste /
analyzed: de'i nang ni nang nyid du ste /
translated: Inwardly is the interior.

original: nang der tshul 'dra bar byas shing bsgoms pas bsgrub par gyur ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: nang der tshul 'dra bar byas shing bsgoms pas bsgrub par gyur ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: That which is accomplished by making and meditating on that interior is called that.

original: thal mo nad du bkug pa'i mtshan ma rnams kyis chos kyi gsang ba de nyid rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'i gsang ba rnams kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: thal mo nad du bkug pa'i mtshan ma rnams kyis chos kyi gsang ba de nyid rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'i gsang ba rnams kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa yin no //
translated: The secret of the Dharma is the seal of the secrets of the vajra palms, which arise from the vajra palms.

original: 'di skad ston te thal mo sbyar ba'i nang du sor mo thams cad brkyang la cung zad kha bye ba'i padma lta bur gzhag pa ni rdo rje padmo'i'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ston te thal mo sbyar ba'i nang du sor mo thams cad brkyang la cung zad kha bye ba'i padma lta bur gzhag pa ni rdo rje padmo'i'o //
translated: This is what is taught: all the fingers are extended inside the joined palms, and the palms are placed like a slightly open lotus. This is the vajra lotus.

original: thal mo sbyar la mthe bong gnyis par du bcug nas gzhag pa ni kun 'dzin ma'i'o //
analyzed: thal mo sbyar la mthe bong gnyis par du bcug nas gzhag pa ni kun 'dzin ma'i'o //
translated: The palms are joined, and the two thumbs are inserted in the palms and placed there. This is the universal seal.

original: thal mo sbyar ba btsangs la nang du rdo rje thal mor byas te /
analyzed: thal mo sbyar ba btsangs la nang du rdo rje thal mor byas te /
translated: The joined palms are opened, and the vajra palms are placed inside.

original: sor mo'i rtse mo phan tshun ma 'byar bar gzhag pa ni 'khor lo thams cad ma'i'o //
analyzed: sor mo'i rtse mo phan tshun ma 'byar bar gzhag pa ni 'khor lo thams cad ma'i'o //
translated: The tips of the fingers are not joined. This is the seal of all wheels.

original: 'di nyid kha nas dbyung ba ni stong du zlos pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //🔽las kyi gsang ba nang gnas pa'i //
analyzed: 'di nyid kha nas dbyung ba ni stong du zlos pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o // las kyi gsang ba nang gnas pa'i //
translated: This very [mudra] is brought out from the mouth, and is the secret pledge seal of the one who recites a thousand times.🔽The secret of action is taught by the signs

original: mtshan mas las su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan mas las su bstan pa'o //
translated: that abide within.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dir don yod par grub pa'i rigs ni las so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dir don yod par grub pa'i rigs ni las so //
translated: The family of Amoghasiddhi is the activity family.

original: de'i gsang ba ni gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gsang ba rnams te /
analyzed: de'i gsang ba ni gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gsang ba rnams te /
translated: His secret is the secret of the pledge seal.

original: rdo rje thal mo nang du bcings ba'i nang du mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtsa ba'i tshigs su mthe bo gnyis sbyar bas dgag pa 'di ni dngos grub kyi gtso mo'i'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo nang du bcings ba'i nang du mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtsa ba'i tshigs su mthe bo gnyis sbyar bas dgag pa 'di ni dngos grub kyi gtso mo'i'o //
translated: The pledge seal of the principal of the activity family is formed by binding the vajra palms together and placing the two thumbs at the base of the two index fingers, which are crossed.

original: rdo rje thal mo nang du bcings pa'i nang du mdzub mo bsnyams la mthe bo'i rtsa bar bzhag nas mthe bo gnyis kyis bkab pa 'di ni thams cad srung ma'i'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo nang du bcings pa'i nang du mdzub mo bsnyams la mthe bo'i rtsa bar bzhag nas mthe bo gnyis kyis bkab pa 'di ni thams cad srung ma'i'o //
translated: The pledge seal of the protector of all is formed by binding the vajra palms together and placing the two thumbs at the base of the two index fingers, which are crossed, and covering them with the two thumbs.🔽The pledge seal of the protector of all is the same as the pledge seal of the principal of the activity family.

original: thams cad srung ma'i phyag rgya nyid las gang gi mthe bo gnyis phye la khar gzhag pa ni mdangs slar @188a * //
analyzed: thams cad srung ma'i phyag rgya nyid las gang gi mthe bo gnyis phye la khar gzhag pa ni mdangs slar @188a * //
translated: The pledge seal of the one who takes away poison is formed by separating the two thumbs of the pledge seal of the protector of all and placing them at the mouth.

original: 'phrog ma'i'o // mdangs slar 'phrog ma'i phyag rgya nyid de ltar bzhag la mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo rgyab sprad la mthe bo gnyis sbyar nas rang rang gi mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi bar du gzhag pa 'di ni gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya
analyzed: 'phrog ma'i'o // mdangs slar 'phrog ma'i phyag rgya nyid de ltar bzhag la mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo rgyab sprad la mthe bo gnyis sbyar nas rang rang gi mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi bar du gzhag pa 'di ni gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya
translated: This is the secret pledge seal of the dhāraṇī mudra.

original: gsang ba'o // de ltar na nang na gnas pa'i mtshan ma rnams kyis las la rab tu bstan pas /
analyzed: gsang ba'o // de ltar na nang na gnas pa'i mtshan ma rnams kyis las la rab tu bstan pas /
translated: Thus, the signs that exist internally are fully taught by the activities.

original: las kyi gsang bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: las kyi gsang bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the activities are secret.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i ni phyag rgya chen po nyid dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i sbyor bas gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang bar 'gyur bar shes par bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i ni phyag rgya chen po nyid dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i sbyor bas gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang bar 'gyur bar shes par bya ste /
translated: The secret pledge seal of Vajradhātvīśvarī and so on should be understood as the secret pledge seal of the great seal itself, which is accomplished by the yoga of the pledge seal.

original: gzhan du na dam tshig gi phyag rgya las gyur ba'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i sgrub pa med par 'gyur ro //🔽yi ge aa la sogs pa'i chos kyi yi he rnams ni kun du bzang mo nas brtsam ste /
analyzed: gzhan du na dam tshig gi phyag rgya las gyur ba'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i sgrub pa med par 'gyur ro // yi ge aa la sogs pa'i chos kyi yi he rnams ni kun du bzang mo nas brtsam ste /
translated: Otherwise, there would be no practice of Vajradhātvīśvarī and so on, which are pledge seals.🔽The Dharma seals beginning with the letter A are the Dharma seals beginning with Samantabhadrī

original: gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i bar gyi chos kyi phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i bar gyi chos kyi phyag rgya yin no //
translated: up to the seal of retention.

original: lhag ma rnams kyi ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyi ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The remaining seals should be understood as taught in the Great Mandala of the Vajra Element.

original: gsang ba'i phyag rgya gnyis byas nas //
analyzed: gsang ba'i phyag rgya gnyis byas nas //
translated: Having made the two secret seals,

original: las kyi phyag rgya rnams su bya //
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya rnams su bya //
translated: one should make the action seals.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi sku'i gsang ba ston par byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni gsang ba'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi sku'i gsang ba ston par byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni gsang ba'i phyag rgya ste /
translated: The great seal that reveals the secret of the body of Vajradhātvīśvarī and so on up to Vajra Arapacana is the secret seal.

original: de gnyis su byas nas rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i tshul du las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de gnyis su byas nas rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i tshul du las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Having made those two, one should bind the action seal in the manner taught in the Vajra Realm.

original: de la tshul ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la tshul ni 'di yin te /
translated: The method is as follows:

original: g-yon pa'i rdo rje sor mo ni //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rdo rje sor mo ni //
translated: The fingers of the left vajra

original: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya'o //
translated: are extended inside the right.

original: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste //
analyzed: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste //
translated: This is the mudra of supreme enlightenment,

original: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o //
translated: which grants the enlightenment of the buddhas.

original: mi g-yo ba yi reg pa ste //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba yi reg pa ste //
translated: The touch of Akṣobhya

original: de bzhin rin chen mchog sbyin pa'o /
analyzed: de bzhin rin chen mchog sbyin pa'o /
translated: is likewise the supreme gift of the jewel.🔽The supreme samadhi of Amitayus

original: tshe dpag med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mchog / gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin //
analyzed: tshe dpag med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mchog / gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin //
translated: is the gift of fearlessness.

original: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams //
analyzed: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams //
translated: Then, the action seals

original: mdor bsdus pa ni bshad par bya //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa ni bshad par bya //
translated: are explained in brief.

original: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams //
analyzed: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams //
translated: The heroes such as Vajrasattva

original: rdo rje las rnams byed pa ste //🔽bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyi ga yis //
analyzed: rdo rje las rnams byed pa ste // bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyi ga yis //
translated: are the vajra actions.🔽With both hands extended and proud,🔽one abides like holding a hook,🔽in the manner of shooting an arrow,

original: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang // mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul dang ni //
analyzed: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang // mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul dang ni //
translated: and with the palms joined.

original: legs so @188b zhes pas snying gar gzhag / dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje yis //
analyzed: legs so @188b zhes pas snying gar gzhag / dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje yis //
translated: The empowerment is conferred with the vajra,

original: snying gar nyi ma bstan par bya //
analyzed: snying gar nyi ma bstan par bya //
translated: and the sun is shown at the heart.

original: g-yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs //
analyzed: g-yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs //
translated: The elbow is placed on the left,

original: de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya //
analyzed: de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya //
translated: and likewise one should turn in a circle.

original: g-yas pa yis ni g-yon par dbye //
analyzed: g-yas pa yis ni g-yon par dbye //
translated: The right [hand] separates the left,

original: snying gar g-yon pa ral gri 'dud //
analyzed: snying gar g-yon pa ral gri 'dud //
translated: and the left sword is lowered to the heart.🔽The whirling firebrand,

original: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang // rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung //🔽rdo rje gar bskor bkrol ba yi //
analyzed: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang // rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung // rdo rje gar bskor bkrol ba yi //
translated: and the two vajras are expelled from the mouth.🔽The palms are placed on the cheeks and the head,🔽the armor, the little finger, the supreme fangs,

original: thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag / go cha mthe'u chung mche ba mchog / khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o //
analyzed: thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag / go cha mthe'u chung mche ba mchog / khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o //
translated: and the two fists are pressed together.

original: rdo rje 'gying ba'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'gying ba'i tshul gyis so //
translated: With the manner of the proud vajra,

original: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud par bya//
analyzed: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud par bya//
translated: one bows with a wavering mind.

original: phreng ba bcing dang kha nas dbyung //🔽rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin //
analyzed: phreng ba bcing dang kha nas dbyung // rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin //
translated: The garland is bound and expelled from the mouth.🔽The vajra dance is whirling.

original: rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni //
translated: With the manner of the vajra fist,

original: bdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyin //
analyzed: bdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyin //
translated: the incense and so forth are likewise offered.

original: sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yi //
translated: This is the offering to all buddhas.

original: phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa'o //🔽mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa'o // mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni //
translated: One should make the offering of the seal.🔽The binding of the hook of the index finger

original: mthe chung las te lcags kyu che ;
analyzed: mthe chung las te lcags kyu che ;
translated: is the great hook from the little finger.

original: / mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub ba gnyis gdub //
analyzed: / mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub ba gnyis gdub //
translated: The two index fingers are bracelets,

original: rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan //
analyzed: rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan //
translated: and the two backs are also pressed together.

original: zhes bya'o // dam tshig mchog ni ji snyed pa //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // dam tshig mchog ni ji snyed pa //
translated: As many as are the supreme commitments,

original: gnyis su phral nas de bzhin no //
analyzed: gnyis su phral nas de bzhin no //
translated: one should do likewise, having split into two.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ltar phyag rgya chen po gnyis su byas nas byang chub mchog la sogs pa las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ltar phyag rgya chen po gnyis su byas nas byang chub mchog la sogs pa las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba de bzhin du /
translated: This means that having made the great seal like a vajra into two, one should bind the action seal of supreme enlightenment, etc.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas nas sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis bcings pa ni las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas nas sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis bcings pa ni las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: In the same way, having made the commitment seal into two, one should bind it in the manner previously explained, and it becomes the action seal.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya las byung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya 'di rnams kyi sgrub pa ni grub pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya las byung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya 'di rnams kyi sgrub pa ni grub pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: The accomplishment of these action seals that arise from the commitment seals is the cause of attainment.

original: sa ma ya stva zhes bya ba 'di ni sngags te /
analyzed: sa ma ya stva zhes bya ba 'di ni sngags te /
translated: This is the mantra:

original: 'di brjod cing bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di brjod cing bcing bar bya'o //
translated: This should be recited and bound.

original: de'i 'og tu rang rang gi gzungs kyi rig pas las rnams la sbyar bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu rang rang gi gzungs kyi rig pas las rnams la sbyar bar bgyi'o //
translated: Then, with one’s own dhāraṇī knowledge, one should apply it to the rites.

original: de ltar byas pas cing 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar byas pas cing 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What will happen if one does it in this way?

original: bdag gi bcings pas grub pa ni //
analyzed: bdag gi bcings pas grub pa ni //
translated: The accomplishment of one’s own bondage

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: is taught.

original: bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid bcings pas sgrub pa po'i 'dod pa'i don stsol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid bcings pas sgrub pa po'i 'dod pa'i don stsol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By binding oneself, the adept will be granted the desired aim.

original: ji ltar bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bu zhe na /
translated: How so?🔽The self of the bliss of desire

original: 'dod la chags pa'i bde ba'i bdag / ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dod la chags pa'i bde ba'i bdag / ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: is taught.

original: 'dod par bya ba yin pas na 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod par bya ba yin pas na 'dod pa ste /
translated: That which is to be desired is desire.

original: byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can rdo rje sems dpa' ni mngon par 'dod par bya ba nyid @189a * //
analyzed: byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can rdo rje sems dpa' ni mngon par 'dod par bya ba nyid @189a * //
translated: Vajrasattva, who has the character of enlightenment, is to be desired.

original: yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is what it means.

original: der chags pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags te /
analyzed: der chags pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags te /
translated: Attachment to that is the desire of desire.

original: des bde ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rang gi rang gi rgyud 'di la yod pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
analyzed: des bde ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rang gi rang gi rgyud 'di la yod pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
translated: By that, the self of bliss exists in one’s own continuum. This is what is taught.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar mtshan ma thob pa'i sems kyis las kyi phyag rgya rnams 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan dag la na ma yin no //🔽de bas na dam tshig gi phyag rgya las byung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya 'di rnams lhag par gcig kyang ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar mtshan ma thob pa'i sems kyis las kyi phyag rgya rnams 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan dag la na ma yin no // de bas na dam tshig gi phyag rgya las byung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya 'di rnams lhag par gcig kyang ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Because in this way, the karmamudrās are accomplished by the mind that has attained the signs, not by others.

original: dus kun du ni bcing ma bya //
analyzed: dus kun du ni bcing ma bya //
translated: Therefore, these karmamudrās that arise from the samaya mudrā are superior, and not even one of them should be bound at all times.

original: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus it is stated.

original: 'o na 'di dag dus gang gi tshe bcing zhe na /🔽gsang ba'am ni don che la //
analyzed: 'o na 'di dag dus gang gi tshe bcing zhe na / gsang ba'am ni don che la //
translated: Now, when are they bound?🔽The wise should apply them

original: mkhas pa yis ni sbyar bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: mkhas pa yis ni sbyar bar bya // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: in secret or for great purpose.🔽Regarding that, secret activities are as follows:

original: de la gsang ba'i bya ba ni ji ltar rgyud phyi ma las bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bris la /
analyzed: de la gsang ba'i bya ba ni ji ltar rgyud phyi ma las bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bris la /
translated: Just as in the continuation of the tantra, draw the maṇḍala as it is,

original: gzungs kyi lha mo rnams mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: gzungs kyi lha mo rnams mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: make offerings to the dhāraṇī goddesses with all offerings, bind the karmamudrā,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis /
translated: and with the samādhi of Vajrasattva,

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgoms la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgoms la /
translated: Having meditated on the recollection of the Buddha,

original: bud med lus kyi bu gar zhugs //
analyzed: bud med lus kyi bu gar zhugs //
translated: one enters the vagina of the woman,

original: bud med rnams ni dbang du 'gyur //
analyzed: bud med rnams ni dbang du 'gyur //
translated: and the women will be brought under one's control.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa don chen po dang / dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa don chen po dang / dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba'i phyir /
translated: Thus, for the sake of the great meaning and for the sake of the commitments and initiation,

original: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba gang yin pa ste /
translated: one should draw the retention mandala.🔽And there, one should apply these karma-consorts who arise from the commitment-consorts, with skill in union.

original: der yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya las byung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya 'di dag sbyor ba la mkhas pas sbyar bar bya ba yin pas de bas na /
analyzed: der yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya las byung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya 'di dag sbyor ba la mkhas pas sbyar bar bya ba yin pas de bas na /
translated: Therefore, it is said,

original: mkhas ba yis ni sbyar bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: mkhas ba yis ni sbyar bar bya // zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
translated: one should apply them with skill.

original: mkhas pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya rgyu las byung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid shes pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mkhas pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya rgyu las byung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid shes pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Skill means knowing the reality of the karma-consorts who arise from the cause of the commitment-consorts.

original: sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i dus su yang sgrub pa pos 'di rnams ci'i phyir sbyar bar mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i dus su yang sgrub pa pos 'di rnams ci'i phyir sbyar bar mi bya zhe na /
translated: If one asks, Why should the adept not apply these at the time of prior service and so forth?🔽Therefore, it is said,

original: de'i phyir 'di dag kun la bdag nyid gnas //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di dag kun la bdag nyid gnas //
translated: one should abide in all of these.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: gang gi phyir kun gyi bdag nyid byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dran pa dang / shes rab dang yang dag par ldan pa'i thugs la gnas shing de'i bdag nyid du rjes su zhugs pas 'di rnams de las byung ba'i yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir kun gyi bdag nyid byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dran pa dang / shes rab dang yang dag par ldan pa'i thugs la gnas shing de'i bdag nyid du rjes su zhugs pas 'di rnams de las byung ba'i yin la /
translated: Because the Tathāgatas, whose nature is enlightenment, abide in the mind endowed with mindfulness and wisdom, and because they have entered into the nature of that, these are arisen from that.

original: de bas na las kyi phyag rgya 'di dag ni //
analyzed: de bas na las kyi phyag rgya 'di dag ni //
translated: Therefore, these karmamudrās

original: rang @189b 'byung sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsang ba'i btsun mo lha mo brtan pa yin pas skye bo de thams cad kyi mngon sum du gyur bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: rang @189b 'byung sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsang ba'i btsun mo lha mo brtan pa yin pas skye bo de thams cad kyi mngon sum du gyur bar mi bya'o //
translated: are the secret queens of the self-originated Bhagavān Buddhas. Therefore, they should not be made manifest to all beings.

original: de ltar yin mod kyi 'on kyang ci'i phyir sgrub pa pos dus thams cad du sbyar bar mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar yin mod kyi 'on kyang ci'i phyir sgrub pa pos dus thams cad du sbyar bar mi bya zhe na /
translated: Even though that is the case, why should the adept not apply them at all times?

original: sgrub pa rnams la rab chags na //
analyzed: sgrub pa rnams la rab chags na //
translated: If one is very attached to the practice,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said.

original: nyin re zhing las kyi phyag rgya bsgom pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la rab tu chags shing zhe na pas na /
analyzed: nyin re zhing las kyi phyag rgya bsgom pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la rab tu chags shing zhe na pas na /
translated: The yogis who are endowed with the meditation on karmamudra are very attached to and desirous of her.

original: rang gi bdag po gtang nga re //
analyzed: rang gi bdag po gtang nga re //
translated: Therefore, they abandon their lord.

original: zhes bya ba bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: The lord is the Tathagata.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: rang gi ste phyi ma'i mthar thug par brtan par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi ste phyi ma'i mthar thug par brtan par gnas pa'o //
translated: They are attached to her, who is their own, who abides firmly until the end of time.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: rang gi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad nas thams cad du yongs su spangs nas sgrub pa po nyid la dga' bar 'dod pa yin la /
analyzed: rang gi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad nas thams cad du yongs su spangs nas sgrub pa po nyid la dga' bar 'dod pa yin la /
translated: The yogis, having completely abandoned the Tathagatas as their lords, desire to delight in the practice itself.

original: de bas na sgrub pa pos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchog tu gus pa bskyed la /
analyzed: de bas na sgrub pa pos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchog tu gus pa bskyed la /
translated: Therefore, the yogis should generate supreme respect for the Tathagatas.

original: bla ma'i btsun mo rtag tu rang gi las la sbyar bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi tha snyad khas blangs la so sor nges pa'i dus su sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: bla ma'i btsun mo rtag tu rang gi las la sbyar bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi tha snyad khas blangs la so sor nges pa'i dus su sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: They should not always engage the guru's queen in their own practice. Thus, accepting such worldly conventions, they should engage her at the appointed time.

original: de ltar na nges pa'i dus su mtshan ma thob nas sbyar bar gyur na /
analyzed: de ltar na nges pa'i dus su mtshan ma thob nas sbyar bar gyur na /
translated: Thus, if one has obtained the signs at the proper time and then applies them,

original: de rnams nges par dgyes par mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: de rnams nges par dgyes par mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub par byed do //
translated: they will certainly accomplish the desired powers.

original: de bas na dus gzhan du sbyar na 'di dag log par sbyar bas bka' las 'das pa'i phyir dngos grub nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na dus gzhan du sbyar na 'di dag log par sbyar bas bka' las 'das pa'i phyir dngos grub nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, if one applies them at the wrong time, one will lose the powers because one has transgressed the command by applying them incorrectly.

original: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya las byung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i khyad par gsungs nas /
analyzed: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya las byung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i khyad par gsungs nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the special practice of the karma-mudra arising from the samaya-mudra,

original: de nas phyag rgya 'di rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa spyi'i bcing pa la sogs pa'i las rnams ston to //
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya 'di rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa spyi'i bcing pa la sogs pa'i las rnams ston to //
translated: then, beginning with “These mudras, etc.,” he teaches the general binding, etc., of the great seal, etc.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni dgrol ba dang / brtan par bya ba dang go cha dang mnyes par bya ba rnams bsdu'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni dgrol ba dang / brtan par bya ba dang go cha dang mnyes par bya ba rnams bsdu'o //
translated: The word “etc.” includes releasing, stabilizing, armoring, and pleasing.

original: de la badzra a'a be sha zhes bya bas rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: de la badzra a'a be sha zhes bya bas rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: There, having bound the vajra-descent seal with “vajra-avasa,”

original: aa: zhes bya bas dbab pa bskyed la ji skad du gsungs pa'i tshul gyis phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa ni bdag 'ching ba'o //
analyzed: aa: zhes bya bas dbab pa bskyed la ji skad du gsungs pa'i tshul gyis phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa ni bdag 'ching ba'o //
translated: one should generate the descent, and bind all the seals, such as the great seal, in the manner that has been taught, which is binding oneself.

original: gzhan ni badzra h'um bandha zhes zlos shing ngo //
analyzed: gzhan ni badzra h'um bandha zhes zlos shing ngo //
translated: One should bind another, saying VAJRA HŪṂ BANDHA.

original: de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /🔽rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil @190a * //🔽'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis /
analyzed: de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te / rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil @190a * // 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis /
translated: This is what is being taught:🔽one should perform the yoga of one's deity in the manner

original: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: taught in the Great Maṇḍala of the Vajra Realm.🔽One should bind the great seal, the pledge seal, the doctrine seal, and the action seal taught in the Dhāraṇī Maṇḍala, saying

original: phyir gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya bcings la badzra h'um bandha zhes zlos shing bcing bar bya ba'am /
analyzed: phyir gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya bcings la badzra h'um bandha zhes zlos shing bcing bar bya ba'am /
translated: VAJRA HŪṂ BANDHA, and bind them,

original: mdun du rang gi gzungs kyi lha mo rang gi phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: mdun du rang gi gzungs kyi lha mo rang gi phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya'o //
translated: or one should seal one's own dhāraṇī goddess in front with one's own four seals.

original: de ltar phyag rgya bcing ba'i cho ga thams cad bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar phyag rgya bcing ba'i cho ga thams cad bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the entire procedure for binding the seals,

original: da ni de dgrol ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa dgrol ba'i cho ga gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: da ni de dgrol ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa dgrol ba'i cho ga gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Having said this, he teaches the rite of releasing them.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /🔽aom badzra dha tva'i shva r'i h'um badzra ni zhes lan gsum brjod la /🔽aom badzra mu: zhes bya bas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de spyi gtsug tu bkrol la /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la / aom badzra dha tva'i shva r'i h'um badzra ni zhes lan gsum brjod la / aom badzra mu: zhes bya bas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de spyi gtsug tu bkrol la /
translated: Form the pledge seal of Vajradhatviśvarī,🔽and recite Oṃ vajra-dhātu-svabhāva-śuddhaḥ sarvadharmāḥ

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya thams cad der grol bar bsam par bya'o //🔽de bzhin du badzra a'a be sha zhes bya ba'i bar gyis rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /🔽aom badzra mu: zhes bya ba lan gsum rdo rje brjod der rang gi byin pa g-yon pa'i gnas nas bkrol la /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya thams cad der grol bar bsam par bya'o // de bzhin du badzra a'a be sha zhes bya ba'i bar gyis rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la / aom badzra mu: zhes bya ba lan gsum rdo rje brjod der rang gi byin pa g-yon pa'i gnas nas bkrol la /
translated: Translation: Now, I will release them.🔽Having said this, he teaches the rite of releasing them.🔽Form the pledge seal of Vajradhatviśvarī,

original: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i rang gi phyag rgya thams cad de nas grol bar bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i rang gi phyag rgya thams cad de nas grol bar bsam par bya'o //
translated: and recite Oṃ vajra-dhātu-svabhāva-śuddhaḥ sarvadharmāḥ

original: de ltar na phyag rgya thams cad gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nas grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na phyag rgya thams cad gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nas grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, all the seals are released from wherever they come.

original: rin chen rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngar bshad pa'i 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya brtan par byas te /
analyzed: rin chen rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngar bshad pa'i 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya brtan par byas te /
translated: As for jewel-vajra, and so on, having stabilized the pledge seal of Ākāśagarbha as previously explained,

original: bcings la rang gi snying ga'i phyogs nas bteg la /
analyzed: bcings la rang gi snying ga'i phyogs nas bteg la /
translated: one should raise it from the region of one's heart,

original: bcing bar ji skad bshad pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bskur ba'i bsam pas rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su de bzhag la 'di skad brjod do //
analyzed: bcing bar ji skad bshad pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bskur ba'i bsam pas rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su de bzhag la 'di skad brjod do //
translated: and with the thought of bestowing all the seals as explained in the binding, one should place it on one's own consecration site, and say this:

original: aom badzra ra tna aa bhi shi nytsa /
analyzed: aom badzra ra tna aa bhi shi nytsa /
translated: Oṃ, jewel-vajra consecration!

original: de nas phyag rgya de gnyis su byas la /
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya de gnyis su byas la /
translated: Then, having made two seals,

original: aom tri dha badzra ka rmm'a tsa tri bha zhes zlos shing mdzub mo gnyis kyis go cha bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom tri dha badzra ka rmm'a tsa tri bha zhes zlos shing mdzub mo gnyis kyis go cha bcing bar bya'o //
translated: one should recite Oṃ, vajra armor, tribh, tribh, and bind the armor with the two index fingers.

original: de nas go cha'i mthar snga ma bzhin du dar dpyangs 'phyangs ba byas la /
analyzed: de nas go cha'i mthar snga ma bzhin du dar dpyangs 'phyangs ba byas la /
translated: Then, at the end of the armor, one should make a hanging silk streamer as before.

original: mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir 'di nyid do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir 'di nyid do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: In order to demonstrate that this is the pleasing by the gesture of homage, he says, with the gesture of homage.

original: bcing ba'i dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya ba'i bcing ba'o //
analyzed: bcing ba'i dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya ba'i bcing ba'o //
translated: The pledge of binding is the binding of the non-transgression.

original: mnyam pa'i thal mos @190b mnyes par bya ba nyid gsungs pa ni thal mo brdabs pas zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: mnyam pa'i thal mos @190b mnyes par bya ba nyid gsungs pa ni thal mo brdabs pas zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The very pleasing by the gesture of homage is stated by the clapping of the hands.

original: sngags gang gis bya zhe na /
analyzed: sngags gang gis bya zhe na /
translated: By what mantra?

original: aom guhya sa m'a ta las zhes gsungs pa yin te lan gsum bya'o //
analyzed: aom guhya sa m'a ta las zhes gsungs pa yin te lan gsum bya'o //
translated: He says, with the mantra of Guhyasamaja, and it is to be repeated three times.

original: gang gis de ltar cho ga rgya cher byed mi nus pa des bcings pa la sogs pa'i las rnams badzras tva badzra tva zhes zlos shing brtan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gis de ltar cho ga rgya cher byed mi nus pa des bcings pa la sogs pa'i las rnams badzras tva badzra tva zhes zlos shing brtan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: He who is not able to perform the extensive rite in that way, by him the actions of binding and so forth are to be made firm by repeating vajrasattva vajratva, and

original: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' ci dgar bzlas //🔽zhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' ci dgar bzlas //🔽zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: then the vajra-being is to be repeated as much as one likes.

original: dgrol ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las thams cad la rdo rje sems dpa' ci dgar bzlas la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dgrol ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las thams cad la rdo rje sems dpa' ci dgar bzlas la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that one should apply the recitation of Vajrasattva as one wishes in all the rites taught in the maṇḍala of the liberation rite, etc.

original: cho ga lhag ma rnams ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs bar bya ste /
analyzed: cho ga lhag ma rnams ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs bar bya ste /
translated: The remaining rites are to be performed in the great maṇḍala of the Vajra Element.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
translated: Having performed the great yoga taught in the great maṇḍala of the Vajra Element,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gzungs la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gzungs la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
translated: one should draw the maṇḍala of the Tathāgata family dhāraṇī, etc. with the yoga of Vajrasattva.

original: 'di ni gzungs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gyi phyir gsungs pa yin pas gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: 'di ni gzungs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gyi phyir gsungs pa yin pas gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: This is the dhāraṇī maṇḍala, because it is taught for the sake of sentient beings who are to be disciplined by dhāraṇī.

original: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel ba'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel ba'o //
translated: This is the commentary on the dhāraṇī maṇḍala.

original: de ltar gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan nas /
translated: Having thus explained the dhāraṇī maṇḍala,

original: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de 'dul ba'i 'gro ba las brtsam ste /
analyzed: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de 'dul ba'i 'gro ba las brtsam ste /
translated: now, beginning with thereupon, etc., [the Bhagavān] teaches the maṇḍala of action for disciplining those to be disciplined.🔽 🔽Thereupon means after the dhāraṇī maṇḍala.

original: chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The Dharma maṇḍala is the chief of the Dharma seals.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das ma thag pa ste /
translated: Then is a term for immediately after.

original: dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la'o //
translated: It is immediately after the first concentration of union.

original: 'dir dang por sbyor pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir dang por sbyor pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa las shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, the first concentration of union should be understood from the explanation in the maṇḍala of retention.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos nas yang gi sgra smras so //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos nas yang gi sgra smras so //
translated: Again is a term that refers to the maṇḍala of retention.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: The Bhagavān is Vairocana.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: All tathāgatas, etc.

original: rdo rje yang yin la phra mo yang yin pas na rdo rje phra mo ste /
analyzed: rdo rje yang yin la phra mo yang yin pas na rdo rje phra mo ste /
translated: It is a vajra and it is subtle, hence it is a subtle vajra.

original: nas 'bru'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa kha dog dkar po'o //
analyzed: nas 'bru'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa kha dog dkar po'o //
translated: It is a five-pointed vajra the size of a barley grain, white in color.

original: der de nyid ni ye shes te nges pa'o //
analyzed: der de nyid ni ye shes te nges pa'o //
translated: That is the gnosis, the certainty.

original: de las byung ba'am de nyid ni phyag rgya ste rdo rje phra mo'i rnag bzhin ni rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //🔽de @191a * //
analyzed: de las byung ba'am de nyid ni phyag rgya ste rdo rje phra mo'i rnag bzhin ni rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o // de @191a * //
translated: The knowledge seal of the vajra particle is like the knowledge seal of the vajra particle.

original: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya de'i dam tshig ni /
analyzed: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya de'i dam tshig ni /
translated: The pledge of that knowledge seal of the vajra particle of all the Ones-Gone-Thus

original: dam tshig gi don gyi dkyil 'khor yin pas na dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dam tshig gi don gyi dkyil 'khor yin pas na dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: is the pledge mandala, because it is the mandala of the meaning of pledge.

original: de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang des byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di smras pa ni gsungs pa'o //

original: de ni don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni don 'di skad ston pa yin te /

original: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis kyang 'dir bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog bsgoms pas de'i nga rgyal gyis blo la gnas par byas la /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis kyang 'dir bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog bsgoms pas de'i nga rgyal gyis blo la gnas par byas la /
translated: Also, those who practice the conduct of the door of Secret Mantra should meditate here on the supreme royal maṇḍala of the Bhagavān Vairocana, and with the pride of that, they should stabilize their minds.

original: sngags 'dis brtan par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags 'dis brtan par bya'o //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la /
translated: Since it is all the tathāgatas

original: rdo rje sems dpa' yang yin pas /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' yang yin pas /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' ste /

analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa la mi bskyod pa'i rigs rnams so //
translated: Since it is the family of Akṣobhya and so on,🔽it is the vajra of the knowledge of the subtle vajra of all tathāgatas.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la rdo rje rin chen yang yin pas na / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che ste /
translated: Since he is all the Tathagatas and also the Vajra Gem,🔽he is the Vajra Gem of all the Tathagatas.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs rnams so //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs rnams so //

analyzed: de rnams kyi rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa ni snga ma dang 'dra'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la rdo rje chos kyang yin pas na /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos te ;
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos te ;
translated: he is the Vajra Dharma of all the Tathagatas.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa la sogs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs rnams so //
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa la sogs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs rnams so //

original: de rnams kyi rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la /
translated: Their vajra-subtle-spirit-of-awakening-gnosis-consort and so forth should be understood in the same way.

original: rdo rje las kyang yin pas na /
analyzed: rdo rje las kyang yin pas na /
translated: Since he is all the Tathagatas and also the Vajra Action,🔽he is the Vajra Action of all the Tathagatas.

original: de @191b bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las te /
analyzed: de @191b bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las te /
translated: It is the vajra action of all tathagatas.🔽

original: don yod par grub pa la sogs pa dang de'i rigs rnams so //
analyzed: don yod par grub pa la sogs pa dang de'i rigs rnams so //
translated: The vajra of all the tathagatas is Amoghasiddhi and so forth and their families.

original: de rnams kyi rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes phyag rgya ste /
translated: The knowledge of the vajra-like subtle particle is the seal of those.

original: de'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor yin pas na dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: de'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor yin pas na dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te /
translated: Since it is the mandala of their commitments, it is the commitment mandala.

original: de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir de byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir de byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas /
translated: In order to consecrate that, he entered and actualized the samadhi called the consecration of that, and

original: rang gi rig pa mchog thugs la gnas pa 'di smras pa ni bka' stsal ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi rig pa mchog thugs la gnas pa 'di smras pa ni bka' stsal ba'o //
translated: he spoke, that is, uttered, this supreme knowledge mantra that abides in his mind.

translated: If someone thinks, “These five mantras were spoken for the sake of consecrating the mandala,”

original: de ltar ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ltar ni mi rigs te /
translated: that is not reasonable.

analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du mdzad pas de'i skabs ni ma yin te /

analyzed: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms pa'i rjes la sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Then, etc.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje ni ji skad du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
translated: The vajra of subtle pristine awareness of all Ones Gone Thus is that having the character as just described.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
translated: The meditative stabilization that focuses on that is

original: de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
translated: He entered into meditative equipoise on that.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught:

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje phra mo'i 'od zer la sogs pas sbrul pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One, Vairochana, focused his mind one-pointedly on the emanation of the subtle vajra light rays, etc.

analyzed: de la yang gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //

original: de nyid kyi tshe na zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma de nyid la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje'i tshul de nyid
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshe na zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma de nyid la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje'i tshul de nyid
translated: At that very moment, in that very instant, the manner of the bodhisattva vajra present in the minds of all tathāgatas, such as Vairocana,

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo'i 'od zer rnams su byung ba ste /

analyzed: rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo lta bu'i 'od zer rnams su gyur te byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽'jig @192a * //

original: rten gyi khams cad snang bar byas te zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nyi ma'i snang ba la sogs pa zil gyis mnan te snang bar byas so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
analyzed: rten gyi khams cad snang bar byas te zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nyi ma'i snang ba la sogs pa zil gyis mnan te snang bar byas so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
translated: Having illuminated all the world systems means that those light rays of the subtle vajra gnosis outshine the light of the sun and so forth in all world systems and illuminate them, which is the meaning of the verse.

original: // snang bar byas pa des ci zhig mdzad ce na sems can thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: // snang bar byas pa des ci zhig mdzad ce na sems can thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: What is done by that illumination?🔽All sentient beings are caused to enter the vajra gnosis, which is to say, all sentient beings are caused to enter the samādhi of the subtle vajra gnosis that is connected with all tathāgatas.

original: sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel ba'i rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs pa brtan par byas pa ni rdo rje phra mo la dmigs pa'i sems rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin brtan por byas pa'o
analyzed: sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel ba'i rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs pa brtan par byas pa ni rdo rje phra mo la dmigs pa'i sems rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin brtan por byas pa'o
translated: Firmly abiding means that the mind observing the subtle vajra is made firm, which is to say, the samādhi of one-pointed mind is made firm.

original: // snyoms par zhugs pa de nyid gsal ba'i dbye bas kyang de'i rjes thogs nyid la yin pas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs te zhes gsungs pa yin la /

translated: And because that very meditative equipoise is also clear, it is said that he entered into that meditative stabilization immediately after.

original: de brtan par byas pa ni /
analyzed: de brtan par byas pa ni /
translated: Having stabilized that,

original: brtan pa byas pas rdzogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: brtan pa byas pas rdzogs par 'gyur //
translated: he becomes perfected by stabilizing it.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the verse.

original: yang gcig tu gyur nas zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
analyzed: yang gcig tu gyur nas zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
translated: By this “having become one again,”

original: 'od zer rnams kyi bsdu ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'od zer rnams kyi bsdu ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: the gathering of the light rays is stated.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i skur dmigs te zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes yin pas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i skur dmigs te zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes yin pas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes te /
translated: Observing the vajra body of the gnosis of meditative stabilization means that since it is the gnosis of meditative stabilization, it is the gnosis of meditative stabilization.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyus rdo rje phra mor nges pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyus rdo rje phra mor nges pa'o //
translated: It is ascertained as the subtle vajra through the cause of meditative stabilization.

original: der des na rdo rje phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje de'i lus yin pas na /
analyzed: der des na rdo rje phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje de'i lus yin pas na /
translated: Therefore, since that is the body of the vajra of the gnosis of the subtle vajra meditative stabilization,

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i sku ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i sku ste /
translated: it is the vajra body of the gnosis of meditative stabilization.

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i sku nyid la ting nge 'dzin gyi sku zhes bya'o //
translated: The body of the vajra of the exalted wisdom of meditative stabilization is called the body of meditative stabilization.

original: de la dmigs pa ni rdo rje phra mo lta bu'i 'od zer gcig tu byas te /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa ni rdo rje phra mo lta bu'i 'od zer gcig tu byas te /
translated: The object of observation is a single vajra particle-like light ray.

original: rdo rje phra mo'i sku gcig po de rdzogs par byas shing mngon sum mdzad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rdo rje phra mo'i sku gcig po de rdzogs par byas shing mngon sum mdzad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: That single vajra particle-like body is perfected, is actualized—this is the meaning.

original: de la dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin par cing 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de la dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin par cing 'gyur zhe na /

original: gcig tu 'dus nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gcig tu 'dus nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Having gathered into one, etc.

original: rdo rje phra mo lta bu'i 'od zer de rnams gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku mi phyed pa'i rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs su sems dpa'i rdo rje'i skabs su gyur pa nas /

translated: Those vajra particle-like light rays gather into one, and the body of exalted wisdom of the Ones-Gone-Thus becomes the form of an indivisible vajra particle.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnams par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so zhes bya ba rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs @192b su zhugs pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su zhugs par blta bar bya ste /

translated: The phrase entered into the heart of the Bhagavat Vairocana means that by entering into the heart of Vairocana, he should be seen as entering into the hearts of all the Tathagatas.

original: thugs su zhugs nas zhes 'og nas bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thugs su zhugs nas zhes 'og nas bshad pa'i phyir ro //

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sdus ni bar ma chad pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sdus ni bar ma chad pa'o //
translated: The word then means without interruption.

original: des na don 'di skag ston te /
analyzed: des na don 'di skag ston te /

original: de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi thugs las /
analyzed: de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi thugs las /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs su zhugs pa'i rjes thogs nyid la /
translated: immediately after entering into the hearts of the Tathagatas,

analyzed: rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs kyi gnas nas 'di smras pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: from the place of the subtle vajra form, he spoke.

original: ci zhig gsungs she na /
analyzed: ci zhig gsungs she na /
translated: What did he say?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo ste /

analyzed: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: is the nondual wisdom free from all conceptual elaborations.

original: de nyid ni dam tshig kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas dam tshig chen po ste chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: de nyid ni dam tshig kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas dam tshig chen po ste chos kyi dbyings so //

analyzed: de'i rdo rje ni s'u ksham badzra zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di'o //

analyzed: de smras pa ni gsungs pa'o //

original: de nas 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: phyag na rdo rje ched du brjod pa 'di chen dud brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs rnams las so //
translated: From the hearts of all the tathāgatas, i.e., from the forms of the subtle vajras.

original: phyag na rdo rje nyid byung nas //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje nyid byung nas //
translated: Vajrapāṇi himself arose.

original: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa byung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa byung ba'o //
translated: He who is described as holding the vajra and bell of Vajrasattva arose.

original: de byung nas bdag nyid rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs byin gyis brlabs shing bskyed de /
analyzed: de byung nas bdag nyid rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs byin gyis brlabs shing bskyed de /
translated: Having arisen, he blessed his own form as a subtle vajra and generated it.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtse mo'i phyogs su gnas nas //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtse mo'i phyogs su gnas nas //
translated: He stood in the direction of the peak of all the tathāgatas.

original: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
analyzed: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
translated: This is the expression of the purpose.

original: ae ma'o zhes bya ba'i sgra ni ngo mtshar gyi don to //
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes bya ba'i sgra ni ngo mtshar gyi don to //
translated: The word “Amazing!” means “astonishing.”

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'brel ba'o //
translated: “Of all the Buddhas” means related to all the Buddhas.

original: rdo rje phra mo'i bdag ste che //
analyzed: rdo rje phra mo'i bdag ste che //
translated: “The nature of the subtle vajra is great.”

original: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This means that it is the nature of the realm of phenomena.

original: ci zhig ngo mtshar zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig ngo mtshar zhe na /
translated: What is astonishing?

original: gang phyir phra yang che ba'i phyir //
analyzed: gang phyir phra yang che ba'i phyir //
translated: “Although subtle, it is great,

original: khams gsum yang ni rgyas par byed //
analyzed: khams gsum yang ni rgyas par byed //
translated: and it pervades the three realms.”

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don ni re zhig gzhan lta zhog gi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don ni re zhig gzhan lta zhog gi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word “also” means “never mind the other.”

original: gang gi phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin pas che ba'i phyir khams gsum kun du spros par byed pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin pas che ba'i phyir khams gsum kun du spros par byed pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: Because it is the nature of the realm of phenomena, it is great, and it pervades the three realms. This is astonishing.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, the Blessed One, having entered the meditative absorption called “Vajra of the Essence of All Tathāgatas,”

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / @193a * //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / @193a * //
translated: spoke to Vajrapāṇi, the Lord of Guhyakas, as follows:

original: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i rdo rje gzugs kyis gnas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod nas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i rdo rje gzugs kyis gnas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod nas so //
translated: This is the exclamation of Vajrasattva, uttered from the place of the form of the vajra at the tip of the nose of all the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shags kyi rtse mo'i phyogs nas zhes bya ba ni shangs kyi rtse mor phyin nas rab tu phra ba'i rdo rje ye shes mtshan ma rgyas par bya ba ni khyab par ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shags kyi rtse mo'i phyogs nas zhes bya ba ni shangs kyi rtse mor phyin nas rab tu phra ba'i rdo rje ye shes mtshan ma rgyas par bya ba ni khyab par ste /
translated: From the direction of the tip of the nose of all the Tathagatas means that, having gone to the tip of the nose, the vajra wisdom sign is expanded, that is, pervaded.

original: de ltar spros pa nyid ni phra ba yang yin la rdo rje yang yin pas phra ba'i rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de ltar spros pa nyid ni phra ba yang yin la rdo rje yang yin pas phra ba'i rdo rje ste /
translated: Thus, it is subtle and it is a vajra, hence it is a subtle vajra.

original: de nyid ni ye shes so //
analyzed: de nyid ni ye shes so //
translated: That itself is wisdom.

original: de'i mtshan ma ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / reg pa'i mtshan ma'o//
analyzed: de'i mtshan ma ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / reg pa'i mtshan ma'o//
translated: Its sign is the sign of form and the sign of touch.

original: de la gzugs kyi mtshan ma ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis kyis gzung du rung ba'o //
analyzed: de la gzugs kyi mtshan ma ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis kyis gzung du rung ba'o //
translated: Therein, the sign of form is suitable to be apprehended by both the eye consciousness and the mental consciousness.

original: reg pa'i mtshan ma ni lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis kyis gzung du rung ba'o //
analyzed: reg pa'i mtshan ma ni lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis kyis gzung du rung ba'o //
translated: The sign of contact is that it is suitable to be apprehended by both the body and mind consciousnesses.

original: de yang gzugs kyi mtshan ma ni sna'i rtse mor nas 'bru tsam gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bsgoms pa na mig dang yid kyi rnam par shes pas gzung du rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang gzugs kyi mtshan ma ni sna'i rtse mor nas 'bru tsam gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bsgoms pa na mig dang yid kyi rnam par shes pas gzung du rung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, when one meditates on the sign of form, which is a white five-pointed vajra the size of a barley seed at the tip of the nose, it becomes suitable to be apprehended by the eye and mind consciousnesses.

original: mthong nas kyang der lus dang yid bde zhing tshim par byed pa'i reg pa nye bar skye ba 'di ni reg pa'i mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: mthong nas kyang der lus dang yid bde zhing tshim par byed pa'i reg pa nye bar skye ba 'di ni reg pa'i mtshan ma'o //
translated: And when one sees it, the contact that arises there, which delights and satisfies the body and mind, is the sign of contact.

original: rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi mtshan ma gnyis po 'di dag mthong nas rgyas par bya ba'i sbyor bas spros par bya ba yin pas /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku des khyab par byas nas zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi mtshan ma gnyis po 'di dag mthong nas rgyas par bya ba'i sbyor bas spros par bya ba yin pas / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku des khyab par byas nas zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: After seeing these two signs of the gnosis of the subtle vajra, one should emanate them through the yoga of expansion.🔽Therefore it says, “Having pervaded with that body of all tathāgatas,”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skus khyab par spros pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skus khyab par spros pa'o //
translated: which means that one emanates the pervasion of the body of all tathāgatas.

original: de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi stong pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab cing spros par byas pa nyid kyi tshul te /
analyzed: de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi stong pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab cing spros par byas pa nyid kyi tshul te /
translated: Then, in the manner of pervading and emanating all of the phenomena of the nature of space, which is the characteristic of emptiness,

original: tshul dang rnam par des nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad ces pa /
analyzed: tshul dang rnam par des nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad ces pa /
translated: in that way, all of the phenomena of the nature of space pervade all of space.

original: go 'byed pa ma lus par thams cad du phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan ma rnams kyis khyab par ji skad du bshad pa bzhin du spros pa yang /
analyzed: go 'byed pa ma lus par thams cad du phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan ma rnams kyis khyab par ji skad du bshad pa bzhin du spros pa yang /
translated: As such, the explanation of the pervading of all of space with the subtle signs of gnosis is also the pervading of all of space with the signs of the five gnoses.

original: de rnams nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab par byas nas /
analyzed: de rnams nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab par byas nas /
translated: Having pervaded all of space,🔽one should remain in the blessing of oneself as the vajra dhātu of the gnosis of all tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbyings su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te 'dug go zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas nam @193b mkha'i dbyings thams cad de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbyings su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te 'dug go zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas nam @193b mkha'i dbyings thams cad de /
translated: Since it is space and it is all, it is all space.

original: der khyab par spros pas na khyab par byas pa yin la /
analyzed: der khyab par spros pas na khyab par byas pa yin la /
translated: Since it pervades and emanates, it is pervaded.

original: de ltar spros nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbyings su zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: de ltar spros nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbyings su zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: Having emanated in that way, he is connected with “in the realm of the vajra of the exalted wisdom of all the Ones-Gone-Thus.”

original: der bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs shing brtan par byas nas gnas pa ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i nam mkha' ma lus pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rtse lnga par bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas /
analyzed: der bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs shing brtan par byas nas gnas pa ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i nam mkha' ma lus pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rtse lnga par bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas /
translated: Having blessed and stabilized himself there, he abides.  Having blessed himself as the Bhagavān Vajrasattva, the measure of all space, a five-pronged vajra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nang du chud par mdzad de bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nang du chud par mdzad de bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: he resides, having caused all Ones-Gone-Thus to enter into it.  This is the meaning.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: bshad ma thag pa'i nam mkha' dbyings khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbus so //
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i nam mkha' dbyings khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbus so //
translated: In the middle of the vajra of the exalted wisdom of all the Ones-Gone-Thus pervading the space just explained,

original: rdo rje nyid ni rnam par rtog pa'i dbang gis 'jug pa dang ldog pa med pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: rdo rje nyid ni rnam par rtog pa'i dbang gis 'jug pa dang ldog pa med pa'i tshul lo //
translated: the vajra itself is the mode of non-engagement and non-disengagement due to the power of conceptuality.

original: de la dmigs pa ni dbang po mngon du byed pa'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa ni dbang po mngon du byed pa'o //
translated: The focus on that is the actualization of the sense power.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo ji skad du gsungs pa de ting nge 'dzin gang gis byin gyis brlab cing skyed par byed pa 'di ni byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo ji skad du gsungs pa de ting nge 'dzin gang gis byin gyis brlab cing skyed par byed pa 'di ni byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ste /
translated: The meditative absorption by which one is empowered and generates that is called “empowerment.”

original: de la snyoms par zhugs te zhugs pa ni /
analyzed: de la snyoms par zhugs te zhugs pa ni /
translated: Having entered into that meditative absorption, he entered into it.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje phra mo bskyed pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad nas ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbus dus bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje phra mo bskyed pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad nas ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbus dus bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Having focused his mind one-pointedly on the generation of the subtle vajra of all the tathagatas, he abided in the center of the wisdom vajra.

original: ye shes kyi rdo rje de las zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ma lus ba'i chad dang mnyam pa las /
analyzed: ye shes kyi rdo rje de las zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ma lus ba'i chad dang mnyam pa las /
translated: From that wisdom vajra, from the space equal to the extent of the entire sky,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shes phra mo bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin bskul pa'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po 'byung ba ni rdo rje phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes de
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shes phra mo bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin bskul pa'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po 'byung ba ni rdo rje phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes de
translated: By the power of arousing the samadhi of the generation of the subtle vajra wisdom of all tathagatas, the essence of the wisdom of the samadhi of all tathagatas arises, which is the wisdom of the subtle vajra samadhi.

original: skyed par byed pa'i snying po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas phyung bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: skyed par byed pa'i snying po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas phyung bar gyur pa'o //
translated: That is the essence that generates the wisdom of the subtle vajra samadhi, which was brought forth by the bhagavat Vajrasattva.

original: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur te gnas so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur te gnas so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The bhagavat Vajrapani became the form of a vajra by the method of entering the subtle wisdom, abiding thus.

original: ye shes kyang yin la phra mo yang yin pas ye shes phra mo ste rdo rje phra mo'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyang yin la phra mo yang yin pas ye shes phra mo ste rdo rje phra mo'o //
translated: It is a subtle wisdom because it is both wisdom and subtle, which is the subtle vajra.

original: der 'jug pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin ni ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: der 'jug pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin ni ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul lo //
translated: The method of entering that is the method of entering the subtle wisdom.

original: ye shes phra mor 'jug @194a * //🔽pa'i tshul das /
analyzed: ye shes phra mor 'jug @194a * //🔽pa'i tshul das /
translated: By the method of entering the subtle wisdom,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sku la zhugs pa'i rjes la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sku la zhugs pa'i rjes la /
translated: After the Tathāgatas enter the body of the five Tathāgatas, Vairocana and so forth,

original: de'i thugs kar rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur te gnas so //
analyzed: de'i thugs kar rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur te gnas so //
translated: they abide in the form of a vajra at the heart.

original: rdo rje ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur zhugs nas thugs kar rdo rje dbyibs su gyur nas gnas so zhes bya ba 'dis ni don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur zhugs nas thugs kar rdo rje dbyibs su gyur nas gnas so zhes bya ba 'dis ni don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: By the method of entering the subtle vajra gnosis, after entering the body of all the Tathāgatas, they abide in the form of a vajra at the heart.🔽This passage teaches the following meaning:

original: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rdo rje phra mo skyed par byed pa'i snying po gsungs nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rdo rje phra mo skyed par byed pa'i snying po gsungs nas /
translated: After the Blessed One Vajrapāṇi taught the essence of generating the subtle vajra,

original: bdag nyid rdo rje phra mor byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: bdag nyid rdo rje phra mor byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: he blessed himself into the state of the subtle vajra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa thams cad kyi lte bar gnas su bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa thams cad kyi lte bar gnas su bzhugs pa'o //
translated: and all the Tathāgatas entered his navel.

original: de nas badzra n'a bhi ta th'a ga ta h'um zhes zlos shing lte ba'i phyor de nas rim gyis phyung ste /
analyzed: de nas badzra n'a bhi ta th'a ga ta h'um zhes zlos shing lte ba'i phyor de nas rim gyis phyung ste /
translated: Then, reciting vajra-nabha-tathāgata-haṃ, he gradually drew them out from his navel,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mor bzhugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mor bzhugs so //
translated: He resides at the tip of the nose of all tathāgatas.

original: de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs khung nas zhugs te /
analyzed: de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs khung nas zhugs te /
translated: Then, from the direction of the nose of all tathāgatas, he enters the nostrils of all tathāgatas.

original: de rnams kyi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs su gyur nas gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs su gyur nas gnas pa yin no //
translated: He abides in the form of a subtle vajra on a moon disc in their hearts.
