original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de las zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i thug skar chud pa'i rdo rje phra mo rnams la'o //🔽ye shes kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de las zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i thug skar chud pa'i rdo rje phra mo rnams la'o // ye shes kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na /
translated: Then, from that vajra of the mind of all tathāgatas, that is, from the subtle vajras that have entered the hearts of Vairochana and so forth,🔽there is great wisdom,

original: ye shes chen po ste /
analyzed: ye shes chen po ste /
translated: therefore it is great wisdom.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i la sogs pa na rdo rje legs pa'i bar gyi'o ;
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i la sogs pa na rdo rje legs pa'i bar gyi'o ;
translated: It is the vajra of the mind of all tathāgatas, that is, of Vajrasattva and so forth up to Vajraṁgraha.

original: / de rnams kyi snying po ni de ston par byed pa'i sgra bzhi ba ste /
analyzed: / de rnams kyi snying po ni de ston par byed pa'i sgra bzhi ba ste /
translated: Their essence is the four-line verse that teaches that.

original: thug sal gnas pa 'di phyung bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: thug sal gnas pa 'di phyung bar gyur pa'o //
translated: This is the emergence of the abiding vajra mind.

original: rdo rje sems pa'i ye shes ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems pa'i ye shes ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i nges pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of Vajrasattva is the certainty of the great seal of the Blessed One Vajrasattva as taught in the Dharma maṇḍala.

original: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: That which is the seal of that is the knowledge seal of Vajrasattva.

original: badzra a'atma ko zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di'o //
analyzed: badzra a'atma ko zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di'o //
translated: This is the mantra vajra-ātmāka.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdus pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdus pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po'i nges pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of the blessing of the gathering of all the Ones-Gone-Thus is the certainty of the great seal of the Vajra King as taught in the Dharma maṇḍala.

original: @194b de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: @194b de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: That which is the seal of that is the knowledge seal of the blessing of the gathering of all the Ones-Gone-Thus.

original: hri da badzra aam ku sha zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: hri da badzra aam ku sha zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra hrīḥ vajra-aṅkuśa.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyen par byed pa'i ye shes ni rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i nges ba'o ;
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyen par byed pa'i ye shes ni rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i nges ba'o ;
translated: The wisdom of the Tathagatas' passion is the seal of the great mudra of vajra passion.

original: / de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyen par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: / de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyen par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The seal of the wisdom of the Tathagatas' passion is the seal of the great mudra of vajra passion.

original: ti shtha r'a ga badzra pra bi sha hri da yam zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: ti shtha r'a ga badzra pra bi sha hri da yam zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra is: tistha ragapad vajra pravishad hridaya yam.

original: dga' ba chen po'i ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje legs pa'i phyag chen po'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba chen po'i ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje legs pa'i phyag chen po'i nges pa'o //
translated: The wisdom of great joy is the seal of the great mudra of vajra excellence, as taught in the Dharmachakra.

original: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de ni dga' ba chen po'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de ni dga' ba chen po'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The seal of the wisdom of great joy is the seal of the great mudra of vajra excellence.

original: aa ho badzra tu shti zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: aa ho badzra tu shti zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra is: aho vajra tusht.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la ting ne 'dzin chen po yang yin pas na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la ting ne 'dzin chen po yang yin pas na /
translated: The great samadhi of all the Tathagatas is the seal of the great mudra of vajra great samadhi.🔽The seal of the great samadhi of all the Tathagatas is the seal of the great mudra of vajra great samadhi.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin 'dzin chen po rnams te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin 'dzin chen po rnams te /
translated: The great retention of the samadhis of all tathagatas.

original: byang chub kyi sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan 'dren pa dang / rjes su mnyes par bya ba dang / legs so zhes bya ba'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig pa nyid do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan 'dren pa dang / rjes su mnyes par bya ba dang / legs so zhes bya ba'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig pa nyid do //
translated: The bodhicitta, the invocation of the tathagatas, the pleasing, and the “excellent” are the one-pointed mind.

original: ye shes phra mo thugs su zhugs pa'i tshul bshad zin to //
analyzed: ye shes phra mo thugs su zhugs pa'i tshul bshad zin to //
translated: The way of entering the subtle wisdom into the mind has been explained.

original: rang gi thugs su zhugs te zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi thugs su ste /
analyzed: rang gi thugs su zhugs te zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi thugs su ste /
translated: “Having entered into one’s own mind” means into the mind of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po'i sngags mi bskyod pa'i thugs las byung ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po'i sngags mi bskyod pa'i thugs las byung ste /
translated: The mantra essence of Bhagavat Vajrasattva arises from the mind of Akṣobhya.

original: badzra n'a bhi ta th'a ga ta h'um zhes zlos zhing /🔽rin chen 'byung ldan gyi lte ba'i phyogs su gnas nas /
analyzed: badzra n'a bhi ta th'a ga ta h'um zhes zlos zhing / rin chen 'byung ldan gyi lte ba'i phyogs su gnas nas /
translated: Reciting “vajranābhi tathagata hūṃ,”🔽it abides in the direction of the navel of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: de nas rim gyis byung ste rin chen 'byung ldan gyi shangs kyi rtse mor gnas nas de las de'i shangs kyi bu gnas thugs kar zhugs te /
analyzed: de nas rim gyis byung ste rin chen 'byung ldan gyi shangs kyi rtse mor gnas nas de las de'i shangs kyi bu gnas thugs kar zhugs te /
translated: Then, having gradually arisen, it abides at the tip of the nose of Ratnasaṃbhava. From there, it enters through the nostril into the heart.

original: thugs kar rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas zhugs te rin chen 'byung ldan gyi thugs ka de nyid du rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs su bdag nyid brtan par byas nas gnas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thugs kar rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas zhugs te rin chen 'byung ldan gyi thugs ka de nyid du rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs su bdag nyid brtan par byas nas gnas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Having blessed himself in the form of a vajra at the heart of Ratnasaṃbhava, he enters and stabilizes himself in the form of a subtle vajra at the very heart of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi thugs kar gnas pa'i rdo rje phra mo las so //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi thugs kar gnas pa'i rdo rje phra mo las so //
translated: Then, from the subtle vajra at the heart of Ratnasaṃbhava,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i ye shes ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i @195a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i ye shes ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i @195a * //
translated: the wisdom of the vajra consecration of all tathāgatas is the wisdom of the Dharma maṇḍala.

original: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po'i nges pa'o //
translated: This is the commitment of the great seal of Ākāśagarbha.

original: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is the seal of that is

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i ye shes te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i ye shes te /
translated: the wisdom of the vajra consecration of all tathāgatas.

original: badzra ra tan a'atma ko zhes bya'i sngags so //
analyzed: badzra ra tan a'atma ko zhes bya'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra is vajraratnātmāko.🔽It is a maṇḍala and it is light,

original: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yang yin la chen po yang yin pas /
analyzed: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yang yin la chen po yang yin pas /
translated: and it is great,

original: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ste /
analyzed: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ste /
translated: the great mandala of light.

original: de'i bkod pa chen po ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: de'i bkod pa chen po ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: Its great array is the great seal of the vajra sun, as taught in the Dharma mandala.

original: de'i ye shes ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ye shes ni nges pa'o //
translated: Its intuition is the certainty.

original: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pas de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pas de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: It is called that because it is the seal of that.

original: hri da ya badzra s'u rya zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: hri da ya badzra s'u rya zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra is hrīḥ-vajra-sūrya.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi re ba rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes ni rdo rje dpal gyi phyag rgya chen po'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi re ba rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes ni rdo rje dpal gyi phyag rgya chen po'i nges pa'o //
translated: The intuition that fulfills the hopes of all the Ones-Gone-Thus is the certainty of the great seal of vajra glory.

original: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: It is called that because it is the seal of that.

original: te shatha badzra dhva dz'a gra bam zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: te shatha badzra dhva dz'a gra bam zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra is tejo-vajra-dhvaja-graha.

original: dga' ba yang yin la chen po yang yin pas dga' ba chen po ste /
analyzed: dga' ba yang yin la chen po yang yin pas dga' ba chen po ste /
translated: It is great joy, because it is joy and it is great.

original: yid bde ba'o //
analyzed: yid bde ba'o //
translated: It is mental satisfaction.

original: de'i shugs ni lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de'i shugs ni lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa'o //
translated: Its impetus is its spontaneous engagement.

original: de'i 'byung ba ni skye ba ste rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de'i 'byung ba ni skye ba ste rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Its origination is birth, which is to say, the accomplishment of the great seal of the vajra smile.

original: de'i ye shes ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ye shes ni nges pa'o //
translated: Its intuition is ascertainment.

original: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de ni dga' ba chen po'i shugs 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de ni dga' ba chen po'i shugs 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ste /
translated: That which is sealed by that is called the seal of intuition, which is the origination of the force of great joy.

original: hri da ya badzra ha sa zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: hri da ya badzra ha sa zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra is hrīḥ hā vajra hasa.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The jewel meditative stabilization of all Ones-Gone-Thus is as follows:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / byams pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa rin po che'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / byams pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa rin po che'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'o //
translated: The jewel meditative stabilization of all Ones-Gone-Thus is the single-pointed focus of the mind on the jewel of the wealth, fearlessness, love, and Dharma giving of all Ones-Gone-Thus.

original: rang gi snying ga yang yin la rdo rje snying po yang yin pas na /
analyzed: rang gi snying ga yang yin la rdo rje snying po yang yin pas na /
translated: Since it is one's heart and also the essence of the vajra, it is the vajra heart.

original: rang gi snying ga rdo rje snying po ste bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i rang gi snying ga'i zla ba gang yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje phra mo'i snying po'o //
analyzed: rang gi snying ga rdo rje snying po ste bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i rang gi snying ga'i zla ba gang yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje phra mo'i snying po'o //
translated: The essence of the vajra at one’s heart, that is, the Bhagavān Amitābha, is the essence of the moon at one’s heart, that is, the Bhagavān Vajrasattva, as a subtle vajra.

original: de la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi thugs ka nas sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis byung nas 'od dpag med pa'i thugs kar rdo rje'i dbyibs zhes pa rdo rje phra mo'i bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs shing brtan par byas nas bzhugs so //
analyzed: de la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi thugs ka nas sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis byung nas 'od dpag med pa'i thugs kar rdo rje'i dbyibs zhes pa rdo rje phra mo'i bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs shing brtan par byas nas bzhugs so //
translated: There, having emerged from the heart of Ratnasaṃbhava in the manner previously explained, the vajra shape at the heart of Amitābha, which is to say, the nature of a subtle vajra, is consecrated and remains firm.

original: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa @195b nyid ni stong pa nyid du mtshungs pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa @195b nyid ni stong pa nyid du mtshungs pa nyid do //
translated: The sameness of all phenomena is their sameness in emptiness.

original: de'i ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya chen po'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya chen po'i nges pa'o //
translated: Its pristine awareness is the ascertainment of the great seal of the doctrine, which is the pristine awareness of the maṇḍala of the realm of phenomena as it is taught in the Vajra-dharma section of the tantra.

original: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: That which is the seal of that is called “the seal of the sameness of all phenomena.”

original: badzra padma a'atma ko zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: badzra padma a'atma ko zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra is vajra padma ātmako.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni rdo rje rnon po'i phyag rgya chen po'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni rdo rje rnon po'i phyag rgya chen po'i nges pa'o //
translated: The wisdom of all the tathagatas is the certainty of the great seal of the vajra sharpness.

original: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma dang 'dra ste /
translated: That very one’s seal, etc., is as before.

original: hri da badzra ko sha zhes bya ba'i sngags yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: hri da badzra ko sha zhes bya ba'i sngags yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The mantra is hrīḥ vajra kośa.

original: 'khor lo yang yin pa chen po yang yin pas 'khor lo chen po ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo yang yin pa chen po yang yin pas 'khor lo chen po ste /
translated: A great wheel is a great circle,

original: rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams so //
translated: the maṇḍalas of the vajra realm, etc.

original: de rnams su 'jug pa ni 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams su 'jug pa ni 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa ste /
translated: Entering into them is entering the great wheel.

original: rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya chen po de'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya chen po de'i ye shes so //
translated: The wisdom of that great seal of the vajra cause.

original: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: That very one’s seal is called that.

original: ti shtha badzra tsa kra hri da yam pra be sha zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: ti shtha badzra tsa kra hri da yam pra be sha zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra is tiṣṭha vajra cakra hrīḥ daṃ praveśaya.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la chos kyi tshig kyang yin pas na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la chos kyi tshig kyang yin pas na /
translated: Since he is all the Tathagatas and also the words of the Dharma,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshig ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshig ste /
translated: he is the words of the Dharma of all the Tathagatas.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje smra ba'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje smra ba'o //
translated: The Blessed One is Vajra Speech.

original: de nyid spros pa med pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid spros pa med pa ste /
translated: He is also free from conceptual elaboration,

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: non-conceptual.

original: de'i ye shes ni nges pa'o ;
analyzed: de'i ye shes ni nges pa'o ;
translated: His gnosis is certain.

original: / de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: / de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: He who is the seal of that is so-called.

original: badzra dzi hv'a gri hra da ya zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: badzra dzi hv'a gri hra da ya zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra is vajra-jñāna-griha-hrīḥ.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ring nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ring nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The concentration of the Dharma of all the Tathagatas means

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i chos kyi rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i chos kyi rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'o //
translated: the concentration of the Dharma of all the Tathagatas, the perfection of wisdom, the bases of miraculous powers, and the four right discriminations.

original: rang gi snying gar rdo rje gnyis po zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga yang yin la /
analyzed: rang gi snying gar rdo rje gnyis po zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga yang yin la /
translated: The phrase “at your heart” means that it is your heart,

original: rdo rje snying po yang yin pas na /
analyzed: rdo rje snying po yang yin pas na /
translated: and it is also the essence of the vajra.

original: rang gi snying gar rdo rje snying po ste /
analyzed: rang gi snying gar rdo rje snying po ste /
translated: Therefore, it is the essence of the vajra at your heart.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i rang gi thugs ka'i zla ba der rdo rje phra mo gang yin pa de ni rang gi thugs ka rdo rje snying po ste /🔽rdo rje de las byung nas rdo rje snying po der zhugs zhes bya ba don yod par grub pa'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de @196a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i rang gi thugs ka'i zla ba der rdo rje phra mo gang yin pa de ni rang gi thugs ka rdo rje snying po ste / rdo rje de las byung nas rdo rje snying po der zhugs zhes bya ba don yod par grub pa'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de @196a * //
translated: The subtle vajra at the moon in the heart of the Bhagavat Amitābha is the essence of the vajra at your heart.🔽Having arisen from that vajra, it enters that essence of the vajra.

original: las ; rdo rje phra mo'i snying po yin pas na /
analyzed: las ; rdo rje phra mo'i snying po yin pas na /
translated: The moon disk at the heart of Amoghasiddhi is the essence of the subtle vajra.

original: de'i phyir rdo rje snying po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje snying po zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the essence of the vajra.

original: der zhugs pa ni sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis 'dod dpag tu med pa'i thugs ka nas byung ste zhugs pa de yang rdo rje phra mo'i dbyibs su bdag nyid brtan par byas te zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: der zhugs pa ni sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis 'dod dpag tu med pa'i thugs ka nas byung ste zhugs pa de yang rdo rje phra mo'i dbyibs su bdag nyid brtan par byas te zhugs pa'o //
translated: Having entered, having arisen from the heart of the Tathagata as explained above, having entered, having stabilized oneself in the form of a subtle vajra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la /
translated: all the Tathagatas

original: las sna tshogs pa yang yin pas na //
analyzed: las sna tshogs pa yang yin pas na //
translated: and also various activities,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las sna tshogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las sna tshogs pa ste /
translated: are the various activities of all the Tathagatas.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin de'i ye shes so //
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin de'i ye shes so //
translated: That gnosis is the nature of the great seal of vajra activity as taught in the Dharma mandala.

original: de nyid gang phyag rgya yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las sna tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: de nyid gang phyag rgya yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las sna tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: That which is the seal is the seal of the gnosis of the various activities of all the Tathagatas.

original: sarba badzra a'atma ko zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: sarba badzra a'atma ko zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
translated: That is the mantra, “sarva-vajra-āṭṭaṃka.”

original: thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus ni /
analyzed: thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus ni /
translated: Invincible diligence

original: rdo rje bsrungs ba'i phyag rgya chen po ste de'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rdo rje bsrungs ba'i phyag rgya chen po ste de'i ye shes so //
translated: is the great seal of vajra protection, and that is its gnosis.

original: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de ni thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de ni thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: He whose seal is that is the seal of the knowledge of the invincible effort.

original: hri da ya badzra ka ba tsa zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: hri da ya badzra ka ba tsa zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra is HRIDA YA VAJRA KAVACHA.

original: bdud kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na bdud thams cad do //
analyzed: bdud kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na bdud thams cad do //
translated: Since it is a demon and all, it is all demons.

original: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni yan lag bzhi'i dpung gi tshogs so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni yan lag bzhi'i dpung gi tshogs so //
translated: Their mandala is the four-branched army.

original: de rnam par 'joms par mdzad pas na bdud thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms pa ste /
analyzed: de rnam par 'joms par mdzad pas na bdud thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms pa ste /
translated: Since he destroys them, he is the destroyer of the mandala of all demons.

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya chen po'i sku ste de'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya chen po'i sku ste de'i ye shes so //
translated: He is the body of the great seal of Vajrayaksha, and that is his knowledge.

original: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de la de skad ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de la de skad ces bya ba ste /
translated: He whose seal is that is called that.

original: tishtha badzra yaksha hri da ya zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: tishtha badzra yaksha hri da ya zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra is TISTHA VAJRA YAKSHA HRIDAYA.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ching ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya chen po yin pas de'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ching ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya chen po yin pas de'i ye shes so //
translated: Since the great seal of Vajra Fist is the binding of all tathagatas, that is its knowledge.

original: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de ni bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ching ba'i ye shes zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid gang gi phyag rgya yin pa de ni bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ching ba'i ye shes zhes bya ste /
translated: He who is the seal of that is called the knowledge of the binding of all the Tathagatas.

original: badzra mu shti hri da ya zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: badzra mu shti hri da ya zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra is vajra-musti hṛdaya.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las la so sor rtog pa'i nan tan nyams su len pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam par thugs rtse gci gtu mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las la so sor rtog pa'i nan tan nyams su len pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam par thugs rtse gci gtu mdzad pa'o //
translated: The samadhi called “the activity of all the Tathagatas” is the one-pointed mind of the Tathagatas, which is the practice of the discernment of the activity of all the Tathagatas.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste sngags bcu drug sprul ba'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste sngags bcu drug sprul ba'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
translated: The word “then” means immediately, after the emanation of the sixteen mantras.

original: bcom ldan @196b 'das phyag na rdo rje ni rdo rjes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan @196b 'das phyag na rdo rje ni rdo rjes sems dpa'o //
translated: The Blessed One Vajrapani is the Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje rab tu phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan mas khyab pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: rdo rje rab tu phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan mas khyab pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: The method of pervasion by the sign of the knowledge of the subtle vajra has been explained.

original: tshul des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ba'o //
analyzed: tshul des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ba'o //
translated: By that method, he comes forth from the hearts of all the Tathagatas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang yin la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang yin la /
translated: He is a great bodhisattva,

original: phyag na rdo rje yang yin pas na byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje ste /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje yang yin pas na byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje ste /
translated: and he is Vajrapāṇi,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: Vajrasattva.

original: de'i sku ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje'i sku ste der gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sku ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje'i sku ste der gyur pa'o //
translated: His body is the body of the great bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi, which became that.

original: 'di skad ston te sngags bcu drug gis bdag nyid la bdag nyid kyis bskul nas rdo rje phra mo'i mtshan mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku kun du bkang la /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te sngags bcu drug gis bdag nyid la bdag nyid kyis bskul nas rdo rje phra mo'i mtshan mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku kun du bkang la /
translated: This is what is being taught: having exhorted oneself with the sixteen mantras, one fills the bodies of all the tathāgatas with the sign of the subtle vajra.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku las rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs nyid kyis byung ste /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku las rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs nyid kyis byung ste /
translated: Then, from the body of all the tathāgatas, the form of the subtle vajra arises from oneself.

original: de rnams rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa las bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar bskyed par gyur to //
analyzed: de rnams rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa las bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar bskyed par gyur to //
translated: Those become one, and one generates oneself as Vajrasattva.

original: de ltar bdag nyid bskyed nas yang rang gi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas bzhugs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de ltar bdag nyid bskyed nas yang rang gi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas bzhugs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Having generated oneself in that way, one again enters into equipoise in the samādhi of one’s essence and abides.

original: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni slar yang zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni slar yang zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: The word “again” means “once again.”

original: dang po phyag na rdo rjer gyur nas yang sems dpa' thams cad la sogs pa'i tshul du gyur pa'o //🔽rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa yin la byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang yin pas /
analyzed: dang po phyag na rdo rjer gyur nas yang sems dpa' thams cad la sogs pa'i tshul du gyur pa'o // rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa yin la byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang yin pas /
translated: Having first become Vajrapāṇi, he again becomes in the manner of all heroes and so forth.🔽He is Vajrasattva and so forth, and he is also a great bodhisattva.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams te /
translated: Therefore, he is the great bodhisattvas Vajrasattva and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi sku zhes bya ba lus su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sku zhes bya ba lus su gyur pa'o //
translated: Their bodies are the bodies of those.

original: rang rang gi mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang rdo rje lcags kyu dang / mda' dang mgu ba dang / rin po che dang / nyi ma dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'dzum pa dang / padma dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang lce dang /
analyzed: rang rang gi mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang rdo rje lcags kyu dang / mda' dang mgu ba dang / rin po che dang / nyi ma dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'dzum pa dang / padma dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang lce dang /
translated: Their own emblems are the vajra, the vajra hook, the arrow, the smile, the jewel, the sun, the banner, the laughter, the lotus, the sword, the wheel, the tongue,

original: sna tshogs rdo rje dang / go cha dang / mche ba dang / khu tshur gyi gzugs nas 'bru tsam phyi rol gyi thugs kar bzhag nas /
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje dang / go cha dang / mche ba dang / khu tshur gyi gzugs nas 'bru tsam phyi rol gyi thugs kar bzhag nas /
translated: the crossed vajra, the armor, the tusk, and the form of the fist, from the size of a grain of barley, placed outside in the heart.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po dgod pa'i dbyings su bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po dgod pa'i dbyings su bya ste /
translated: One should understand that the Bhagavat, having arranged the great mandala of the vajra realm,

original: dgod pa'i tshul des bkod nas /
analyzed: dgod pa'i tshul des bkod nas /
translated: having arranged it in that way,🔽gradually entered into the meditative stabilization of his essence,

original: rim gyis rang gi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa ni rang gi snying po'i don dang / rjes su mthun par mnyam par 'jog pas rang gi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par @197a * //🔽gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: rim gyis rang gi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa ni rang gi snying po'i don dang / rjes su mthun par mnyam par 'jog pas rang gi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par @197a * // gzhag pa ste /
translated: he entered into the meditative stabilization of his essence

original: de mngon sum du mdzad nas bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de mngon sum du mdzad nas bzhugs pa'o //
translated: and remained in its direct realization.

original: ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sems dpa' bcu drug gi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan mar nga gi thugs kar bzhag nas rang gi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste bzhugs pa yin la //
analyzed: ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sems dpa' bcu drug gi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan mar nga gi thugs kar bzhag nas rang gi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste bzhugs pa yin la //
translated: Just as he remained in the meditative stabilization of his essence, having arranged his own essence-mantra in the form of the sixteen beings such as Vajrasattva in his heart,

original: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs ba'i bar gyi tshul gyis kyang bzhugs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs ba'i bar gyi tshul gyis kyang bzhugs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: one should understand that he remained in the meditative stabilization of his essence in the same way as Vairocana and so forth up to Vajravesa.

original: de ltar na de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de ltar na de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: Thus, beginning from “Then the Bhagavat,”🔽🔽

original: rang gi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis ni /
analyzed: rang gi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis ni /
translated: Thus, the passage beginning with “Then the Lord” and ending with “remained in equipoise in the samadhi of his essence”

original: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin ston pa yin no //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin ston pa yin no //
translated: teaches the samadhi of the supreme king of mandalas.

original: de yang rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyis rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la ji skad bshad pa'i dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i nga rgyal la gnas
analyzed: de yang rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyis rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la ji skad bshad pa'i dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i nga rgyal la gnas
translated: Moreover, through the yoga of Vajrasattva, one should perform the great yoga taught in the Great Vajra Realm Mandala, and having equipoised oneself in the samadhi of the initial union as explained, the yogi who abides in the pride of the five tathagatas

original: pa'i rnal 'byor pas chos kyi dkyil 'khor blo la bzhag ste /
analyzed: pa'i rnal 'byor pas chos kyi dkyil 'khor blo la bzhag ste /
translated: should visualize the Dharma mandala in the mind.

original: sngags lngas brtan par byas nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / yang bdag nyid rdo rje sems pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje phra mo mdzod cig ces bskul bar bya'o //
analyzed: sngags lngas brtan par byas nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / yang bdag nyid rdo rje sems pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje phra mo mdzod cig ces bskul bar bya'o //
translated: Having stabilized with the five mantras, and having the pride of Vairochana, again one should exhort oneself with the concentration of Vajrasattva, “Produce the subtle vajra.”

original: de nas bskul ba'i rjes thogs nyid la rdo rje phra mo'i 'od zer gyi gzugs kyis byung la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams rnams la rdo rje phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin bskyed de
analyzed: de nas bskul ba'i rjes thogs nyid la rdo rje phra mo'i 'od zer gyi gzugs kyis byung la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams rnams la rdo rje phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin bskyed de
translated: Then, immediately after the exhortation, having arisen in the form of the light rays of the subtle vajra, having illuminated all world systems, one should generate the subtle vajra concentration in the realms of sentient beings according to their fortune.

original: slar log nas slar 'dus pa'i rdo rje phra mo gcig tu bdag nyid bskyed la rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar zhugs na /
analyzed: slar log nas slar 'dus pa'i rdo rje phra mo gcig tu bdag nyid bskyed la rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar zhugs na /
translated: Having returned, having generated oneself as a single subtle vajra, if one enters into the heart of Vairochana,

original: s'u kshma badzra zhes zlos pa nyid dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs nyid kyis byung ste /
analyzed: s'u kshma badzra zhes zlos pa nyid dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs nyid kyis byung ste /
translated: one should recite “sukṣma-vajra,” and from the heart of Vairochana, having arisen in the form of the subtle vajra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs kyi rtse mor gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di chen du brjod la /🔽de bzhin bshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo nas rdo rje phra mo'i mtshan mas de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku thob ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs kyi rtse mor gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di chen du brjod la / de bzhin bshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo nas rdo rje phra mo'i mtshan mas de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku thob ste /
translated: Abiding at the tip of the nose of the Tathagata, he uttered this meaningful expression:🔽“Oh! The vajra of wisdom of all tathāgatas is the supreme vajra, which is the vajra of the body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas.”🔽Then, from the tip of the nose of all those tathāgatas, the sign of a subtle vajra entered the body of the Vajra Holder, and from that body of the Vajra Holder, the sign of a subtle vajra filled the realm of space.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de rnams las yang rdo rje phra mo'i mtshan mas nam mkha'i dbyings su kun du bkang la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de rnams las yang rdo rje phra mo'i mtshan mas nam mkha'i dbyings su kun du bkang la /
translated: Then, from all those bodies of the tathāgatas, the sign of a subtle vajra filled the realm of space.

original: @197b de thams cad nam mkha'i khams kyi tshad tsam gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse gcig tu bdag nyid bskyed la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: @197b de thams cad nam mkha'i khams kyi tshad tsam gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse gcig tu bdag nyid bskyed la gnas par bya'o //
translated: All of that became the single-pointed wisdom vajra of all tathāgatas, the size of the realm of space, and he generated himself and remained.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nga rgyal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbus su rdo rje phra mo bskyed pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa nyid du byas la rdo rje chen po de las badzra na pi
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nga rgyal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbus su rdo rje phra mo bskyed pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa nyid du byas la rdo rje chen po de las badzra na pi
translated: Then, with the pride of all tathāgatas, one should visualize a subtle vajra in the center of the gnosis vajra of all tathāgatas, and with a one-pointed mind, one should recite the mantra “vajra niḥ”

original: ta th'a ga ta h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyi sngags thob nas /
analyzed: ta th'a ga ta h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyi sngags thob nas /
translated: and attain the form of Vajrasattva.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lte ba'i phyogs su rdo rje phra mor gyur nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lte ba'i phyogs su rdo rje phra mor gyur nas /
translated: Then, from the navel of all tathāgatas, one should become a subtle vajra,

original: lte ba'i phyogs nas byung ste /
analyzed: lte ba'i phyogs nas byung ste /
translated: and emerge from the navel.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs kyi rtse mor gnas nas shangs kyi bu ga nas rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi thugs kar zhugs nas gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs kyi rtse mor gnas nas shangs kyi bu ga nas rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi thugs kar zhugs nas gnas par bya'o //
translated: Residing at the tip of the nose of the tathāgatas, one should emerge from the nostrils in the form of a subtle vajra, enter the hearts of those tathāgatas, and abide there.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ka nas sngags rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku las rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis byung ba dang / de rnams gcig tu gyur nas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar sprul la /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ka nas sngags rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku las rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis byung ba dang / de rnams gcig tu gyur nas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar sprul la /
translated: Then, the mantras come forth just as they are from the heart of the Tathagata, and from the body of all the Tathagatas, they come forth in the manner of subtle vajras.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi sku las lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi gzugs su sprul la /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi sku las lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi gzugs su sprul la /
translated: Having become one, one emanates oneself as Vajrasattva, and Vajrasattva emanates the thirty-seven deities from his body.

original: rang gi sngags zlos pa nyid dang ; rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis gzhag par bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang gi sngags zlos pa nyid dang ; rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis gzhag par bya ba ni /
translated: One should recite one’s own mantra and arrange them in the manner of the Vajradhatu mandala.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin yin par bstan to //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin yin par bstan to //
translated: This is taught to be the supreme concentration of the mandala king.

original: de nas bsdu ba sngon du 'gro ba'i las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gsum pa ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshul du rjes su spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bsdu ba sngon du 'gro ba'i las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gsum pa ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshul du rjes su spyad par bya'o //
translated: Then, the third supreme concentration of the king of rites, preceded by the gathering, should be performed in the manner taught in the Great Mandala of the Vajradhatu.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to accomplish the great seal and so forth, which are taught in the Dharma maṇḍala,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang chos kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gsungs so ;
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang chos kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gsungs so ;
translated: the extensive ritual procedures for the master’s acts, and the entrance into the Dharma maṇḍala, and so forth, are taught, beginning with “then.”

original: / de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: / de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das ma thag pa ste /
translated: The word “then” means immediately after,

original: sngon du bsnyen pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: sngon du bsnyen pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: following the prior service.

original: de yang 'dir 'og nas bshad pa'i phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas sna'i rtse mor dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de yang 'dir 'og nas bshad pa'i phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas sna'i rtse mor dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas /
translated: Moreover, here, having meditated on the maṇḍala at the tip of the nose by the ritual of the maṇḍala of the four seals that will be explained below,

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor @198a * //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor @198a * //
translated: one should perform the yoga taught in the Vajradhātu maṇḍala,

original: dang de bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po bya ba nas /
analyzed: dang de bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po bya ba nas /
translated: and likewise, the great yoga, and so forth,

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sngags thams cad bzlas brjod 'bum bya ba'am /
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sngags thams cad bzlas brjod 'bum bya ba'am /
translated: and recite the one hundred thousand recitations of all the mantras taught in the Dharma maṇḍala.

original: mtshan ma 'byung ba'i bar du ting nge 'dzin gsum sngon du 'gro bas chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms par gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshan ma 'byung ba'i bar du ting nge 'dzin gsum sngon du 'gro bas chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms par gyur pa yin no //
translated: Up to the arising of the signs, the three meditative stabilizations precede, and one meditates on the Dharma maṇḍala.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge de 'dzin gyi ye shes ni ting nge 'dzin sum cu rtsa bdun gyi nges pa dang rdo rje phra mo la sogs pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge de 'dzin gyi ye shes ni ting nge 'dzin sum cu rtsa bdun gyi nges pa dang rdo rje phra mo la sogs pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: The gnosis of the meditative stabilization of all the Ones-Gone-Thus is the ascertainment of the thirty-seven meditative stabilizations and the ascertainment of the subtle vajra and so forth.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa ni drug ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa ni drug ste /
translated: The superknowledges of all the Ones-Gone-Thus are the six:

original: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa'o //
translated: These are the superknowledges of the gnosis of the meditative stabilization of all those Ones-Gone-Thus.

original: de bsgrub pa ni sngon du bya ba ste de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bsgrub pa ni sngon du bya ba ste de'i phyir ro //
translated: The accomplishment of those is the preliminary, and it is for that reason.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni thus la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni thus la gnas pa'o //
translated: This is the place of the assembly.

original: rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes ni rdo rje phra mo ste /
analyzed: rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes ni rdo rje phra mo ste /
translated: The gnosis of the subtle vajra is the subtle vajra.

original: des nye bar mtshon pa'i dkyil 'khor de bshad do zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: des nye bar mtshon pa'i dkyil 'khor de bshad do zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'o //
translated: The maṇḍala illustrated by that is explained, that is, is taught.

original: de nyid bstan pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The explanation of that is stated by “Then” and so forth.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gnas skabs te 'di brtsam par bya'o zhes bya'o ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gnas skabs te 'di brtsam par bya'o zhes bya'o ba'i don to //
translated: The word “then” is a temporal [word], meaning “this should be undertaken.”

original: de yang gang gi phyir ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med par phra mo'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de yang gang gi phyir ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med par phra mo'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur te /
translated: And that is because without entering the mandala of wisdom, one will not attain the powers taught in the subtle mandala.

original: de bas na yang dag par bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na yang dag par bshad par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be explained.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
translated: The supreme mandala of phenomena

original: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: is the mandala in which the seal of phenomena is primary.

original: dam pa ni mchog go //
analyzed: dam pa ni mchog go //
translated: “ Supreme” means “best.”

original: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na //
translated: Since it is similar to the vajra realm,

original: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: it means that it is similar to the emanation mandala of phenomena.

original: ming ji skad ces bya zhe na rdo rje phra mo zhes bshad do zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: ming ji skad ces bya zhe na rdo rje phra mo zhes bshad do zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: What is its name? It is explained as the “subtle vajra.”

original: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
translated: In the manner of the great mandala,

original: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag / ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag / ces bya ba ni /
translated: The great beings should also be placed.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'dra bar dkyil 'khor thams cad bris la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa sems dpa' chen po rnams go rims de nyid kyis gzhag par bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'dra bar dkyil 'khor thams cad bris la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa sems dpa' chen po rnams go rims de nyid kyis gzhag par bya ste /
translated: Having drawn all the maṇḍalas like the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm, the great beings such as Vairocana should be placed in their respective places.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sngags zlos shing yang dag par bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sngags zlos shing yang dag par bri bar bya'o //
translated: One should draw them reciting the mantras taught in the Dharma maṇḍala.

original: ji ltar bri bar bya zhe na /🔽rdo rje'i dbus su sangs rgyas bri //
analyzed: ji ltar bri bar bya zhe na / rdo rje'i dbus su sangs rgyas bri //
translated: How should they be drawn?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The Buddha is drawn in the middle of the vajra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ldan ni @198b ji skad du bshad pa'i gdan la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ldan ni @198b ji skad du bshad pa'i gdan la /
translated: The Tathāgata is drawn on the seat as explained,

original: rdo rje lnga ba legs pa bri la /
analyzed: rdo rje lnga ba legs pa bri la /
translated: and the five vajras are drawn well.

original: de dag gi chang gzungs la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gi chang gzungs la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bri bar bya'o //
translated: In their centers, the five Tathāgatas such as Vairocana should be drawn.

original: sang rgyas dkyil 'khor rnams su yang //
analyzed: sang rgyas dkyil 'khor rnams su yang //
translated: In the maṇḍalas of the Buddhas,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor rnams te de rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor rnams te de rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The maṇḍalas of Vajrasattva and so forth are the maṇḍalas of the Buddhas, and they are of the nature of the Buddhas.

original: sems dpa' chen po rnams bri zhing //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po rnams bri zhing // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The great beings should be drawn.

original: dra rnams su rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag par bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dra rnams su rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag par bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the maṇḍalas, the great beings, Vajrasattva and so forth, should be drawn.

original: de bzhin thugs ka nyid phyag rgya //
analyzed: de bzhin thugs ka nyid phyag rgya //
translated: The mudrā at the heart itself.

original: zhes bya ba la 'di rnams kyi thugs kar de nyid dra rang gi phyag rgya rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgya /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la 'di rnams kyi thugs kar de nyid dra rang gi phyag rgya rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgya /
translated: At their hearts, the mudrās of their own vajra and so forth should be drawn.

original: ji ltar de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bri ba de bzhin du sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bri ba de bzhin du sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bri bar bya'o //
translated: Just as the Buddha is drawn in the center, so should the great beings be drawn.

original: bzhugs tshul ji lta bus sangs rgyas la sogs pa bri bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: bzhugs tshul ji lta bus sangs rgyas la sogs pa bri bar bya zhe na /
translated: In what manner should the Buddha and so forth be drawn?

original: ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa dang // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa dang // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Seated in samādhi,

original: rdo rje'i skyil krung bcas la mnyam par gzhag pa'i tshul gyi spyod lam gyis gzhug par bya'o zhes bya'o tha tshig go //
analyzed: rdo rje'i skyil krung bcas la mnyam par gzhag pa'i tshul gyi spyod lam gyis gzhug par bya'o zhes bya'o tha tshig go //
translated: One should enter with the deportment of equipoise, sitting in the vajra posture.

original: phyag gnyis rdo rje 'ching bar bcings //
analyzed: phyag gnyis rdo rje 'ching bar bcings //
translated: The two-armed ones hold vajra-binding.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas bskal pa bzang po'i bar 'di rnams ni phyag gnyis rdo rje bsdams pas rang gi mtshan mnas 'bras kyi tshad tsam rang gi thugs kar bzhag nas rdo rje bsdams pa bkan te phreng ba'i tshul du bzhag
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas bskal pa bzang po'i bar 'di rnams ni phyag gnyis rdo rje bsdams pas rang gi mtshan mnas 'bras kyi tshad tsam rang gi thugs kar bzhag nas rdo rje bsdams pa bkan te phreng ba'i tshul du bzhag
translated: This means that Vairocana and so forth, up to the Bhadrakalpa Buddhas, hold their own emblems at their hearts with two-armed vajra-binding, the size of a grain of rice, and remain in the posture of vajra-binding, placed in the manner of a garland.

original: nas bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i tshig go //🔽de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nas bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i tshig go // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: This is the meaning of the words.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bdag nyid 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad de /
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bdag nyid 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad de /
translated: Then, having drawn the mandala in that way, one should perform the ritual of entering oneself and so forth in the manner of the Great Mandala of the Vajra Realm.

original: bdag la byin gyis brlabs la sogs //
analyzed: bdag la byin gyis brlabs la sogs //
translated: One should perform the consecration and so forth,

original: ji lta bar ni bka' nod do //
analyzed: ji lta bar ni bka' nod do //
translated: and receive the command just as it is.

original: de ltar bgyis nas bdag mi brjod //
analyzed: de ltar bgyis nas bdag mi brjod //
translated: Having done so, one should not speak of oneself.

original: de nas rdo rje bsgrub bgyi ba //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje bsgrub bgyi ba //
translated: Then, one should accomplish the vajra.

original: rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi //
translated: The vajra master, the hero,

original: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
translated: having bound the vajra hook,

original: se gol mang po gdab bgyis la //
analyzed: se gol mang po gdab bgyis la //
translated: should snap his fingers many times

original: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi //
translated: and summon all the buddhas.

original: de tshe sang rgyas thams cad ni //
analyzed: de tshe sang rgyas thams cad ni //
translated: At that time, all the buddhas,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcas //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcas //
translated: together with Vajrasattva and so forth,

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams //🔽dkyil 'khor @199a* //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams // dkyil 'khor @199a* //
translated: filling all the maṇḍalas,

original: rnams su 'dus par gyur //
analyzed: rnams su 'dus par gyur //
translated: gather in the maṇḍala.

original: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yin //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yin //
translated: Then, being Vajrasattva,

original: phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //🔽ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing // ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
translated: meditating on the great seal,🔽I will slightly recite

original: cung zad rab tu brjod par bgyi //
analyzed: cung zad rab tu brjod par bgyi //
translated: the excellent hundred and eight names.

original: de nas 'dus pa dgyes pa na //
analyzed: de nas 'dus pa dgyes pa na //
translated: Then, the delighted assembly,

original: de bzhin gshegs rnams brtan par gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs rnams brtan par gyur //
translated: the tathāgatas become firm.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' rang grub pa //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' rang grub pa //
translated: Vajrasattva, self-accomplished,

original: grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas //
analyzed: grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas //
translated: remains as a friend.

original: zhes gang gsungs pa 'di dag gi rjes thogs nyid la zhes de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ston to //
analyzed: zhes gang gsungs pa 'di dag gi rjes thogs nyid la zhes de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ston to //
translated: The phrase immediately after is indicated by the word then.

original: dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te zhes bya ba ni dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ste /
analyzed: dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te zhes bya ba ni dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ste /
translated: The extensive ritual of summoning and so forth is the extensive ritual of summoning and so forth.

original: de bshad pa'o //🔽de ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgya byas la zhags pa'i las kyi phyag rgya de rnams bcug la lcags sgrog gis de rnams bcings te rdo rje 'bebs pas dbang du byas /
analyzed: de bshad pa'o // de ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgya byas la zhags pa'i las kyi phyag rgya de rnams bcug la lcags sgrog gis de rnams bcings te rdo rje 'bebs pas dbang du byas /
translated: That is explained.

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: How is it that all the Tathagatas are summoned? One should make the karma-mudra of the vajra-hook, and having summoned them with the karma-mudra of the noose, one should bind them with the karma-mudra of the fetters, and having brought them under control with the vajra-adhesion, one should remove obstacles and so forth with the vajra-yaksha.

original: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / aom badzra sandhi bam zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bcad la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / aom badzra sandhi bam zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bcad la /
translated: Then, having closed the door of the mandala with the pledge-mudra of the vajra-fist and the mantra Om vajra-sandhi bam,🔽 one should make the vajra-binding.

original: aom badzra raksha ham zhes bya bas rdo rje bsrung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrung nas /
analyzed: aom badzra raksha ham zhes bya bas rdo rje bsrung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrung nas /
translated: One should protect all the deities of the mandala with the action seal of Vajra Raksa, reciting Om Vajra Raksa Ham.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la mchod yon phul te chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa lha thams cad bsgrub par bya'o
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la mchod yon phul te chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa lha thams cad bsgrub par bya'o
translated: Then, one should offer water for welcoming with the mantra of Vajrasattva from the Dharma mandala, and one should accomplish all the deities such as the Tathagata with the pledge seals from the Dharma mandala.

original: // de nas chos dang / las dang / phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur nas mchod yon phul lo //
analyzed: // de nas chos dang / las dang / phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur nas mchod yon phul lo //
translated: Then, one should seal with the Dharma, action, and great seals, confer initiation with the initiation seal, and offer water for welcoming.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad la kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mchod de phyag byas nas nas 'bras tsam gyi rdo rje phra mo thogs la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad la kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mchod de phyag byas nas nas 'bras tsam gyi rdo rje phra mo thogs la /
translated: Then, one should make offerings to all the offerings such as the Tathagata and so forth with the seals of all offerings, and having made obeisance, one should take up a vajra the size of a grain of rice.

original: rdo rje slob ma gzhug par du ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rdo rje slob ma gzhug par du ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to induct the vajra disciples,

original: snga ma bzhin du rjes su gnang ba nod par bya ste /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du rjes su gnang ba nod par bya ste /
translated: one should receive the subsequent authorization as before.

original: 'di ni dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin no //
translated: This is the extensive ritual of summoning and so forth.🔽Having performed the extensive ritual of inducting and so forth in the manner of the great maṇḍala,

original: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i rdo rje slob ma @199b gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga 'dir yang de bzhin du byas nas so
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i rdo rje slob ma @199b gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga 'dir yang de bzhin du byas nas so
translated: having performed the ritual of inducting the vajra disciples and so forth as taught in the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm,🔽the sign of gnosis,

original: // ye shes kyi mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni 'bras tsam gyi rdo rje phra mo lag tu byin no //
analyzed: // ye shes kyi mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni 'bras tsam gyi rdo rje phra mo lag tu byin no //
translated: the subtle vajra the size of a grain, is given into the hand.

original: de las slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang / slob ma yang chos kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de las slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang / slob ma yang chos kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the ritual of the master’s acts and the extensive ritual of inducting the disciples into the Dharma maṇḍala,🔽now, in order to explain the extensive ritual of the secret maṇḍala, [the Bhagavān] declares the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm and so forth.

original: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi man ngag sbyin par bya ba yin pas na /
analyzed: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi man ngag sbyin par bya ba yin pas na /
translated: Now, for those who have received the commitments and the initiation, the instruction for the desired power is to be given, so it is said:

original: rang gi sems las su rung bar bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rang gi sems las su rung bar bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Train in the knowledge of the great seal, which is the serviceability of one's mind.

original: rang nyid kyi sems ni rang gi sems te /
analyzed: rang nyid kyi sems ni rang gi sems te /
translated: One's mind is one's own mind,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: the mind consciousness, etc.

original: de'i las su bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin du bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i las su bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin du bya ba'i phyir /
translated: The serviceability of that is for the sake of making it into meditative concentration.

original: rdo rje phra mo bsgom pa ni 'di rang gi sems las su rung bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phra mo bsgom pa ni 'di rang gi sems las su rung bar bya ba'o //
translated: The cultivation of the subtle vajra is the serviceability of one's mind.

original: de'i don gyi phyag rgya yin la chen po yang yin pas na /
analyzed: de'i don gyi phyag rgya yin la chen po yang yin pas na /
translated: Since it is the seal of the meaning of that, and it is also great,

original: phyag rgya chen po ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po ste /
translated: it is the great seal.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje phra mo'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje phra mo'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: It is the seal of the subtle vajra, as explained above.

original: de'i ye shes bslab bo zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya'o //🔽lce ni rkan la gzhag bya zhing //
analyzed: de'i ye shes bslab bo zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya'o // lce ni rkan la gzhag bya zhing //
translated: Train in the knowledge of that means one should teach it.🔽Place the tongue on the palate,

original: sna yi rtse mor bsam par bya //
analyzed: sna yi rtse mor bsam par bya //
translated: and imagine it at the tip of the nose.

original: zhes bya ba ni lce'i rtsa ba nas so'i rtse mo'i bar dang lce'i steng gi cha sbyar la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lce'i rtsa ba nas so'i rtse mo'i bar dang lce'i steng gi cha sbyar la /
translated: This is from the root of the tongue to the tip of the teeth, and the upper part of the tongue.

original: sna rtse zhes bya ba sna'i rtse mor rdo rje phra mo gnas pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i rtse mo ste /
analyzed: sna rtse zhes bya ba sna'i rtse mor rdo rje phra mo gnas pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i rtse mo ste /
translated: The tip of the nose is the tip of the nose, where the subtle vajra is located.

original: de bsam par bya zhing bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de bsam par bya zhing bsgom par bya'o //
translated: That is to be contemplated and meditated upon.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /🔽rdo rje phra mo bde reg pas //
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na / rdo rje phra mo bde reg pas //
translated: What is the result of that?

original: sems ni mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /🔽sna'i rtse mor rdo rje mor phra mo bsams pa des bde ba'i rang bzhin gyi reg pa ni bde reg pa ste /
analyzed: sems ni mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur // zhes bya ba gsungs te / sna'i rtse mor rdo rje mor phra mo bsams pa des bde ba'i rang bzhin gyi reg pa ni bde reg pa ste /
translated: The mind is placed in equipoise🔽by the blissful touch of the subtle vajra.

original: rdo rje phra mo'i bde ba'i reg par 'gyur la /
analyzed: rdo rje phra mo'i bde ba'i reg par 'gyur la /
translated: The blissful touch of the subtle vajra is the touch of the nature of bliss.🔽The blissful touch of the subtle vajra is the touch of the subtle vajra.

original: rdo rje phra mo bde ba reg par 'gyur ba de las /
analyzed: rdo rje phra mo bde ba reg par 'gyur ba de las /
translated: From that blissful touch of the subtle vajra,

original: sems mnyam par gzhag cing rtse gcig par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sems mnyam par gzhag cing rtse gcig par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: the mind is placed in equipoise, becomes one-pointed, is the meaning.

original: rdo rje phra mo bde reg pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phra mo bde reg pa'o //
translated: The blissful touch of the subtle vajra.

original: mtshan ma gal te byung ba na //
analyzed: mtshan ma gal te byung ba na //
translated: If the sign arises,

original: zhes bya ba ni sems la gang gi tshe rdo rje phra mo'i bde ba'i reg pa mtshan ma lus dang sems kyi 'byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe de brtan par byas nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sems la gang gi tshe rdo rje phra mo'i bde ba'i reg pa mtshan ma lus dang sems kyi 'byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe de brtan par byas nas /
translated: When the sign of the body and mind arises as the bliss of the touch of the subtle vajra in the mind, then, having stabilized that,

original: mtshan ma de ni khyab bya ba //
analyzed: mtshan ma de ni khyab bya ba //
translated: the sign is to be pervaded

original: sems des kun du khyab par bya //
analyzed: sems des kun du khyab par bya //
translated: by that mind, pervading everywhere.

original: zhes bya ba ste khyab par bya zhes bya ba ni rgya cher bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste khyab par bya zhes bya ba ni rgya cher bya ba'o //
translated: Pervading means expanding.

original: de la mtshan ma ni gzugs dang / reg pa'i mtshan ma gnyis so //🔽ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan ma @200a * //
analyzed: de la mtshan ma ni gzugs dang / reg pa'i mtshan ma gnyis so // ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan ma @200a * //
translated: The sign is the two signs of form and touch.

original: gnyis po de nyid kyi sems de phyogs bcur spro bar bya bas na /
analyzed: gnyis po de nyid kyi sems de phyogs bcur spro bar bya bas na /
translated: That very mind of the two signs, as explained, is to be expanded in the ten directions.

original: sems de kun du khyab par bya zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sems de kun du khyab par bya zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, it is said that the mind is to pervade everywhere.

original: ji ltar thams cad du khyab cing spro bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar thams cad du khyab cing spro bar bya zhe na /
translated: How is it to pervade and expand everywhere?

original: ji tsam 'dod par khyab ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ji tsam 'dod par khyab ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said, “as much as one wishes.”

original: ji tsam 'dod par spro ba ni ji tsam 'dod par khyab pa'o ;
analyzed: ji tsam 'dod par spro ba ni ji tsam 'dod par khyab pa'o ;
translated: Expanding as much as one wishes is pervading as much as one wishes.

original: / ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: / ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sems de khams gsum du yang khyab par bya zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sems de khams gsum du yang khyab par bya zhes bya'o //
translated: One should pervade the mind with the three realms.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is the teaching:

original: zla ba gnyis sna'i rtse mor rdo rje phra mo bsgoms pa na /
analyzed: zla ba gnyis sna'i rtse mor rdo rje phra mo bsgoms pa na /
translated: When one meditates on the subtle vajra at the tip of the nose,

original: gang gi tshe nyin re zhing de mthong ba de'i tshe rnal 'byor pa de'i lus thams ca rdo rje phra mo'i reg pa'i bde bas tshim par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe nyin re zhing de mthong ba de'i tshe rnal 'byor pa de'i lus thams ca rdo rje phra mo'i reg pa'i bde bas tshim par 'gyur ro //
translated: then when one sees it every day, at that time the entire body of that yogin is satisfied by the bliss of the touch of the subtle vajra.

original: rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs bsgoms pa'i stobs des gang gi tshe rang gi lus thams cad khyab par mthong ba de'i tshe de bzhin gcig tu 'phel bar 'dod na rdo rje phra mos khyab par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs bsgoms pa'i stobs des gang gi tshe rang gi lus thams cad khyab par mthong ba de'i tshe de bzhin gcig tu 'phel bar 'dod na rdo rje phra mos khyab par bsam par bya'o //
translated: By the power of meditating on the form of the subtle vajra, when one sees it pervading one's entire body, at that time if one wishes to increase it in the same way, one should imagine it pervading with subtle vajras.

original: de nas grong la sogs pa ro //
analyzed: de nas grong la sogs pa ro //
translated: Then one should expand it to the village,

original: de nas yang khams gsum pa'i bar du spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas yang khams gsum pa'i bar du spro bar bya'o //
translated: and then one should expand it up to the three realms.

original: de nas yang bsdu ba ni //
analyzed: de nas yang bsdu ba ni //
translated: Then again, the gathering is

original: sna'i rtse mo'i bar du gnas //
analyzed: sna'i rtse mo'i bar du gnas //
translated: up to the tip of the nose.

original: zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma de yang rdo rje pha mo lta bu gang gis khams khyab pa de bsdus la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma de yang rdo rje pha mo lta bu gang gis khams khyab pa de bsdus la /
translated: The sign of form is also like a diamond, which pervades the elements.

original: sna'i rtse mor gnas pa'i rdo rje phra mor bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sna'i rtse mor gnas pa'i rdo rje phra mor bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is the meaning of the statement that one should enter by the power of meditation on the subtle vajra at the tip of the nose.

original: de ltar spro ba dang bsu ba'i tshul gyis rdo rje phra mo zla ba gsum gyi bar du bsgoms na cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar spro ba dang bsu ba'i tshul gyis rdo rje phra mo zla ba gsum gyi bar du bsgoms na cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If one meditates on the subtle vajra in that way by the method of emanating and gathering for three months, what will happen?

original: de nas brtsams te phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa gang ci yang rung ba shin tu mnyam par gzhag cing rtse gcig pas bsgoms pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa de kun te /
analyzed: de nas brtsams te phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa gang ci yang rung ba shin tu mnyam par gzhag cing rtse gcig pas bsgoms pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa de kun te /
translated: Then, whatever is meditated on with great concentration and one-pointedness, such as the great seal and so forth, all of those great seals and so forth

original: de dag thams cad brtan pa nyid du byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag thams cad brtan pa nyid du byed par 'gyur te /
translated: will be stabilized.

original: mngon sum du byed par gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon sum du byed par gyur ro //
translated: They will be actualized.

original: nyid kyi sgra ni nges par gzung ba dang tha dad pa'i rim pa yin par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: nyid kyi sgra ni nges par gzung ba dang tha dad pa'i rim pa yin par shes par bya ste /
translated: The word “only” should be understood to be a specification and a different stage.

original: brtan par byed pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: brtan par byed pa nyid yin no //
translated: It is the stabilization itself.

original: ting nge 'dzin ye shes ni rdo rje pha mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ye shes ni rdo rje pha mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi nges pa'o //
translated: The concentration intuition is the ascertainment of the Vajra Lady concentration.

original: des brtags pa ni bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: des brtags pa ni bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The investigation by that is called “accomplishment.”

original: de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no //
analyzed: de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no //
translated: Then, their essence is this:

original: sna'i rtse mor rdo rje phra mo bsgoms pa dang / spro ba dang / bsdu ba dang / brtan par bya ba rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: sna'i rtse mor rdo rje phra mo bsgoms pa dang / spro ba dang / bsdu ba dang / brtan par bya ba rnams kyi'o //
