translated: The cultivation of the subtle vajra at the tip of the nose, and the emanating, gathering, and stabilizing of it.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: rdo rje dbyings @200b kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i cho ga rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas pa'i rjes la /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings @200b kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i cho ga rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas pa'i rjes la /
translated: After performing the yoga of one’s deity according to the rite explained in the Vajra Element Great Mandala,

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i / rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i / rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
translated: one should bind the great seal of one’s deity as explained in the Dharma Mandala,

original: lce rkan la sbyar bar byas nas /
analyzed: lce rkan la sbyar bar byas nas /
translated: and join the tongue to the palate.

original: badzra n'a bi ta th'a ga ta h'um zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi lte ba'i phyogs su rdo rje phra mo bskyed la yang badzra n'a ni ta th'a ga ta h'um zhes zlos shing lte ba'i phyogs rdo rje phra mo bteg la /
analyzed: badzra n'a bi ta th'a ga ta h'um zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi lte ba'i phyogs su rdo rje phra mo bskyed la yang badzra n'a ni ta th'a ga ta h'um zhes zlos shing lte ba'i phyogs rdo rje phra mo bteg la /
translated: With vajra-na-vitatha-tathagata hum, one should generate a subtle vajra in the region of one's navel, and again reciting vajra-na-ni-tathagata hum, one should lift up the subtle vajra in the region of the navel.

original: sna khung nas sna'i rtse mor bsgreng ste gnas par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: sna khung nas sna'i rtse mor bsgreng ste gnas par bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that it is in the form of a nose-tip standing in the middle of the nose.

original: de nas s'u kshma badzra zhes zlos shing bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas s'u kshma badzra zhes zlos shing bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, reciting sukham-vajra, one should meditate.

original: bsdu ba'i dus su sna khung nas bcug la rang gi sning ga'i zla pa la /
analyzed: bsdu ba'i dus su sna khung nas bcug la rang gi sning ga'i zla pa la /
translated: At the time of dissolution, one should imagine that it enters through the nose and dissolves into the moon in one's heart,

original: badzra dri dha ti shtha zhes bya bas bzhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: badzra dri dha ti shtha zhes bya bas bzhugs par bya'o //
translated: with vajra-dri-dhi-tistha.

original: de ltar nyin de zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gnyis kyi bar du bsgoms na /
analyzed: de ltar nyin de zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gnyis kyi bar du bsgoms na /
translated: In this way, if one meditates for two months in four sessions each day,

original: nges par mtshan ma thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nges par mtshan ma thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will certainly attain the signs.

original: de nas mtshan ma thob cing brtan par gyur nas /
analyzed: de nas mtshan ma thob cing brtan par gyur nas /
translated: Then, when the signs are attained and stabilized,

original: spar na badzra zhes zlos shing sna'i rtse mor gnas pa'i rdo rje phra mo las byung ba'i rdo rje phra mo khams gsum ma lus shing lus pa med par khyab par bsam mo //
analyzed: spar na badzra zhes zlos shing sna'i rtse mor gnas pa'i rdo rje phra mo las byung ba'i rdo rje phra mo khams gsum ma lus shing lus pa med par khyab par bsam mo //
translated: When expanding, one recites “vajra” and imagines that the subtle vajra at the tip of the nose pervades the entire three realms without exception.

original: bsgoms pas dub par 'gyur nas ha ra na badzra zhes bya bas de rnams bsdus la /
analyzed: bsgoms pas dub par 'gyur nas ha ra na badzra zhes bya bas de rnams bsdus la /
translated: When one becomes tired of meditating, one gathers them in with “haraṇa vajra” and

original: rang gi sna'i rtse mor gnas pa'i rdo rje phra mo gzhug par bya zhing yang de bzhin du rang gi snying gar gzhug par bya'o ;
analyzed: rang gi sna'i rtse mor gnas pa'i rdo rje phra mo gzhug par bya zhing yang de bzhin du rang gi snying gar gzhug par bya'o ;
translated: introduces them into the subtle vajra at the tip of one’s nose.

original: / tshul 'dis zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: / tshul 'dis zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate in this way for a month.

original: de nas ni rdo rje phra mo'i ring nge 'dzin rdzogs par gyur pa yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas ni rdo rje phra mo'i ring nge 'dzin rdzogs par gyur pa yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
translated: Then the Blessed One said, “The meditative absorption of the subtle vajra is complete.”

original: de nas gang ci bsgoms pa thams cad mngon sum du byed do //
analyzed: de nas gang ci bsgoms pa thams cad mngon sum du byed do //
translated: Then whatever one meditates on becomes manifest.

original: sems dpa' gang gi byams pa ni ;
analyzed: sems dpa' gang gi byams pa ni ;
translated: The love of the bodhisattvas

original: / zhes bya ba ni gang la zhig la zhig la rgyu med par phan pa dang bde bas nye bar sdud par byed pa de ni mdza' bo zhes bya la /
analyzed: / zhes bya ba ni gang la zhig la zhig la rgyu med par phan pa dang bde bas nye bar sdud par byed pa de ni mdza' bo zhes bya la /
translated: He who, without any motive, benefits and brings happiness to others is called a friend.

original: mdza' bo'i dngos po nyid dam las ni byams pa ste /
analyzed: mdza' bo'i dngos po nyid dam las ni byams pa ste /
translated: The state of being a friend, or the action of a friend, is love.

original: phan pa dang bde bas nye bar bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: phan pa dang bde bas nye bar bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Its characteristic is the bringing together of others through benefit and happiness.

original: de sems can gang dang rnal 'byor mnyam par 'gyur zhes bya ba /
analyzed: de sems can gang dang rnal 'byor mnyam par 'gyur zhes bya ba /
translated: With what kind of sentient being does the bodhisattva share his yoga?

original: gang gi mnyam par 'gyur bar dmigs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gang gi mnyam par 'gyur bar dmigs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: With whom does he share it? With whom does he have the same objective?

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is his attitude?

original: brtan pa chen pos zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: brtan pa chen pos zhes bya ba'o //
translated: He is a great hero.🔽He is filled with compassion.🔽He is filled with compassion,

original: sems kyis khyab pa'i tshul gyis na //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems kyis khyab pa'i tshul gyis na // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: in the manner of pervasion of the mind.

original: ji ltar rdo rje phra mo sa nye bar mtshon pa'i @201a * //
analyzed: ji ltar rdo rje phra mo sa nye bar mtshon pa'i @201a * //
translated: The manner of pervasion of the mind is like the pervasion of space.

original: sems spro ba dang / brtan par bya ba gsungs pa de bzhin du sems kyis khyab pa'i tshul de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi yul la byams pa des khyab par bya'o //
analyzed: sems spro ba dang / brtan par bya ba gsungs pa de bzhin du sems kyis khyab pa'i tshul de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi yul la byams pa des khyab par bya'o //
translated: Just as the mind is pervaded by the joy and firmness taught, in the same way, by this kind of pervasion with the mind, one should pervade the sphere of all sentient beings with that loving kindness.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught:

original: mdza' bo dang / dgra bo dang / tha mal pa'i dbye bas sems can gyi khams gsum du byas la /
analyzed: mdza' bo dang / dgra bo dang / tha mal pa'i dbye bas sems can gyi khams gsum du byas la /
translated: The realm of sentient beings is made threefold by the division into friends, enemies, and neutral persons.

original: yang re re zhing chung du dang / 'bring dang / chen po'i dbye bas gsum gsum du byas nas /
analyzed: yang re re zhing chung du dang / 'bring dang / chen po'i dbye bas gsum gsum du byas nas /
translated: Then, each one is made threefold by the division into lesser, middling, and greater.

original: dang por re zhig mdza' bo chen po ba bde bas bsdus pa'i sems bskyed do //🔽de nas ni bar ma la'o //
analyzed: dang por re zhig mdza' bo chen po ba bde bas bsdus pa'i sems bskyed do // de nas ni bar ma la'o //
translated: First, one generates the thought of embracing with happiness the greater friend.🔽Then, the middling one.

original: de nas ni chud du la'o //
analyzed: de nas ni chud du la'o //
translated: Then, the lesser one.

original: de nas ni tha mal pa chung du la'o //
analyzed: de nas ni tha mal pa chung du la'o //
translated: Then, the lesser neutral person.

original: de nas thang ma la'o de nas chen po la'o //
analyzed: de nas thang ma la'o de nas chen po la'o //
translated: Then, the middling one. Then, the greater one.

original: de nas dgra bo chung du la'o //
analyzed: de nas dgra bo chung du la'o //
translated: Then, the lesser enemy.

original: de nas bar ma la'o //
analyzed: de nas bar ma la'o //
translated: Then, the middling one.

original: gang gi dgra bo chen po de la bde bas bsdus pa'i bsam pa mdza' bo chen po dang 'dra bar skye bar byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi dgra bo chen po de la bde bas bsdus pa'i bsam pa mdza' bo chen po dang 'dra bar skye bar byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he generates the thought of happiness, which is like a great friend, toward that great enemy, at that time

original: des byams pa thob par gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: des byams pa thob par gyur pa yin no //
translated: he has attained love.

original: de nas de'i rjes la ji skad du gsungs pa bzhin du khyab cing spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de'i rjes la ji skad du gsungs pa bzhin du khyab cing spro bar bya'o //
translated: Then, after that, he should pervade and expand in accordance with the scriptures.

original: byams pas khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni zhes bya ba ni sems can dang phyogs kyi cha la sogs pa la byams pa spro ba'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: byams pas khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni zhes bya ba ni sems can dang phyogs kyi cha la sogs pa la byams pa spro ba'i tshul gyis so //
translated: In the manner of pervading with love means in the manner of expanding love toward the parts of space and so on that are occupied by sentient beings.

original: snying rje can ni gang yin pa //
analyzed: snying rje can ni gang yin pa //
translated: He who is compassionate

original: zhes bya ba la ka ni bsod snyoms la bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la ka ni bsod snyoms la bya ba la /
translated: means he who is intent on the alms-round.

original: bsod snyoms de 'gog pas na snying rje ste /
analyzed: bsod snyoms de 'gog pas na snying rje ste /
translated: Alms is ka, and he stops that, so he is compassionate.

original: sems can gzhan gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal mthong na /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal mthong na /
translated: When he sees the suffering that belongs to the continuum of another sentient being,

original: de'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir zhing de las gdon par 'dod pas /
analyzed: de'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir zhing de las gdon par 'dod pas /
translated: he is tormented by that suffering and desires to rescue him from it.

original: rang gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i bde ba 'gog cing spro bar byed ces bya ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: rang gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i bde ba 'gog cing spro bar byed ces bya ba'i don du'o //
translated: He stops his own happiness that belongs to his own continuum and expands it, this is the meaning.

original: snying rje'i ngo bo nyid ni snying rje can ni gang yin pa zhes pa bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje'i ngo bo nyid ni snying rje can ni gang yin pa zhes pa bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: The nature of compassion is that the compassionate one is the yogi.

original: sems can kun don ldan pa yis//
analyzed: sems can kun don ldan pa yis//
translated: Endowed with the aim of all sentient beings.

original: zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa'i bsams pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa'i bsams pas so //
translated: This means that with the intention of accomplishing the aim of all sentient beings.

original: bsgrub par yis ni khyab par bya //
analyzed: bsgrub par yis ni khyab par bya //
translated: One should pervade with the practice.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsam pa 'ba' zhig tsam ma yin gyi rim pa de nyid kyis khyab cing sbo bar bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsam pa 'ba' zhig tsam ma yin gyi rim pa de nyid kyis khyab cing sbo bar bya ste /
translated: This means that one should not only have the intention, but also pervade and cover with that very process.

original: de ltar bsgrub pa nyams su len pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar bsgrub pa nyams su len pa yin no //
translated: Thus one practices the accomplishment.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /
translated: This shows the following.

original: snying rje'i sems bskyed pa 'ba' zhig tsam du zad pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: snying rje'i sems bskyed pa 'ba' zhig tsam du zad pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not just the generation of the thought of compassion alone.

original: gzhan du na ci nus par sdug bsngal bsal ba la 'bad par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na ci nus par sdug bsngal bsal ba la 'bad par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Otherwise, one should strive to the best of one's ability to remove suffering.

original: kun kyang rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: kun kyang rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
translated: All are naturally luminous.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This means

original: dngos po thams cad rang bzhin te /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad rang bzhin te /
translated: all things are natural.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis 'od gsal ba yin pas rang bzhin @201b 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis 'od gsal ba yin pas rang bzhin @201b 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: Since they are luminous by nature, they are naturally luminous.

original: de yang gang gi phyir gdod nas dag pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de yang gang gi phyir gdod nas dag pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Moreover, it is called “primordially pure” for the following reason.

original: dang po nyid nas dag pas na gdod nas dag pa'o //
analyzed: dang po nyid nas dag pas na gdod nas dag pa'o //
translated: Since it is pure from the very beginning, it is primordially pure.

original: ci'i phyir gdod nas dag pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gdod nas dag pa yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it primordially pure?

original: nam mkha' bzhin zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said to be “like space.”

original: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas nam mkha' bzhin te /
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas nam mkha' bzhin te /
translated: It is like space because it is similar to space.

original: gang gi phyir nam mkha' ltar gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nam mkha' ltar gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is unsoiled like space.

original: nam mkha' 'dra ba'i dngos po de dag gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: nam mkha' 'dra ba'i dngos po de dag gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What are those things that are like space?

original: de'i phyir chos sam yang na chos ma yin zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir chos sam yang na chos ma yin zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said that “they are either Dharma or non-Dharma.”

original: de la chos ni ma chags pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la chos ni ma chags pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therein, Dharma is non-attachment, etc.

original: chos ma yin pa ni chags pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa ni chags pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Non-Dharma is attachment, etc.

original: de dag kyang don dam par stong pa nyid yin pas chos thams cad bdag med par khyab cing spros pa'i bsam pa ste /
analyzed: de dag kyang don dam par stong pa nyid yin pas chos thams cad bdag med par khyab cing spros pa'i bsam pa ste /
translated: Moreover, since they are ultimately empty, all dharmas are pervaded by selflessness.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pas dga' bar 'gyur zhing mgu pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pas dga' bar 'gyur zhing mgu pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The thought of conceptual elaboration is delighted and gladdened by the superior resolve. This is the meaning.

original: de ltar dga' ba bsgom pa'i man dag gsungs nas da ni btang snyoms sgom pa'i man dag gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar dga' ba bsgom pa'i man dag gsungs nas da ni btang snyoms sgom pa'i man dag gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Having thus taught the rule for cultivating joy, now he teaches the rule for cultivating equanimity:

original: gdul dka' ba dang mtshungs 'dra ba //
analyzed: gdul dka' ba dang mtshungs 'dra ba //
translated: The difficult to tame, the similar,🔽The like, and those not vessels🔽For the Buddha's enlightenment.

original: zhes bya ba la gdul dka' ba ni log par lta ba rnams so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la gdul dka' ba ni log par lta ba rnams so //
translated: The difficult to tame are those with wrong views.

original: de dang mtshungs pa ni yod par lta ba yin yang mi dge ba la mngon par dga' ba rnams so //
analyzed: de dang mtshungs pa ni yod par lta ba yin yang mi dge ba la mngon par dga' ba rnams so //
translated: The similar are those who have the view of existence but delight in nonvirtue.

original: de dang 'dra ba ni dge ba la mngon par dga' bar zin kyang theg pa chen po la mi 'ug pa'o //🔽gdul dka' ba yang yin la gdul dka' ba dang mtshungs pa yang yin la de dang 'dra ba yang yin pas /
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba ni dge ba la mngon par dga' bar zin kyang theg pa chen po la mi 'ug pa'o // gdul dka' ba yang yin la gdul dka' ba dang mtshungs pa yang yin la de dang 'dra ba yang yin pas /
translated: The like are those who delight in virtue but are not vessels for the Great Vehicle.

original: gdul dka' ba dang mtshungs 'dra ba /🔽sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gdul dka' ba dang mtshungs 'dra ba / sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: They are difficult to tame, similar to the difficult to tame, and like the difficult to tame.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste /
translated: The Buddha's enlightenment is the enlightenment of the Buddha,

original: bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'o //
translated: that is, unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.

original: de'i snod ma yin pa 'di lta bu yang yin pas de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir zhes pa dus gzhan du snod du rung bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i snod ma yin pa 'di lta bu yang yin pas de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir zhes pa dus gzhan du snod du rung bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Since they are not vessels for this, in order to make them vessels for understanding this,

original: btang snyoms chen po bsgoms par bya //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: btang snyoms chen po bsgoms par bya // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: one should cultivate great equanimity.

original: de ltar btang snyoms su bya ba dang btang snyoms su bzhag ste /
analyzed: de ltar btang snyoms su bya ba dang btang snyoms su bzhag ste /
translated: Thus, having made them equanimous and having placed them in equanimity,

original: dus gzhan du de bskyab pa'i phyir da ltar tha mal par gzhag cing /
analyzed: dus gzhan du de bskyab pa'i phyir da ltar tha mal par gzhag cing /
translated: in order to protect them at another time, one should now place them in the ordinary state.

original: btang snyoms kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas btang snyoms chen po zhes bya ba de bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: btang snyoms kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas btang snyoms chen po zhes bya ba de bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Since it is equanimity and it is great, it is called great equanimity. One should cultivate that.

original: da ltar ni sems can 'di dag snod du rung ba ma yin pas /
analyzed: da ltar ni sems can 'di dag snod du rung ba ma yin pas /
translated: Since these sentient beings are not vessels for this,

original: dus phyis bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ba la gzhag par bya'i //
analyzed: dus phyis bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ba la gzhag par bya'i //
translated: later I will place them in unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment.

original: rgyab kyis phyogs par ni mi bya'o zhes rnam par bsam zhing skal ba med pa'i @202a * //
analyzed: rgyab kyis phyogs par ni mi bya'o zhes rnam par bsam zhing skal ba med pa'i @202a * //
translated: I will not turn my back on them.

original: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa la nyin re zhing lan drug tu spro zhing khyab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa la nyin re zhing lan drug tu spro zhing khyab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: One should expand and pervade the entire realm of sentient beings with joy, six times each day.

original: 'dir sbyor ba thams cad du yang bsgom pa'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir sbyor ba thams cad du yang bsgom pa'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: Here is the sequence of meditation in all the practices:

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshogs rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du byas pa'i rjes la /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshogs rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du byas pa'i rjes la /
translated: After performing the yoga of one’s deity as taught in the Great Maṇḍala of the Vajra Realm,

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te ma t'a me tri par zhes zlos shing /
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te ma t'a me tri par zhes zlos shing /
translated: one should bind the great seal of one’s deity as taught in the Dharma maṇḍala, recite “maṭ amāte”,

original: rig pa'i lha mo byams pa chen mo'i gzugs sku mdog dkar ba bsams la /
analyzed: rig pa'i lha mo byams pa chen mo'i gzugs sku mdog dkar ba bsams la /
translated: and imagine the knowledge goddess in the form of Mahāmaitrī, white in color.

original: 'das ma thag tu smas pa'i sngags 'di zlos shing /
analyzed: 'das ma thag tu smas pa'i sngags 'di zlos shing /
translated: Reciting this mantra, which was just mentioned,

original: des bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la khyab ste /
analyzed: des bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la khyab ste /
translated: she pervades the body of the person to be accomplished,

original: phan pa dang bde ba dang ldan par ji srid du sems brtan par gyur pa de srid du bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: phan pa dang bde ba dang ldan par ji srid du sems brtan par gyur pa de srid du bsam par bya'o //
translated: and one should imagine that they are endowed with benefit and happiness for as long as the mind becomes stable.

original: de nas sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das yum thams cad du khyab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das yum thams cad du khyab par bya'o //
translated: Then, as previously explained, one should pervade all with the Blessed Mother.

original: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor da bzhin du byas la /
analyzed: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor da bzhin du byas la /
translated: Having performed the yoga of one's deity in the same way,

original: ma h'a ka ru na pa ra na zhes slos shing /
analyzed: ma h'a ka ru na pa ra na zhes slos shing /
translated: reciting mahākaruṇapāraṇā,

original: yum thugs rje chen mo sku mdog dmar ser bsams la /
analyzed: yum thugs rje chen mo sku mdog dmar ser bsams la /
translated: one should visualize the Mother Mahākaruṇikā, red in color.

original: sngags 'di nyid bzlas la /
analyzed: sngags 'di nyid bzlas la /
translated: Reciting this very mantra,

original: des bsgrub par bya ba'i sems can gyi khams sdug bsngal dang bral bar mdzad par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: des bsgrub par bya ba'i sems can gyi khams sdug bsngal dang bral bar mdzad par bsam par bya'o //
translated: one should think that she causes the realm of sentient beings to be accomplished, free from suffering.

original: de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: In the same way, having performed the yoga of one's deity,

original: sarbba shuddha pra me rta par na zhes yid la zlos shing bcom ldan 'das yum dga' ba mo dga' zhing mgu ba sku mdog ser mo bsams la /
analyzed: sarbba shuddha pra me rta par na zhes yid la zlos shing bcom ldan 'das yum dga' ba mo dga' zhing mgu ba sku mdog ser mo bsams la /
translated: mentally reciting sarvaśuddha prame ratapāraṇā, one should visualize the Blessed Mother Pramuditā, yellow in color, delighted and pleased.

original: sngags 'di nyid bzlas nas sems can gyi khams khyab par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags 'di nyid bzlas nas sems can gyi khams khyab par bya'o //
translated: Having recited this very mantra, one should pervade the realm of sentient beings.

original: de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: In the same way, having performed the yoga of one's deity,

original: sarbba tva sam po ta ya zhes yid la zlos shing bcom ldan 'das yum btang snyoms chen mo sku mdog ljang gu bsams la bsngags 'di nyid zlos pa dang / des bsgrub par bya ba'i sems can gyi khams khyab par bya'o //
analyzed: sarbba tva sam po ta ya zhes yid la zlos shing bcom ldan 'das yum btang snyoms chen mo sku mdog ljang gu bsams la bsngags 'di nyid zlos pa dang / des bsgrub par bya ba'i sems can gyi khams khyab par bya'o //
translated: Reciting sarvatathāgata-saṃpotayā, one should imagine the Blessed Lady Mahāmaitrī, green in color, and recite this praise, and with it pervade the realm of sentient beings, which is to be purified.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
translated: Since they are tathāgatas and also all, they are all tathāgatas.

original: rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / snying gar rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i dang / rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / snying gar rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i dang / rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: They are the essence of the five-pronged vajra, Vajrahṛdaya Bodhisattva, Vajrasattva, Vairocana, and so forth.

original: de rnams rjes su dran pa ni rjes su dran pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams rjes su dran pa ni rjes su dran pa ste /
translated: Recollection of them is recollection.

original: yang dang yang du mngon du bya zhing bsgom pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yang dang yang du mngon du bya zhing bsgom pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means repeatedly manifesting and meditating.

original: de'i ye shes la bslab bo @202b zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ye shes la bslab bo @202b zhes pa'o //
translated: One should train in their wisdom.

original: nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du //
analyzed: nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du //
translated: In space or another direction,

original: zhes bya ba la de la nam mkha' ni grags par zad do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la de la nam mkha' ni grags par zad do //
translated: As for space, it is well known.

original: phyogs gzhan ni ras dang rtsig pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs gzhan ni ras dang rtsig pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Another place is a cloth, a wall, etc.

original: rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni //
translated: By the method of the subtle vajra,

original: zhes bya ba ni lce ni rkan la sbyar bya zhing //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lce ni rkan la sbyar bya zhing //
translated: the tongue is joined to the palate,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'o //
translated: etc., as explained above.

original: de'i byor ba ni badzra mu kham bha ba zhes zlos shing nam mkha' la rdor je rtse lnga la bskyed la /
analyzed: de'i byor ba ni badzra mu kham bha ba zhes zlos shing nam mkha' la rdor je rtse lnga la bskyed la /
translated: With the recitation of vajra mukhaṃ bhavā, one should generate a five-pointed vajra in space.

original: 'greng dam yang na 'dug kyang rung bas ji srid skyi bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'greng dam yang na 'dug kyang rung bas ji srid skyi bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on it as long as one does not feel tired, whether standing or sitting.

original: skyi bar gyur na rang gi snying gar bcug la badzra dri dha ti shtha zhes brtan par byas la ldang bar bya'o //
analyzed: skyi bar gyur na rang gi snying gar bcug la badzra dri dha ti shtha zhes brtan par byas la ldang bar bya'o //
translated: When one does feel tired, one should place it in one's heart, and with the recitation of vajra dṛdho 'sthana, one should stabilize it and rise up.

original: de ltar nyin re zhing ji rid bla ba gnyis lon pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar nyin re zhing ji rid bla ba gnyis lon pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In this way, one should meditate for as long as one can, for two periods of time each day.

original: de nas ni nges par mngon du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas ni nges par mngon du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, one will certainly see it directly.

original: de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dag thams cad rdo rje'i gzugs kyis khyab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dag thams cad rdo rje'i gzugs kyis khyab par bya'o //
translated: Then, all these buddhafields should be pervaded by the form of a vajra.

original: yang de bzhin du de bsdus la rang gi snying gar brtan par bya'o //
analyzed: yang de bzhin du de bsdus la rang gi snying gar brtan par bya'o //
translated: Again, gathering it in the same way, it should be stabilized in one’s heart.

original: de ltar nyin re zhing ji srid zla ba gcig lon pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar nyin re zhing ji srid zla ba gcig lon pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In this way, one should meditate for a month, every day.

original: zla ba'i mthar mtshan thog thag bsgoms na grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: zla ba'i mthar mtshan thog thag bsgoms na grub par 'gyur te /
translated: At the end of the month, if one meditates throughout the night, one will be successful.

original: nam mkha' thams cad rdo rjer gyur par mthong la /
analyzed: nam mkha' thams cad rdo rjer gyur par mthong la /
translated: One will see the whole sky become a vajra.

original: de nas ni lus de nyid kyis sangs rgyas nyid myur du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas ni lus de nyid kyis sangs rgyas nyid myur du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, with that very body, one will quickly see buddhahood.

original: de bzhin du yang gnas kun du zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang gnas kun du zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
translated: In the same way, everywhere, as before.

original: snying gar ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni snying gar nas 'bras tsam gyi rdo rje ni snying gar rdo rje ste chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: snying gar ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni snying gar nas 'bras tsam gyi rdo rje ni snying gar rdo rje ste chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: At the heart, Vajrasattva: at the heart, a vajra the size of a grain, is the Vajrasattva of the great seal as taught in the Dharma maṇḍala.

original: de lta bu'i snying ga'i rdo rje byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi sems dpa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i snying ga'i rdo rje byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi sems dpa'o //
translated: Such a heart-vajra is the being with the nature of enlightenment.

original: rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgom par bya //
analyzed: rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgom par bya //
translated: One should meditate on it with perfect equipoise.

original: zhes bya ba ma yengs par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ma yengs par bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should contemplate it without distraction.

original: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du byas pa'i rjes la chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshul chen po bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du byas pa'i rjes la chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshul chen po bcing bar bya'o //
translated: After performing the yoga of one's deity just as it is, one should bind the great method of the great seal of Vajrasattva as taught in the Dharma maṇḍala.
